description: Ekta Bhalobasar Golpo is a Bengali romantic drama film starring Mainak Banerjee, Anamika Chakraborty, Sean Banrjee, Namita Chakraborty and Bikash Bhowmik. The film tells the story of friendship between Arjun, Amit and Ria, best friends since their college days. It explores how their friendship changes as differences grow between the three after fate delivers a cruel blow.

Internal Affairs is a romantic comedy play starring Hussain Dalal, Priyanshu Painyuli and Shriya Pilgaonkar. After a post-work drinking session, Sid and Rhea end up having a clumsy one-night stand, which later turns into a relationship which neither of them wanted. This light-hearted comedy highlights the problems faced by youngsters and the impact it has on their relationships.

Kumbh Karan vs Danavpur is an animation film. Kumbh Karan gulps down a vat of golden honey and later realizes that it belonged to Danavpur’s evil King Yakshas. This irks the King and before he wages a war, Kumbh Karan comes up with the idea of having a sports competition and if Kumbh Karan’s team wins, the King would pardon them. However, winning the competition will not be an easy task and Kumbh Karan needs to give his all.

Chhota Chintu Bada Chakkar is an animation film about Chintu, a school going kid who narrates imaginative stories to his friends. Trouble begins when his stories start coming true and his friends also land in trouble due to him.

Chhota Chintu Bada Feku is an animation film about Chintu, a nine-year-old boy who tries to impress his friends with his imaginative tales. Things get complicated for Chintu when his fanciful stories start coming true.

movietitle: My Name is Raj 3 - Attack Of The Demons
description: My Name is Raj 3- Attack Of The Demons is an animation film about Raj and his two friends, Meera and Bala. The film revolves around the adventures of the three friends and how they take on their enemy Kaalicharan, whose dream is to conquer the whole world.
Nanha Nattu is an animation film about Nattu, a mischievous but clever boy, who uses his wit to take on notorious villains.

Go Chan is a Japanese animated film. The story revolves around Go Chan who arrives on earth in search of the heart plasma that will restore peace in his home planet ‘EX Panda’. Go Chan and his friends have a good time together until humans invade to capture them.

Blind Game is a 2006 Marathi comedy thriller film starring Mukta Barve,  Santosh Juvekar,  Upendra Limaye and others. The five characters in the film are all supposed to be blind. The film is their stoy and what happens with them.

Mehmaan is a ZEE5 Original thriller starring Kaushik Sen, Raima Sen and Saheb Bhattacharya. Somshubhro and Aalo are a happily married couple from Kolkata. But every marriage comes with its own secrets. What is the secret in their relationship and how far can one go for the sake of love?

Sone Bhi Do Yaaro is a ZEE5 Original starring Naveen Kasturia, Bharat Thakkar, Druma Mehta, Chandrika Rajan and Pranav Ojha. A severely sleep deprived man tries to catch a few hours of sleep before he is back to work again. But the loud snores of his friend's uncle doesn't let him. As he flits deliriously between the world of dreams and the real, what tricks does his mind have in store for him?

PadMan is a 2018 social drama starring Akshay Kumar, Sonam Kapoor and Radhika Apte. An inspiring journey of a caring husband who goes out of his way to build a low-cost sanitary pad manufacturing machine to benefit his wife and the rural women.

Bhaagamathie is a 2018 Tamil horror thriller film starring Anushka Shetty, Unni Mukundan, Jayaram and Asha Sarath. To bring down minister Eswar Prasad, his political rivals decide to interrogate Chanchala, a close confidante of Prasad. Chanchala is shifted to the haunted house of Queen Bhaagamathie where a chain of strange incidents starts unfolding.

Balloon is a 2017 Tamil horror comedy starring Jai, Anjali and Janani Iyer. Seeking inspiration for a horror film, an aspiring filmmaker reaches a haunted house where a chain of bizarre incidents starts unfolding. While looking for answers the director realises that the incidents may a have connection to his past.

Qarib Qarib Singlle is a 2017 Hindi romantic comedy film starring Irrfan Khan, Parvathy and Neha Dhupia. Yogi and Jaya meet via a dating site and plan a trip to Rishikesh. The young couple are poles apart and their journey turns out to be an adventure of a lifetime.

Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana is a 2017 Hindi romantic drama film starring Rajkumar Rao, Kriti Kharbanda, Govind Namdev and Navni Parihar. It’s a bittersweet tale of love, set in the backdrop of rural India obsessed with civil services. Satyendra and Aarti are to get married but on the day of wedding, Aarti decides to run away to pursue her career, which her in-laws are against.
Oh My God is a 2016 Hindi dubbed horror thriller film starring Tanish, Maghashri and Pavani.

Mersal is a 2017 Tamil action thriller film starring Vijay, Samantha Akkineni, Kajal Aggarwal and Nitya Menen. Maaran, a doctor and Vettri, a magician come together avenge their father’s death and to expose the corruption that persists in India's medical industry.

Huliraaya is a 2017 Kannada thriller film starring Balu Nagendra and Divya Uruduga. When Suresaa, a carefree youth from the jungles of Karnataka, moves to the city to find better a better job, his life turns into a roller coaster ride full of thrills and dramatic experiences.

Spyder is a 2017 Telugu thriller drama film starring Mahesh Babu and Rakul Preet Singh in the lead. Spyder is a story of an intelligence officer who develops phone software that helps to trace people who are in need of help. On learning about a criminal who is out to kill people in Hyderabad, he reaches out to help them.

Haseena Parkar is a 2017 Hindi crime drama film starring Shraddha Kapoor, Siddhanth Kapoor and Ankur Bhatia. After underworld don Dawood Ibrahim flees to Dubai, his sister Haseena faces the brunt of society. Tired of being a victim, Haseena decides to fight back and since then is known as the 'Aappa' of underworld. During a court case, Haseena explains the circumstances that compelled her to take the drastic steps.

Cockpit is a 2017 Bengali action adventure thriller film starring Dev, Koel Mallick and Rukmini Maitra. When a Mumbai to Calcutta flight is hit by bad turbulent weather, Captain Dibyendu Rakshit must fight against various obstacles to save the flight and the lives on many passengers.

Mugulu Nage is a 2017 Kannada romantic comedy film starring Ganesh, Apoorva Arora, Nikitha Narayan and Ashika Ranganath in the lead roles. The story is about Pulkesh who has never cried since his birth. His life takes an interesting turn as he falls in love and faces a heartbreak.

Shubh Mangal Saavdhan is a 2017 romantic comedy starring Ayushmann Khurrana, Bhumi Pednekar, Jimmy Shergill, Seema Pahwa and Neeraj Sood. A soon to be married couple suffers a setback when the groom realises he suffers from erectile dysfunction. As the wedding day gets closer, things get out of control when the family members get involved to find a cure for the groom’s problem.

Saheba is a 2017 Kannada romantic film starring Manoranjan Ravichandran and Shanvi Srivastava. Manu likes Nandhini but their approach towards life is completely different. Without her knowledge, Manu secretly helps Nandhini achieve success in her career, but will he ever be able to express his love?

Bareilly Ki Barfi is a 2017 Hindi romantic comedy film starring Ayushmann Khurrana, Rajkumar Rao and Kriti Sanon. A brilliant script with quirky one-liners and hilarious performance from Rajkumar Rao, makes this light-hearted comedy a must-watch. Bitty, a free-spirited girl, falls in love with an author, Pritam Vidrohi, and requests the book shop owner Chirag to introduce her to Pritam. However, Chirag himself falls for Bitty and must find a way to impress her.

Lie is a 2017 Telugu action thriller film starring Nithiin, Arjun, Megha Akash and Ravi Kishan. A.Sathyam, an unemployed youth, comes across Chaitra and they decide to lie and never reveal any truth to each other. Meanwhile, the police are in search of Padmanabham, a criminal on the run. Things take an unexpected turn when Padmanabham crosses path with A.Sathyam.

Podhuvaga Emmanasu Thangam is a 2017 Tamil action comedy film starring Udhayanidhi Stalin, Nivetha Pethuraj, R. Parthiepan and Soori. Ganesh, a jobless youth, falls in love with Oothukaattaan’s daughter Leela. Oothukaattaan belongs to a rival village who wishes evil for Ganesh and his villagers. How will Ganesh overcome all the hurdles to win Leela’s love?

Toilet: Ek Prem Katha is a 2017 romantic drama film starring Akshay Kumar, Bhumi Pednekar, Anupam Kher, Sudhir Pandey and Divyendu Sharma. This satirical comedy highlights the issue of open defecation that persists in rural India.
Keshav and Jaya love each other and decide to get married. Trouble begins when Jaya discovers that none of the houses in Keshav’s village have a toilet. Upset with their unprogressive thinking, Jaya decides to leave Keshav and returns to her parents. A disheartened Keshav takes it upon himself to bring a change in his village and win back Jaya’s love.

Nakshatram is a 2017 Telugu film starring Sundeep Kishan, Pragya Jaiswal, Sai Dharam Tej and Regina Cassandra. 

The story is about Rama Rao who hails from a family of police officers and aspires to become one. However, the police chief’s son ensures that he does not clear the test. Later, Rama Rao fights against the anti-social elements in the society, in spite of not becoming a police officer.
Dekh Kemon Lage is a 2017 Bengali romantic comedy film starring Soham Chakraborty, Subhashree Ganguly and Avik Chongdar. The film is directed by Abhijeet Guha.

Munna Michael is a 2017 Hindi action drama film starring Tiger Shroff, Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Nidhhi Agerwal in the lead.

The story revolves around Munna, a street dancer, who is hired by Mahender, a gangster, to train him in dance, so that he can impress his lady-love, Dolly. Munna and Dolly fall in love with each other, but Mahender finds out that Munna is betraying him, so he threatens Munna to kill his father, Michael.

Channa Mereya is a 2017 romantic drama starring Ninja, Payal Rajput, Karamjit Anmol and Amrit Mann. It is a rebellious love story of a couple coming from diverse economic backgrounds, who faces the wrath of their family and fight against all odds for their unconditional love.
Guti Malhar er Atithi is a 2017 Bengali romantic comedy film starring Sourav Das, Anindita Bose, Biplab Chatterjee and Rita Koiral. The film is directed by Anindya Sarkar.

Mom is a 2017 Hindi thriller film starring Sridevi, Akshaye Khanna and Nawazuddin Siddiqui. Directed by Ravi Udyawar, the film's music has been composed by A.R. Rehman. Devki, a biology teacher is popular among her students. Arya, her stepdaughter studies in the same school but they share a frosty relationship. When Arya is involved in an unfortunate incident, Devki faces tough obstacles to get justice for her stepdaughter, leading to an emotional journey for the two.

Duvvada Jagannatham is a 2017 Telugu action film starring Allu Arjun and Pooja Hegde.

The story revolves around Duvvada Jagannatham Sastry, an orthodox but helpful man. Police officer Purushottam notices Duvvada’s potential and asks him to be a secret vigilante and eliminate criminals. Will Duvvada succeed in his attempt?

Maragatha Naanayam is a 2017 fantasy comedy film starring Aadhi and Nikki Galrani. Sengutavan is a jewellery thief, who works for Ramdoss. They go after a cursed stone called Maragatha Naanayam with the help of three souls. They face problems from Twinkle Ramanathan, a local gangster, who is also in search of the same stone. They escape from Twinkle and find the original stone but it is cursed. They go back to the grave site to return the stone.

Behen Hogi Teri is a 2017 Hindi romantic comedy film starring Rajkumar Rao, Shruti Haasan and Gautam Gulati. 
Gattu loves his neighbour Binny but the society expects all boys to treat the neighbouring girls as their sisters. When Binny’s parents seek a groom for her, Gattu is never considered which irks him. How will Gattu convince the parents and the society and win over Binny’s love.
Amie Nayak is a Bengali action thriller. It stars Suman,   Niketa and Mihir Das in pivotal roles. The story is an intense one,   with action sequences that complement the narrative.

Saab Bahadar is a 2017 Punjabi comedy thriller drama film starring Ammy Virk, Jaswinder Bhalla and Rana Ranbir. The story revolves around police officer Kuldeep Singh who is fond of reading mystery novels and performs his duty diligently. His life takes an interesting turn when he is assigned the task to investigate the murder case of a prominent person from their village.

Thondan is a 2017 Tamil crime drama film starring Samuthirakani, Vikranth, Sunanina and Soori. Vishnu gets assaulted by Narayanan, a politician's son after Narayanan's brother dies in the ambulance. By using his influence and bribing the local police and government officials, Narayanan makes Vishnu's life miserable and vows to kill Vishnu. So Vishnu decides to take things into his hand.

Mitha Mitha is a 2017 Odiya drama film starring Sambhav, Prakruti, Jyoti,  Ankita, Shradha and Rajesh. Three guys fall in love with three respective girls at the same time. These couples are in love with each other and enjoy each others company but sometimes due to the high demands of the respective girls they get into trouble.

Half Girlfriend is a 2017 Hindi romantic film starring Arjun Kapoor and Shraddha Kapoor. The film is based on the novel of the same name written by Chetan Bhagat. 

The story revolves around Madhav, a student from Bihar, who doesn’t speak fluent English. He gets admission in a Delhi college where he falls in love with Riya and proposes her. However, Riya just wants to be friends and she comes up with the idea of being Madhav’s Half Girlfriend, somebody who’s more than a friend but not a girlfriend.

Sarkar 3 is a 2017 Hindi drama starring Amitabh Bachchan, Amit Sadh, Ronit Roy. Subhash Nagre’s empire is under attack. Crime lord Vallya joins forces with opposition leader Deshpande who uses his sources to find out that there is a rift between Sarkar and his grandson Chiku. Will they be successful?
Kumar, a metro water lorry driver, falls in love with Janani who is loves Ilayaraja's music. Her family intimidates Kumar greatly.

Raaga is a 2017 Kannada romantic drama film starring Mithra, Bhama, Avinash, Rangayana Raghu and Sadhu Kokila in lead roles. It is a love story of a visually impaired couple, where the girl comes from a rich family and therefore they have to face many cha

Shivalinga is a 2017 Telugu horror comedy film starring Raghava Lawrence, Ritika Singh and Pradeep Rawat. When Raheem is found dead, the police declare it a suicide, but Raheem’s girlfriend claims it is a murder. CBI officer Shivalingesh takes up the case and finds that Raheem’s soul is present around and wouldn’t rest until his killers are punished. Can Shivalingesh solve the mystery?

Naam Shabana is a 2017 Hindi action thriller film starring Taapsee Pannu, Akshay Kumar and Manoj Bajpayee in the lead. 

It all begins when Shabana’s friend Jai is killed in a dispute with some drunken men who were teasing her. Soon, Shabana receives a call from a person who agrees to help her in punishing Jai’s killers, provided she agrees to be a part of a secret spy agency.
Mohabbat is a 2017 Bhojpuri romantic drama film starring Pradeep Pandey and Poonam Dubey. Directed by Premashu Singh, the cast also includes Kajal Yadav and Ayaz Khan.

Bruce Lee is a 2017 action-comedy film starring G.V.Prakash and Kriti Kharbanda. Bruce Lee is a cowardly person who runs away from most of his problems. He and his friend are in love with Kriti Kharbanda and her friend respectively. A time bomb finds its way into the hero's car and the heroine becomes a witness to a murder by a don Muniskanth. There is also police officer who is also hunting down the criminals. Bruce Lee musters up the courage to save his girlfriend.

Commando 2 - The Black Money Trail is a 2017 Hindi action film starring Vidyut Jamwal and Adah Sharma. 

The story revolves around commando Karanveer who is on a mission to nab Vicky Chaddha, the most wanted black money laundering agent. Karanveer, with three other Indian officers, travels to Malaysia to track black money which has been siphoned to foreign banks. Will Karanveer succeed in his mission?

Yaman is a 2017 Tamil thriller drama movie starring Vijay Anthony and Mia George. Tamizharasan loses his father to two politicians who use his father as a pawn and then dispose of him. Tamilarasan is placed in jail in place of another man for money. In jail, he makes some good friends who encourage him to become a politician. Tamizharasan slowly rises to the top of the political food chain at the same time plots revenge against the politicians who caused his father's death.

Dora is a 2017 Tamil thriller-horror film starring Nayanthara.  Pavalakkodi and her father Vairakannur live together in a small house. Pavalakkodi is an unmarried woman and decides to stay that way. She decides to go to her hometown and wants to borrow a car. After being insulted by her aunt she buys a car. The car is possessed by a spirit of a dog called Dora. The previous owner of the dog was killed by three goons. Together they avenge the death of Dora's previous owner.

Hothat Ekdin is a 2017 Bengali romantic comedy drama film starring Rachna Banerjee, Tota Roy Chowdhury, Biswanath Basu and Paran Bandopadhyay. This film is directed by Raaj Mukherjee and produced by Artage films and Incoda TV.

Hebbuli is a 2017 Kannada action thriller film starring Sudeep, V. Ravichandran, and Amala Paul.
The story revolves around Captain Ram, a Para Commando Officer, who sets out to find the culprits and motive behind his brother’s death. His search leads him to fight the system and pursue to fulfill his brother’s vision.

John Wick: Chapter 2 is a 2017 American action thriller starring Keanu Reeves and Riccardo Scamarcio in lead roles. The film is directed by Chad Stahelski, who was a stunt man in the Matrix Trilogy.
In the sequel, Chapter 2, John is approached by an Italian crime lord to complete a task, which he reluctantly accepts. John travels to Rome and completes the task only to realise that he has been double-crossed by the Italian crime lord.

Nenu Local is a 2017 Telugu romantic drama starring Nani, Keerthy Suresh and Naveen Chandra.

The story revolves around Babu, a carefree youngster, who frequently gets into trouble with his college professor. Meanwhile, Babu falls in love with Keerthy, who asks Babu to impress her father, if he wishes to marry her. Unfortunately, Keerthy’s father turns out to be the same college professor, who would just not agree for marriage. Can Babu find a way to convince Keerthy’s father?

Mumbai is a 2017 Kannada romantic action film starring Darling Krishna, Teju and Ashish Vidyarthi. Krishna works in hotel and falls in love with a girl-next-door. However, circumstances force him to move to Mumbai where he joins the underworld. How will Krishna get out of the mess?

Beautiful Mansugalu is a 2017 Kannada romantic thriller starring Sathish Ninasam, Shruthi Hariharan and Achyuth Kumar. 
Inspired by true events, the story revolves around innocent lovers Prashanth and Nandini, who suffer due to the TRP driven media, that thrives on sensationalism and not the truth.

Kahaani 2 is a 2016 Hindi thriller film starring Vidya Balan and Arjun Rampal. 

The story revolves around Vidya Sinha and her daughter Mini. When Mini is kidnapped, Vidya rushes to her rescue, but meets with an accident and slips into coma. Inspector Inderjeet who investigates Vidya’s case, finds a diary at her home which has details about her dark past. The police doubt if Vidya is her real name or is she Durga Rani Singh.

Mummy - Save Me is a 2016 Kannada supernatural horror film starring Priyanka Upendra and Yuvina Parthavi in the lead. 
Priya is seven months pregnant when she loses her husband. She moves with her elder daughter Kriya to a new villa from Bangalore to Goa. However, strange things begin to happen. Kriya gets possessed by a spirit who has unfulfilled wishes. 
Will Priya be able to save Kriya?

Saithan is a 2016 Tamil action thriller film starring Vijay Antony, Arundathi Nair, Y.G.Mahendra, Meera Krishnan and Kitty. The story revolves around Dinesh who has a psychological problem due to which he hears some voices that make him behave in a weird manner. His manager takes him to a psychiatrist who digs into his past which reveal many surprising secrets.

Dum Dum Digha Digha is the hilarious sequel of the comedy movie GutiMallar. 
After eight months of their marriage, Guti and Mallar are now in a mood to go for a honeymoon from Dum Dum to Digha. Bhatkai, with his criminal mind, finds this as an opportunity to take revenge upon his earlier insults by Guti and hires a local goon, Gharanchi Bogol to kill Guti and Mallar while they are in Digha. 
Trouble begins when the family members follow Guti and Mallar secretly to their honeymoon. The honeymoon turns into a series of hilarious events as Guti and Mallar juggle between Ghoranchi Bogol’s comedy of errors and their irritating and interfering family members.

Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - 2 is a 2012 American romantic fantasy film starring Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson and Taylor Lautner. The film was a huge success and received quite a few international awards.
The story revolves around Bella who is now a vampire, discovering her new abilities and living a peaceful life with her daughter Renesmee. However, their happiness is short-lived as Irina spreads a false news which puts the life of Renesmee and the Cullens in danger.

Paan Supari is a Bengali romantic drama starring Tathagata Mukherjee, Tumpa Das, June Mallya and Kushal Chakraborty. Sunny, a contract killer, comes across Phooltushi, a naïve girl, who escapes from a gang involved in human trafficking. Sunny helps her find a shelter and a job and they soon fall in love. However, Sunny hides his profession from Phooltushi as he fears losing her.

Shaktishaali No. 1 is a 2014 Hindi dubbed supernatural thriller film starring Duniya Vijay, Dr. Bharathi and Kalyani Raju. The story revolves around Jayamma who wants to build a temple but faces opposition from Rakthaksha, a tantrik.

Nagarahavu is a 2016 Kannada epic-fantasy film starring Ramya, Vishnuvardhan and Diganth. Naganika and her family have been guarding an ancient monument that evil Kapali has his eyes on, for years. When Kapali kills Naganika, she is reborn as Manasa, a snake woman to avenge her death.

Byomkesh O Chiriyakhana is a 2016 Bengali thriller film starring Jishu Sengupta, Saswata Chatterjee and Ushasie Chakraborty. The film is the fifth film in the Byomkesh series.
The story revolves around Byomkesh Bakshi, who now takes up the case of the murder of a retired judge, who lived in the farmhouse, in the outskirts of the city. Can Byomkesh find the real culprit?

Rekka is a 2016 Tamil action film starring Vijay Sethupathi, Lakshmi Menon and Sija Rose.

The story revolves around Shiva, who helps lovers to elope and get married. During one such incident Shiva interferes and stops the marriage of David, a gangster. As a result, David returns to seek revenge and forces Shiva to risk his life and kidnap a politician’s daughter. Will Shiva land in a bigger trouble?

Dana Kayonu is a 2016 Kannada romantic comedy starring Duniya Vijay, Priyamani and Rangayana Raghu.

The story revolves Docomo, a cattle herder, who has a rare breed of bull. His life changes when multinational companies demand for his bull in return for a huge amount.

Banjo is a 2016 Hindi musical film starring Riteish Deshmukh, Nargis Fakhri and Dharmesh Yelande. With this film, noted Marathi film director, Ravi Jadhav, forays into Hindi cinema as director.

Banjo is the story of a Taraat, a Banjo player, and his band of four friends. When Christina comes to Mumbai in search of a Banjo player she meets Taraat but he doesn’t reveal that he is a Banjo player. Taraat falls in love with Christina and finally one day she discovers that Taraat is the Banjo player that she was looking for.

Iru Mugan is a 2016 Tamil action adventure film starring Vikram, Nayanthara and Nithya Menon. The story revolves around Akhilan, an ex-RAW agent who is assigned the task to track down the culprit who is responsible for the attack on Indian Embassy in Malaysia. His investigations lead him to an old enemy named Love, who has created a hazardous drug that transforms humans into superhumans.

A Flying Jatt is a 2016 Hindi action adventure film starring Tiger Shroff and Jacqueline Fernandez. The story revolves around Aman, a meek youngster who gains superpowers. 

Malhotra, an industrialist responsible for polluting the environment, wants to acquire a piece of land that belongs to Aman’s family. He ropes in Raka, a mutant, to cut a holy tree that is present on the land, but Aman comes to its rescue. With his superpowers, can Aman stop Malhotra and Raka from polluting the environment?

Happy Bhag Jayegi is a 2016 romantic comedy starring Diana Penty, Abhay Deol, Jimmy Shergill, Ali Fazal and others. Harpreet Happy Kaur elopes with her boyfriend Guddu from her wedding to Daman Singh Bagga. She ends up in a truck heading to Lahore,  where she meets Bilal, an upcoming politician. Bagga abducts Guddu. Happy tries to get Guddu into Pakistan with Bilal’s help. Bagga and his goons reach Lahore in search of Happy. It’s a chase as Bilal tries to reunite Guddu with Happy.

Sei Meyeta is a Bengali movie revolving around the aspirations of three youngsters. 
Priyanka stays in a slum but aspires to be a successful actress. She enrolls herself in an acting class, managing her daily chores and struggles. 
Chirodeep is an engineer, working with an IT company. He joins that acting class aspiring to be an actor too. His friend, Shalini also joins that class. Will there be a love triangle? Will Priyanka and Chirodeep be together? Will Priyanka manage to become a successful actress?

Agastya is a 2016 Odia action thriller film starring Anubhav Mohanty, Jhillik Bhattacharya and Akash Dasnayak. The story revolves around Agastya who works for a drug lord after his father’s death. He is assigned all the important tasks by the drug lord, considering his capacity to remain calm under all circumstances.

Phobia is a 2016 Hindi pyschological thriller starring Radhika Apte. Mehak Deo suffers from agoraphobia. She can’t interact with people unknown to her and spends all her time in an apartment. This apartment has a history of a tenant who mysteriously disappeared. Mehak sees visions of this tenant being killed. Are these true?

Ko 2 is a 2016 Tamil political thriller starring Bobby Simha,  Prakash Raj and Nikki Galrani. 

Kumaran,  a common man,  kidnaps Tamil Nadu's chief minister Yogeeswaran. The home minister,  Thillainayagam appoints  commissioner Santhanapandian to solve this case. How will Kumaran deal with this?

Le Aaib Dulhaniya Pakistan Se is a 2016 Bhojpuri romantic drama film starring Vishal Singh, Tanu Shree Sampada, Awadhesh Mishra, Ayaz Khan and Siddhartha are in the lead role. This film is directed by Ramakant Prasad and produced by Ramdhari Singh.

Nirahua Chalal Sasural 2 is a 2016 Bhojpuri romantic action drama film starring Dinesh Lal Yadav, Amrapali Dubey and Avadhesh Mishra.  Nirahua falls in love with Rakhi and wishes to marry her, but Rakhi’s brother puts a condition that whoever wishes to marry his sister should agree to stay in his house as a son-in-law, after their marriage. Will Nirahua give up his love for Rakhi?

Raja Cheyyi Vesthe is a 2016 Telugu action drama starring Nara Rohit, Isha, Tarak Ratna, Shashank, Sivaji Raja, Rajiv Kanakala and others. While he is making a short film, an aspiring film Director sees a girl in his frame & falls in love with her. He wants to make an action film. The opportunity presents itself when a Producer asks him to write a climax scene about a don's ruthless murder. Who is this Producer? And, how is this related to a criminal Manik,  who kills people ruthlessly for money?

Sairat is a 2016 Marathi romantic drama film starring Rinku Rajguru and Akash Thosar. Directed by National Award-winning director Nagraj Manjule, it is the first Marathi film to gross over 100 crores worldwide at the box office. The story is set in interior Maharashtra where Archi, a local politician’s daughter and Parshya, a fisherman’s son fall in love resulting in violence and rise of caste hierarchy in their village.

Uyire Uyire is a 2016 Tamil action movie starring Siddhu and Hansika Motwani. Rahul meets Priya during a flight journey. Their plane gets diverted to Goa where they spend time together. They soon fall in love with each other.

Aashik Aawara is a 2016 Bhojpuri action film starring Dinesh Lal Yadav, Amrapali Dubey, Kajal Raghvani in the lead. The story is about an auto rickshaw driver who struggles with many problems to get back his girlfriend and family. Will he be able to find his family and girlfriend in this big city?

Tulasidalam is a 2016 Telugu horror film starring Nishchal Vandana Gupta,  R.P. Patnaik and more. Satvik doesn’t believe in ghosts. He accepts his friend's challenge spend a night at the cemetery. When he comes back from the cemetery,  he feels as though someone is following him. Shanti,  a little girl’s soul,  begins following him and he experiences paranormal experiences.

Mapla Singam is a 2016 Tamil romantic action drama starring Vimal and Anjali. 
Anbu and Shailaja hail from two different villages who have nurtured animosity for decades. Soon Anbu and Shailaja fall for each other. Will the two villages keep aside their differences to get the lovers married?

Bullet Rani is a 2016 Hindi dubbed action film starring Ashish Vidyarthi, Priyanka Kothari, Ravi Kale. The film is about an efficient and dutiful female cop who is a nightmare for criminals. Due to this she is frequently shifted from one place to another but she never stops doing her duty. When a political leader is killed she is called to investigate and arrest the killer. The killer's next target is going to be the Chief Minister. Will she be able to stop him?

Time Story is a 2016 Hindi dubbed sci-fi action film starring Suriya, Samantha Ruth Prabhu and Nithya Menon. The story revolves around scientist Sethuraman who invents a time machine, which his evil twin brother Athreya wants to acquire. Athreya kills Sethuraman and his wife but their son Mani escapes. Years later, when Mani grows up, he is told about his family and he must seek revenge for their sufferings.

Bhojpuria Raja is a 2016 Bhojpuri romantic drama film starring Pawan Singh and Kajal Raghavani. Raja, an illiterate boy, stays in a village with his mother. He attends a college farewell ceremony along with his friends, where he comes across Priti and falls in love with her. On reaching college to search for her, he finds out that she has left the town; will he be able to find his love?

Judhistir is a 2016 Bangla film starring Indrasish Roy, Ridhima Ghosh and Mrinal Mukherjee.
Scientist Kushal Kumar Roy invents a medicine, having which people will speak nothing but the truth. After Kushal turns mentally insane, people with ulterior motives try to get their hands on the medicine.

Nayikar Mato is a Bengali romantic drama starring Mumtaz Sorcar, Mainak Banerjee, Mahua Halder and Kaushik Banerjee. When Rani, a glamorous actress, is approached to play the role of simple housewife, she accepts the role after a lot of hesitation. While working on the project she meets Arka, a simple man, and his presence helps her to transform into a convincible housewife.

Khel Power Ka is a 2016 Hindi dubbed action thriller film starring Vishal, Catherine Tresa and Karunas. When Amudhavel returns to India from USA to marry his long-time girlfriend Meenu, he gets accused for the murder of a gangster, with whom he had a conflict in the past.

Famil Ek Deal is a 2016 Hindi dubbed action drama film starring Junior N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Rakul Preet Singh and Jagapathi Babu. A dying father tells his son Abhiram to seek revenge on the cunning man who cheated him in business, years ago. Abhiram, lays out an interesting plan to avenge his family’s sufferings.

Maduveya Mamatheya Kareyole is a 2016 Kannada romantic comedy film starring Amulya, Suraj Gowda and Ananth Nag.
The story revolves around Suraj and Khushi who are neighbours and who fall in love. Their parents decide to get them married and when everything is going fine, a small dispute creates problems in their relationship.

Manjulika Returns is a 2016 Hindi dubbed horror film starring Chandini Tamilarasan, Manoj Nandam, Allari Subhashini and Anil Kalyan. Shiva, a struggling actor, gets a lead role in a movie, however, when the shooting commences, the crew begins to experience paranormal activities on the set.

Supreme is a 2016 Telugu action drama film starring Sai Dharam Tej and Raashi Khanna.

The story revolves around Narayan Rao’s charitable trust, which is under threat from Vikram, a crime boss, who wants to occupy the land. Narayan Rao reaches Hyderabad to find the original owners of the land but is attacked by Vikram’s men, but he is saved by Balu, a tax-driver. After knowing the entire story, Balu decides to help Narayan in this case.

Wedding Pullav is a 2015 Hindi romantic comedy starring Diganth, Anushka Ranjan, Sonalli Sehgall. Two best friends are in love with each other but are unaware of it. Their confusion reaches its peak when the boy is getting married. The girl doesn't like his bride whom she had earlier praised. When the boy sees his best friend with her boyfriend he feels jealous.
Loadshedding is a 2015 Bengali drama film starring Animesh Bhaduri, Bidipta Chakraborty and Amrita Chattopadhyay. The film is directed by Soukarya Ghosal.

Bengal Tiger is a 2015 Hindi dubbed romantic action film starring Ravi Teja, Tamannaah and Boman Irani. The story revolves around Aakash, a simple guy who aspires to be famous. To fulfil his desire, he targets politicians and makes their daughters fall in love with him. Will Aakash succeed in his plan?

Super Rakshak is a 2015 Hindi dubbed film starring Sri Murali, Rachita Ram, P. Ravi Shankar and Charan Raj. When gangster Manikantha aspires to become the chief minister, he enlists Rathavara, his close-aide to kill Mangalamukhi, a transgender. Can Rathavara accomplish the given task?

Sankarabharanam is a 2015 Telugu crime comedy film starring Nikhil Siddharth, Nanditha Raj and Anjali. Sankarabharanam is a 2015 Indian Telugu-language crime comedy film written by Kona Venkat and the directorial debut of Uday Nandanavanam. It is produced by MVV Sathyanarayana under the Banner MVV Cinema. The music is composed by Praveen Lakkaraju and cinematography is by Richard Prasad and the film editing by A. Sreekar Prasad. The film was a remake of 2010 Hindi film Phas Gaye Re Obama.

Fighter No. 1 is a 2015 Hindi dubbed romantic action film starring Dhananjay, Kruthika Jayakumar and Rangayana Raghu. The story revolves around a boxer who falls in love with a visually impaired girl. They both are orphans and he tries his best to help her gain her vision.

Mumbai Pune Mumbai 2 is a 2015 romantic drama starring Swapnil Joshi, Mukta Barve and others. Gautam and Gauri's wedding preparations are on in full swing. Their families are thrilled with this union. But, the twist is that Gauri is still not sure whether she wants to go ahead and turn her relationship with Gaurav into marriage. Some misunderstandings between them led to this confusion in Gauri's mind. On the other hand, Gautam has made up his mind that he wants to marry Gauri and is ready for big day.

Tripura is a 2015 Hindi dubbed horrror action film starring Swathi Reddy and Naveen Chandra. Tripura gets strange visions of stabbing her doctor husband. A police officer tells her that the doctor murdered a girl and will kill her. Tripura stabs him in reality, in self-defense. But soon we know that the officer murdered the girl. What happens when the girl’s ghost comes back?

Muqabla is a 2015 Bhojpuri action film starring Pawan Singh, Tanushree Chatterjee and Pakki Hegde in the lead. The story is of an army officer whose father was killed by the village minister due to land dispute. Will he be able to seek revenge for his father’s death?

Sangram is a 2015 Bhojpuri action drama film starring Pavan Singh and Viraj Bhatt in the lead. The story is about two brothers, Pavan and Kishan. Pavan is a farmer and looks after his family dutifully, however, due to some misunderstanding, Kishan separates from his brother Pavan and takes up crime. Will Pavan help Kishan in leaving the criminal world and getting back to a normal life?

Raja Saheb Ka Kamra is a 2015 Hindi dubbed horror film starring Ashwin Babu, Chethan Cheenu and Dhanya Balakrishna. A TV channel decides to host a reality show at a haunted house of Nandigama. Seven youngsters participate, and they soon witness paranormal activities around them. Will they ever find the truth about the haunted house that once belonged to a king.

Bruce Lee: The Fighter is a 2015 Telugu action drama film starring Ram Charan, Rakul Preet Singh and Kriti Kharbanda. 
The story revolves around Karthik, a stuntman, who saves Riya from an accident, while being dressed as a police man for a shoot. Riya mistakes him to be a real police officer and Karthik too hides his identity, as he falls in love with her. When and how will Karthik reveal his identity? (Brother sister IAS)

Katthukutty is a 2015 Tamil romantic comedy starring Narain and Srushti Dange. 
The story revolves around Arivazhagan who is a carefree young man. Arivagazhan falls in love with Bhuvana.One day he gets a chance to contest elections. Will he accept it?

Jazbaa is a 2015 Hindi crime drama film starring Aishwarya Rai, Irrfan Khan, Shabana Azmi and Sachin Joshi.
Criminal lawyer Anuradha Verma’s daughter goes missing and the kidnapper persuades her to defend a convict. Anuradha seeks help from suspended police officer, Yohan, who is also a friend. Will Anuradha and Yohan manage to save the daughter and also get the criminal punished?

Rudramadevi is a 2015 Hindi dubbed action drama film starring Anushka Shetty, Allu Arjun, Rana Daggubati and Vikramjeet Virk. King Ganapatideva raises his daughter Rudramadevi as a boy so that his people accept her as the heir to the throne. Rudramadevi grows up and gets the opportunity to prove her bravery and intelligence when the kingdom is attacked by enemies.

Kirumi is a 2015 Tamil thriller drama starring Kathir and Reshmi Menon.

A young man who is jobless becomes a police informer. He uses this opportunity to settle scores with a bar owner who had ill-treated him in the past. While police arrest the bar owner,  he swears vengeance against the informer.

The Real Tiger is a 2011 Hindi dubbed action film starring Mahesh Babu, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Prakash Raj and Sonu Sood. Ajay, an undercover cop, sets out to nab international don Nayak who had who had attacked his father years ago. When Ajay’s father comes out of coma, Ajay must recreate the good old days to save his father’s life, while continuing the hunt for Nayak.

Bonolota is a 2015 Bengali horror film starring Soumyo Mukherjee, Susmita Dey, Angshuman Parasar and Debdut Ghosh. 
The story revolves around a newly married couple who go on trip to a deserted house along with their camera. However, their trip goes terribly wrong, when they realise that the house is haunted.

Kenda Sampige is 2015 Kannada romantic drama film starring Vikky, Manvitha Harish and Chandrashekar S.The story revolves around Ravindra, who works as an attendant and falls in love with his employer’s daughter Gowri. However, trouble begins when Ravindra gets booked for a drug case and escapes from jail. While on the run, Gowri joins him and together they try to prove his innocence.

Jigarwala No.1 is a 2015 Hindi dubbed action comedy film starring Ravi Teja, Rakul Preet Singh and Ravi Kishan. The story revolves around Robin Hood, son of Kalyan, who unlike his father prefers comfort over kick. When Robin comes to India to start a hospital, he meets Chaitra and falls in love with her. He follows her to her village in Bihar to find his kick, that he was evading all these years.

The Real Tevar is a 2015 Telugu action drama film dubbed in Hindi with Mahesh Babu and Shruti Haasan in the lead. The story revolves around Harsha Vardhan, a multi-millionaire, who feels a sense of void in his life, despite having all the luxuries. To fill the void, he adopts a village and starts developing it. Meanwhile, he falls in love with Chaaruseela, but she leaves him upon realising his true identity.

Khelaghar is a 2015 Bengali romantic film starring Pulokita Ghosh, Krishna Kishore, Pallavi Chatterjee and Sudip Mukherjee. 
The story revolves around a woman who is disturbed for not being able to have a baby. She builds a doll house by collecting different kinds of dolls, to get rid of her loneliness. She also feels insecure about her professor husband, whenever any girl approached him for private coaching.

Ebhabeo Phire Asha Jay is a 2015 Bengali romantic comedy film starring Rimjhim Mitra, Anirban Bhattacharya, Anusuya Roy Chowdhury and Biswajit Chakraborty.
The story revolves around a young married couple who invite their parents, a widowed mother and a bohemian father to live with them. Their presence creates trouble in the lives of the couple.

Monihara is a 2015 Bengali thriller drama starring Biswanath Basu, Arghyadeep Chatterjee and Biplab Chatterjee. Monideepa is married to Arun Chowdhury. A strange letter is found and Monideepa disappears. Arun seeks the help of a private investigator, Rudrajit Roy who was a former CBI officer. But the story is not as simple as it seems. The CBI officer starts looking into the strange disappearance of Monideepa and also comes across some eerie situations during the investigation.
A New Year's eve fight with Richa turns into a nightmare for Sada and his friends when they start getting threatening calls. Things turn worse when Sada wishes to apologise for his brashness.

Pandaga Chesko is 2015 Telugu action drama film starring Ram, Rakul Preet Singh and Sonal Chauhan.
The story revolves around Karthik, a young business tycoon from Portugal, who is engaged to Anuskha. When his company in India is shut down by an environment activist, Divya, he comes to India and falls in love with her. How will Karthik solve all his personal and professional problems?

Ishqedarriyaan is a 2015 romantic film starring Mahaakshay Chakraborty and Evelyn Sharma. 
The story revolves around Luvleen, a young teacher, who wants to raise funds for her grandfather's school. She comes across Aagam, a millionaire and they becomes friends. Aagam loves Luvleen but she is attracted to Arjun, a musician. As Aagam loves Luvleen unconditionally so he decides to help her achieve her dream.

Tanu Weds Manu Returns is a 2015 romantic drama film starring Kangana Ranaut, R. Madhavan, Jimmy Shergill and Deepak Dobriyal. The film is a sequel to the superhit 2011 film from the same cast and crew.

Four years into marriage, Tanu and Manu decide to part ways and return to India. While Tanu is still unsure about her future, Manu decides to marry Kusum, a look alike of Tanu. How will Tanu and Manu’s relationship conclude, and will they ever realise their mistake?

Kshatriya The Fighter is a 2015 Hindi dubbed action comedy film starring Sudheer Babu, Nandini Rai and Abhimanyu Singh. Krish, a small-time con man falls in love with Janaki. Trouble begins when Krish crosses path with Rudra, a smuggler who deals in precious religious idols stolen from Ayodhya.

Ekti Bangali Bhooter Goppo is a 2015 Bengali thriller film starring Joya Ahsan, Joydip Mukherjee and Sourav Chakraborty. Unhappy with her married life, Amrita gets into a relationship with Roni. One day, Amrita accidentally kills her husband Anirban and since the n is haunted by his ghost. Can she overcome this trauma, or will she commit suicide?

India Pakistan is a Tamil romantic comedy film starring Vijay Antony and Sushma Raj. Two lawyers Melina and Karthick share a common office due to financial troubles. They get into a lot of fights with each other with one trying to prove themselves more superior than the other. For the sake of two young lovers from the village they visit Melina decides to face the person who is causing the couple's trouble and gets caught. Karthick saves her and they both confess their feelings for each other.

Maggie is a 2015 American horror drama film directed by Henry Robson. Written by John Scott 3, the film stars Arnold Schwarzenegger and Abigail Breslin.
As society struggles to cope with the zombie apocalypse, a caring father searches for his daughter infected with the virus. Despite her warning, he finds her and decides to bring her home and care for her till she is quarantined. The film showcases the close bond shared by a father and daughter even in the face of adversity.

Timepass 2 is a 2015 love story starring Priya Bapat, Priyadarshan Jadhav, Nayan Jhadav and others. It is the sequel of hit film Timepass released in 2014. Timepass 2 also tells the story of Dagadu and Prajakta. Both have now grown up and yearn for their teenage love. But was it just timapass or did it mean something more? When they meet they discover that it was indeed more than just a timepass. But they will have to cross many hurdles before they can be united.

Danny Collins is a 2015 American comedy drama film starring Al Pacino, Annette Bening and Jennifer Garner. It was nominated for the Golden Globe Award for Best Actor at the 2016 Golden Globe Awards.

Danny Collins is inspired by the true story of folk singer Steve Tilston, who discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon. The film tells the story of Danny Collins, an aging rocker who rediscovers his love for music, his family and life, after reading the letter.

NH10 is a 2015 Hindi thriller film starring Anushka Sharma, Neil Bhoopalam, Darshan Kumar and Deepti Naval. 
While on a weekend trip, Meera and Arjun witness a young couple being attacked by a gang somewhere along National Highway 10. Arjun tries to intervene but faces the wrath of the gang. Can Meera save herself and seek revenge on the gang.

Badlapur is a 2015 Hindi crime thriller starring Varun Dhawan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Yami Gautam, Radhika Apte and Huma Qureshi. A brilliant script, backed by outstanding performances makes Badlapur a must watch.
Raghu is a happily married man whose wife and son are accidentally killed during a bank robbery. Out of the two robbers, Liak is arrested but his partner escapes with the loot. An enraged Raghu waits patiently for years to find Liak’s partner and avenge his family’s death. With passing years, Raghu turns more dangerous and unpredictable.

DK is a 2015 Kannada comedy action film starring Prem, Chaitra Chandranath, Sharath Lohitashwa and Sunny Leone. DK is a street-smart man who has never lost a bet, while Subbulakshmi is a politician’s daughter who too is also quick witted. What happens when the two cross paths?

Baji is a 2015 Marathi superhero film starring Shreyas Talpade and Amruta Khanvilkar in lead roles. The film is based on the legend of Baji who takes it upon himself to protect the common people against oppression and injustice. Being a messiah for the people in his village Baji stops a wicked villager named Martand, who is greedy to find the treasure hidden under the village. Baji's sword, his bow-arrow and his white stallion are his trademark and define him as Baji.

Rahasya is a 2015 Hindi mystery thriller starring Kay Kay Menon, Ashish Vidyarthi and Tisca Chopra. The film is inspired from the high profile Aarushi murder case.
Rahasya revolves around the story of Ayesha, an 18-year-old girl, who is found murdered in her own house. CBI officer investigates the case where the prime suspect is the girl’s father.

Jala Dunga is a 2015 Hindi dubbed action thriller film starring Bharath Srinivasan, Meera Chopra and Vivek. Dharani, a brave young man, gives refuge to Anjali who flees from home to avoid marriage to her evil uncle. However, Dharani’s help lands him and his family into trouble with Anjali’s notorious family.

I is a 2015 action thriller film starring Vikram, Amy Jackson, Suresh Gopi and Upen Patel. Lingesan, a local bodybuilder, falls in love with Diya and accidentally enters the world of modelling. His growing popularity and righteousness threatens a few and they decide to make his life hell. Can Lingesan bounce back and seek revenge on his enemies?

Ajana Batas is a 2015 Bengali drama starring Paoli Dam,  Kaushik Sen,  Shankar Chakraborty and others. Deepa,  a copywriter, lives in the city,  away from her Ranaghat home town. She stays with her uncle,  Kakamoni and is very close to him. They share a unique bond of friendship. Soon,  she can hear voices calling out to her but she’s not able to tell her uncle about this.

Kartoos - The Target is a 2015 crime drama film starring Nani,  Catherine Tresa,  Siddhika Sharma and others. An Andhra Pradesh Cabinet Minister by the name of Kalamoorthy is removed from his post one day. The Central Bureau of Investigation manages to prove his involvement with the Liquor Mafia. As a result of this,  the Election Commission of India declares the first by-election after the main elections of that term in the Minister's constituency.

Size Zero is a 2015 Telugu romantic comedy film starring Arya, Anushka Shetty and Prakash Raj.
The story revolves around Soundarya, an overweight girl, who loves Abhishek but her dreams are shattered when she finds that Abhishek loves Simran. Accepting the fact that her weight is the issue, Soundarya joins a weight loss centre but soon finds the side effects of such programmes. Will Soundarya give up or would she continue to pursue Abhishek?

Shivam is a 2015 Hindi dubbed action comedy film starring Ram Pothineni and Rashi Khanna. Shiva loves Tanu but Bhojireddy and Abhi are the two obstacles in his love life. How will Shiva overcome all the obstacles and make his love affair a success?

Kader Kuler Bou is a 2015 Bengali action drama film starring Konnenica Banerjee, Sudipta and Arindam Sil. 
The film revolves around two strong willed women who break the stereotypes and live life on their terms. Rukhsar, a hapless woman, transforms into a beautiful woman and controls the men in her life. While Lajuk, a God-fearing girl, takes a firm stand against social evils. Can the women achieve gender parity in this male dominant world?

Srimanthudu is a 2015 Telugu action drama film starring Mahesh Babu and Shruti Haasan. The film was a huge hit in south.

The story revolves around Harsha Vardhan, a multi-millionaire, who feels a sense of void in his life, despite having all the luxuries. To fill the void, he adopts a village and starts developing it. Meanwhile, he falls in love with Chaaruseela, but she leaves him upon realising his true identity. Will Harsha understand the history behind his family and the village?

Lingaa is a 2014 action film starring Rajinikanth, Anushka Shetty, Sonakshi Sinha and others. While inspecting a dam in a village, a PWD inspector is killed by a corrupt politician who wants to destroy the dam.

The dying inspector throws a pen drive containing the politician's evil plan,  into a closed temple. The temple can only be opened by the descendant of Raja Lingeswaran who built the dam as well as the Shiva temple. Who is the descendant? Will he come?

Glamour is a 2014 Bengali thriller drama film starring Parambrato Chattopadhyay, Parno Mitra and Sabyasachi Chakraborty in lead roles. 
Aryan, owner of a fashion magazine is arrested in a false case. This adversely affects his business, personal life and dignity. The only person who believes in his innocence is Riya, a TV journalist, who helps Aryan prove his innocence by searching for Pinakesh, his old professor and lawyer. Will Aryan win the fight against his adversaries and get revenge on the people who falsely accused him?

The Imitation Game is a 2014 American historical thriller drama starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley and Matthew Goode. The film was a critical and commercial success and received eight nominations at the 87th Academy Awards.
The film is a biography on the life of Alan Turing, a British cryptanalyst, who must form a team of cryptographers to decode German intelligence codes for the British government, during WW II.

Happy Ending is a 2014 romantic comedy starring Saif Ali Khan, Ileana D’Cruz, Kalki Koechlin and Govinda.

Yudi suffers from a writer’s block and seeks inspiration by getting romantically involved with Aanchal, a best seller author. However, Aanchal is commitment phobic and leaves Yudi. Sunk in depression, Yudi finally manages to overcome the block and write again. Will Yudi and Aanchal ever reunite?
Kkoli is a 2014 romantic Drama film starring Locket Chatterjee, Tulika Basu, Rita Koiral and Chandan Sen.

Love, Rosie is a 2014 British romantic comedy film starring Lily Collins and Sam Claflin. It is based on the 2014 novel Where Rainbows End by Irish author Cecelia Ahern.

Love, Rosie is the story of Alex and Rosie, best friends since childhood but worst enemies when it comes to love. A modern comedy-of-errors tale, it follows Alex and Rosie as they go from being best friends to heading in different directions only to find their paths back to one another.

Himmatwar is a 2014 Tamil action drama film starring Vishal, Shruti Haasan and Sathyaraj.

The story revolves around Vasu, a moneylender, who saves the life of policeman Sivaraman and his wife, who are attacked by gangster Thaandavam’s men. This irks Thaandavam and his goons try to eliminate Vasu and his family. Can Vasu save himself and his family members?

John Wick is a 2014 American action thriller film starring Keanu Reeves, Willem Dafoe and Michael Nyqvist. The film was critically acclaimed and was a box-office hit.
John Wick is the story of John, an ex-hitman, who seeks revenge on a group of Russian gangsters who destroyed everything that he had. A vengeful John is forced to come out of retirement to eliminate his enemies.

Fury is a 2014 American war film starring Brad Pitt and Logan Lerman. The film was a box-office hit and received a couple of nominations at some of the top International film festivals.
Fury is a story set in 1945, during WWII. Sergeant Don 'Wardaddy' sets out on a dangerous mission with a five men crew. When Norman, a rookie soldier, acts soft on the enemies, Don tries to harden him, bringing forth harsh realities of a war.

Kill the Messenger is a 2014 American crime drama film starring Jeremy Renner. It is based on the alleged role of the CIA in importing cocaine into the USA.

Kill the Messenger is based on the true story of journalist Gary Webb and his uncovering of the CIA secretly funding the Nicaraguan Contra rebels by importing cocaine and sale of crack. The film traces the immense pressure put on Webb to stay away and the subsequent smear campaign questioning his integrity.

Tamanchey is a 2014 romantic crime drama film starring Nikhil Dwivedi, Richa Chadha and Damandeep Singh. Munna, a small-time criminal and Babu, a gangster's girlfriend, escape from police custody. On the run, Babu is looking to return to Rana, her boyfriend but Munna falls in love with her. Will Munna's love for Babu, remain one-sided?

Romeo is a 2014 Hindi drama starring Sairam Shankar, Adonika, Ravi Teja. This is a dubbed film. Kittu meets an Indian expat girl Samantha in Rome. He falls in love with her. Is it that he loves Samantha because she is the lookalike of a girl he loved in the past? But Samantha loves another man.

Mumbai Tyson is a 2014 Hindi dubbed romantic drama film starring Dhruva Sarja, Radhika Pandit and P. Ravi Shankar. The story revolves around Ashok, who falls in love with Anjali but trouble begins when Anjali’s father fixes her marriage to another boy. Can Ashok win over Anjali and her family?

Encounter Shankar is a 2014 Hindi action comedy starring Mahesh Babu, Tammannaah and Sonu Sood. 
The story revolves around Shankar, an encounter specialist, who uses unconventional methods to bring criminals to justice. He is transferred to a village to stop Damodar, a crime boss, from building a hazardous power plant. Can Shankar foil Damodar’s plans and save the environment?

Vaanavarayan Vallavarayan is a 2014 Tamil romantic comedy starring  Krishna Kulasekaran,  Monal Gajjar,  Ma Ka Pa Anand and Niharika Kareer. Vaanavarayan and Vallavarayan are two carefree brothers. Vaanavarayan falls in love with Anjali. However her parents reject the alliance following a spat between Anjali’s father and Vallavarayan. Anjali leaves Vaanavarayan as he doesn’t want to throw his brother for his love. This makes Vallavarayan to help his brother in reuniting with Anjali.

Life of Crime is a 2013 American crime comedy film starring Jennifer Aniston and Yasiin Bey. The film is an adaption of Elmore Leonard’s novel ‘The Switch’.

Life of Crime is the story of Mickey Dawson, wife of a rich real estate developer, who gets kidnapped by two fumbling ex-cons. Things get complicated when the husband refuses to pay the ransom and the kidnappers have to find a way out of the problem.

Salim is a 2014 Tamil thriller starring Vijay Antony, Aksha Pardasany. This is a dubbed film. Salim is a simple and dedicated doctor. Nisha falls from him. But his patiens always come first. Salim goes for a party that Nisha invites him. On the way he stops to help a rape victim and can't reach the party. Nisha breaks up with him. His charitable ways get him into deeper trouble.

Lekhu Lekhu Lekhi Deli is a 2014 Odiya romantic drama film starring Babushan, Jhilik Bhattacharya and Aparajita Mohanty. The story revolves around Amrita, a young girl, who meets Ajay through social media. They exchange messages and soon their friendship culminates into love. Trouble begins when Aparajita’s parents fix her marriage with someone else.

Geethanjali is a 2014 Telugu Comedy Horror Film, Directed by Raj Kiran, and Srinivas Reddy, Anjali (Dual Role), Rao Ramesh are in the lead roles. 
Ramesh Rao is a Businessman, and having his own company. Geetha is his employee. He is a womanizer and tries to trap her. Srinivas is a enthusiastic film writer and director approaches Ramesh Rao to produce a film with his. While Srinivas narrating a stroy, Ramesh Rao realizes that, he is narrating a story about Ramesh Rao. What happened to Geetha and what Ramesh Rao did with her? Who is the Ghost? ..is rest of the story.

Yeh Kaisi Anhoni is a 2014 Hindi horror film directed by Ram Gopal Varma and stars Navdeep and Tejaswi Madivada. A young girl decides to skip her cousin’s wedding and spend time with her boyfriend at her new home, which unfortunately turns out to be haunted.

Lai Bhaari is a 2014 Marathi action drama film starring Riteish Deshmukh, Radhika Apte and Tanvi Azmi.  This film marks the debut of Riteish Deshmukh in the Marathi film industry and went on to become the highest-grossing Marathi film of the year.
Lai Bhari revolves around Sumitra, a childless woman, who becomes a mother after praying to Lord Vithoba in Pandharpur. Years later, after the death of her son Prince, she returns to Pandharpur and finds Mauli, a lookalike of Prince.

Vadacurry is a 2014 Tamil romantic comedy thriller starring Jai and Swathi Reddy. Sathish, a medical representative,  lives with his autorickshaw driver. Sathish's friends make fun of him for using a simple mobile phone. This compels him to pick a phone left at a tea stall. The phone belongs to a smuggler and lands Sathish in trouble.

The Road Within is a 2014 American film starring Robert Sheehan, Dev Patel and Zoe Kravitz. It is a remake of Vincent Wants to Sea, a 2010 German film and is written and directed by Gren Wells.
Vincent a young man suffers from Tourette Syndrome and is mourning the loss of his mother. Along with Marie, his anorexic friend, they kidnap Alex, his OCD roommate and escape the clinic to go on a road trip to scatter his mother’s ashes in the ocean.

Yaamiruka Bayamey is a 2014 Tamil Horror comedy film starring Kreshna, Rupa Manjari, Karuna, Oviya and Anaswara Kumar. Kiran,  a television telemarketer discovers that his father left a bunglow for him in a small town. Kiran with his girlfriend Smitha seeks help from local caretaker Karunakaran and his sister Saranya to convert the bunglow into hotel

Maanikya is a 2014 Hindi dubbed action drama film starring Sudeep V. Ravichandran, Varalaxmi Sharathkumar and Ranya Rao. Vijay and Manasa are from rival families. She falls in love with him but he loves Sindhu. Vijay hides his identity to take revenge on Manasa’s family. A feud ensues but is stopped when her uncle challenges Vijay. Will he accept it?

Vaayai moodi pesavum is a 2014 romantic comedy drama starring Dulquer Salman and Nazriya Nazim. The story revolves around Aravindh works as a sales representative. Anjali,  a junior doctor,  lives with her parents and has a boyfriend Vinodh who controls her. Arvind meets Anjali and falls for her without knowing about Vinodh's existence in her life. Will he be able to win Anjali's love?

Prathinidhi is a 2014 political action thriller, starring Nara Rohith, Shubra Aiyappa, and directed by Prashanth Mandava. The story about A mysterious figure, who calls himself as 'The Common Man', kidnaps the Chief Minister of the state and threatens to murder him unless his demands are met.

Oru Kanniyum Moonu Kalavaanigalum is a 2014 Tamil comedy starring Arulnithi,  Bindumadhavi and Bagavathi Perumal. Three friends Tamil,  Malar and Esakki plans to kidnap Tamil’s girlfriend Isabella. With a suddden turn of events,  Tamil meets Lord Shiva in the worldly form. Lord Shiva shows him the same kidnapping in three scenarios.

The Amazing Spider-Man 2 is a 2014 action adventure film starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Fox and Dane DeHaan. While Peter Parker continues to fight crime and protect the people, Harry Osborn succeeds his father as the CEO of OsCorp. Can Spider-Man eliminate all the danger associated with OsCorp, once and for all?
Bhoot Bhooture Somuddure is a 2014 Bengali children's film based on a short story by Prafulla Roy.

Veerudokkade is a 2014 released Telugu flim directed by Siva,  Starring Ajithkumar,  Tamannaah,  Nasser,  Vitharth,  Santhanam,  Atul Kulkarni,  Pradeep Rawat. Veerendra is a simple and hard working business man and has four brothers whom he is fond of very much. He dosent marry to avoid problems between brothers. Brother request Gautami to woo Veerendra,  and in the process falls in love with him.

Daring Mard is a 2014 Hindi dubbed film starring Jayam Ravi, Amala Paul, Sarath Kumar, Soori and Nassar. Aravindan, an IT professional is against corruption. He forms a team with his girlfriend and friends. They expose 147 officials including a MP and a court judge. But the corrupt officials are planning something against him. Will he be able to protect his team.

Total Siyaapa is a 2014 Hindi comedy-drama film starring Ali Zafar and Yami Gautam.
The story revolves around young couple settled in London. Aman, a Pakistani musician loves Asha, an Indian Punjabi woman. Chaos begins when Asha invites Aman to her home to meet her crazy Punjabi family. Will Asha's parents accept a Pakistani son-in-law?

Main Hoon Fighter Baadshah is the Hindi dubbed title of Ugramm, a 2014 Kannada action thriller. It stars Srimurali and Haripriya. Agastya is horrified to see the girls in Mughor being raped in front of villagers. He fights against the goons who are doing this. The goons alert their local don and he launches an offensive against him. Agastya falls in love with Nita. But now he has to fight the system.

Idhu Kadhirvelan Kaadhal is a 2014 Tamil romantic comedy film starring Udhayanidhi Stalin and Nayanthara. The story revolves around Kathir, a devotee of Lord Anjaneya who stays away from women. During his stay in Coimbatore, Kathir falls in love with Pavithra but discovers that she already is in a relationship with Gautham, who is a crook. Can Kathir protect Pavithra and win her love?

Golapi Golapi is a 2014 Odia romantic drama film starring Amlan Das and Riya Dey in the lead. The story revolves around Prem, a happy-go-lucky man, who likes to help people with the issues they face in their love lives. Join his journey, as this love guru deal with problems of love.

Sangharsh is a 2014 Marathi political film starring Rajesh Shringarpure, Sangeeta Kapure and Prajakta Mali. The story takes place in Gunaji Chawl where three best friends have grown up. Bhau, the karate black belt champ, Manya who dreams of winning a dance reality show and Tavlya the resident wisecrack and joker of the chawl. Life takes a twist when the trio get involved with some goons and soon they are dragged into the murky underbelly of politics, mafia and corrupt police. What can they do?

Pune via Bihar is an Marathi romantic film released in 2014. It stars Bharat Jadav, Umesh Kamat and Mrunmayee Deshpande. 

A politician in Bihar tries to get his daughter married off to the son of an ally; for his selfish benefits. She however decides to elope to unite with her lover. In this struggle, she gets aided by a trusted college friend. The story revolves around the struggle of the lovers to unite surpassing all differences and difficulties.

Rummy is a 2014 Tamil romantic thriller drama film,  starring Inigo Prabhakaran ,  Gayathri, Iyswarya Rajesh and Vijay Sethupathi. Sakthi and Joseph join government college and fall in love with two sisters Meenakshi and Aishwarya. When the girls' family learns about their affairs,  they start opposing them. They can go to any extent for their family honour.

Lone Survivor is a 2013 American biographical war thriller film starring Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch and Eric Bana. It is based on the 2007 non-fiction book of the same name written by Marcus Luttrell with Patrick Robinson.
Lone Survivor is the story of Navy SEAL Marcus Luttrell and his team as they set out on a mission to capture or kill Taliban leader Ahmad Shah. They are faced with numerous obstacles and are left to fight for their lives in one of modern warfare’s most valiant efforts.

Timepass is a 2014 Marathi romantic film starring Prathamesh Parab and Ketaki Mategaonkar. The film was the highest grossing film of 2014.
Timepass revolves around Dagdu, a mischievous teen, who falls in love with Prajakta. However, when Prajakta’s parents realise about their closeness they try to keep them apart. Will the innocent ever lovers unite in love?

Rege is 2014 Marathi crime drama starring Aaroha Velankar, Mahesh Manjrekar and Pushkar Shrotri.
The story revolves around Anirudh Rege, an MBBS student whose father is a respected doctor. Disinterested in medical studies, Rege gets inspired by the life of M Bhai, a gangster and decides to join his gang. However, he soon witnesses the dark side of underworld when he falls in the trap on encounter specialists, Pradeep Sharma and Sachin Waze.
During a trip, Aaron falls in love Kayal, but she doesn’t reciprocate. After they part ways, Kayal starts missing him. Will destiny bring them together?

Akhire Akhire is a 2013 Odia romantic drama film starring Babushan, Jhilik Bhattacharya and Siddhanta Mahapatra. The story revolves around Shiva whose acts of mischief make him lose his parents and sister. He even attacks his sister’s fiancé on learning about their relationship. On realizing his mistake, he helps his sister find reconcile with her fiance.

Mahabharat is a 2013 Hindi animated mythological drama film based on the epic Mahabharata. 
Amitabh Bachchan, Ajay Devgn, Vidya Balan, Sunny Deol, Anil Kapoor, Jackie Shroff and Manoj Bajpayee have lent their voices to the lead characters in the film.

Shravani Subramanya is a 2013 Kannada romantic comedy film starring Ganesh and Amulya.

The story revolves around Subramanya, an aspiring singer, who dreams of making it big. He comes across Shravani who loves Sudeep. However, when Shravani finds that Sudeep is a thug, she attempts to escape from his clutches and Subramanya helps her in her attempt.

Madhayanai Koottam is a 2013 Tamil action drama film starring Oviya and Kathir. A family where the first and second wife of a man named Jaikodi have constant problems. The children of the second wife, Parthiban and Prema, are kept from their father's funeral. And during the 16th-day ceremony, Parthiban accidentally kills his brother's cousin. He flees to Kerala where his love interest lives. He returns back learning about his mother's death and is also killed.

Endrendum Punagai is a 2013 Tamil romantic comedy film starring Jiiva, Trisha, Santhanam and Vinay Rai.

The story revolves around friends, Gautham, Baby and Sri, who make a pact to remain bachelor forever. However, Baby and Sri have a change of heart and they get married, leaving Gautham alone. While working on a project, Gautham meets Priya, they become good friends and Gautham falls in love with her. Will Gautham too break the pact like his friends?

American Hustle is a 2013 American crime-drama film starring Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Bradley Cooper and Jennifer Lawrence. It is loosely inspired by ABSCAM, the FBI operation of the late 1970s and early 1980s. 

The movie opened to wide critical acclaim and received ten Oscar nominations. It was successful at the box-office too. American Hustle is the story of two con artists who are forced by an FBI agent to participate in a sting operation to nab corrupt politicians.

Her is a 2013 American romantic sci-fi drama film written, produced and directed by Spike Jonze. The movie won the Best Original Screenplay at the 86th Academy Awards and 71st Golden Globe Awards. It is Jonze’s first movie as a screenwriter.

Her tells the story of an introverted and depressed writer who develops an unlikely relationship with a talking operating system (OS) named Samantha. He is fascinated with the artificial intelligence and her ability to learn and understand.

Bhajarangi is a 2013 Kannada adventure film starring Shivrajkumar, Aindrita Ray, and Madhu Guruswamy. 
A cruel Tantrik harasses the people of Ramadurga. When Jeevan, comes to the village to learn about his ancestors, he ends up bravely opposes him and fights to save the villagers.
Something Something is a Bengali dubbed Odia romantic comedy film. Directed by Sudhakar Vasanth, it has Anubhav Mohanty and Barsha Priyadarshini in the lead roles.

Thagaraaru is a 2013 Hindi action drama starring Arulnithi, Poorna, Jayaprakash. This is a dubbed film. Four petty thieves are like brothers. Through a series of events they find the most notorious man in Madurai to be their enemy. The story takes an unexpected turn when one of the four friends is murdered. The rest of them set out to find the killer and take revenge for their friend's death.

Out Of The Furnace is a 2013 American thriller directed by Scott Cooper. Starring Christian Bale, Casey Affleck as brothers, the film is produced by Ridley Scott and Leonardo DiCaprio.
Based in Pennsylvania, the film revolves around Russell and Rodney, two brothers who find it difficult adjusting to civilian life. Things become worse when Russell lands in prison and Rodney gets himself involved with one of the most violent gangs in the Northeast.

The Armstrong Lie is 2013 American documentary film starring Lance Armstrong in the lead. It highlights the life and journey of cyclist Lance Armstrong who was banned from the competition for lifetime due to a doping investigation result that stripped off his seven Tour De France titles from him.

All Is Lost is a 2013 American survival drama film written and directed by J.C. Chandor. The film stars Robert Redford as the lead character who is lost at sea.

On a solo voyage in the Indian Ocean, Redford’s unnamed character wakes up to find water flooding his 39-foot boat, after colliding with a floating shipping container on the high seas. Dependent on nautical maps, he must use his mariner’s intuition to reach safety against an unrelenting sun and circling sharks to find a passing shipping vessel.

Case No. 18/9 is a 2013 Kannada thriller film starring Nirnajan Shetty, Sindhu Lokanath and Abhishek.
The story revolves around Lakshmi, a maid, who loves Madeva and Kavya, a student, who loves Sandy. When Sandy tries to fool Kavya and take her inappropriate pictures, Kavya deserts him. An infuriated Sandy tries to take revenge on Kavya but ends up hurting Lakshmi. Will Sandy be punished for this?

movietitle: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs 2
description: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs 2 is a 2013 American animated film with voiceovers from Bill Hader, Bridget Hoffman and Anna Faris. In this sequel Flint finds out that his infamous food machine is in use and is producing harmful food-animal hybrids that can destroy the world. Flint and his friends set out to destroy the machine and save mankind.

6 Candles is a 2013 Tamil crime thriller starring Shaam and Poonam Kaur. Ram, a young software engineer leads a simple life with his wife Lizzy and son Gautham. One day, Gautham gets lost on a beach. Ram's search for his son takes him to a child trafficker in Bhopal. Despite numerous difficulties, Ram refuses to give up. Will he be able to find Gautham?

Prisoners is a 2013 American crime thriller film starring Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal and Viola Davis. The movie received critical and financial success and was nominated for Best Cinematography at the 86th Academy Awards.

Prisoners focuses on the abduction of two young girls and the subsequent search by the police for the abductor. Lack of evidence forces the police to release a suspect, the father of one of the missing girls, who decides to take matters into his own hands.

Phata Poster Nikla Hero is a 2013 Hindi action comedy film starring Shahid Kapoor, Ileana D’Cruz Padmini Kolhapure, Darshan Jariwala and Saurabh Shukla.

Vishwas dreams to be an actor while his mother wants to him to join the police force. During a film shoot, Vishwas arrives dressed as a police officer and is mistaken to be real cop. The confusion continues further, and everybody including his mother and gangsters think he is a real cop. What would happen when his mother discovers the truth?

The Family is a 2013 American comedy thriller film starring Robert De Niro, Michelle Pfeiffer and Dianna Agron. The film is based on the French novel Malavita.
The story revolves around the Manzonis, a mafia family, who are relocated by FBI to a small-town Normandy, under the witness protection program. Despite CIA best efforts, the Manzonis run into trouble and are pitted against their old rivals. Will the family survive?

Insidious Chapter 2 is a 2013 American horror film starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne, Lin Shaye and Ty Simpkins. After the horrific incidents at home, the Lamberts move to Lorraine’s home and think they have got rid of the demons that haunted their family. However, when Josh starts behaving strange the realise that the demons have not given up and they need to uncover the secret behind the strange acts.

Ponmaalai Pozhudhu is a 2014 Tamil Drama,  starring Aadhav Kannadasan and Gayathrie in lead roles. Arjun and Divya are teenager studying in same school. They both get infatuated with each other. Divya's Parents tortured Arjun and beat her up as well. They stop them from meeting each other. Arjun’s father gives advices to both of them and takes Arjun out of the city. They couldn’t differentiate love from infatuation. The story depicts crucial role of parents of bringing up their teenage children.

Elysium is a 2013 American sci-fi action film starring Matt Damon, Jodie Foster, Sharlto Copley and Alice Braga. Set in the year 2154, the world is dominated by the rich who reside on Elysium, a gigantic space station, while the poor stay on a ruined Earth. Max, an ex-con, must shift to Elysium to save his own life and in the process fights to bring equality to the poor living on Earth.

The Smurfs 2 is a 2013 American animated comedy film starring Neil Patrick Harris, Brendan Gleeson, Jayma Mays, Katy Perry and Hank Azaria. It is a sequel to the 2011 film 'The Smurfs' and it is loosely based on 'The Smurfs' comic-book series created by the Belgian comic artist Peyo. Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette when he discovers that she knows a secret spell that can transform smurf-like creatures called 'Naughties' into real Smurfs. The Smurfs team up with humans to rescue Smurfette.

Pattatthu Yaanai is a 2013 Tamil action film starring Vishal, Aishwarya Arjun and Santhanam.

The story revolves around Gouravam, a cook who takes wedding catering orders. Saravanan and his four friends join Gouravam, when he takes an order for a local goon. Trouble begins when Saravanan falls in love with Aishawarya, who is also pursued by a gangster.

Dheerudu is a 2014 Telugu romantic film starring Vishal Krishna,  Aishwarya Arjun,  Santhanam,  Seetha,  Jagan and Mano Bala. 

Gouravam is a well-known traditional cook making a living undertaking orders for marriage functions. He is forced into taking an order for a local goon’s wedding. Junior cooks Saravanan and his four friends who work for him offers to help him but they put him in a bigger problem. So they decide to flee away from here. But Saravanan falls in love with Aishwarya.

Issaq is a 2013 romantic film,  starring Prateik Babbar,  Amyra Dastur,  Ravi Kishan and others. 

Its an Indian adaptation of William Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet and is set in Banaras,  where two influential Banarasi families run the the violent sand mafia. The Kashyaps and Mishras are at war with each other. Kashyap has an 18-year-old pretty daughter Bachchi from his first wife. Mishra has a good-looking son,  Rahul. Both meet and fall in love. Their fate is pre-decided.

Alik Sukh is a 2013 Bengali psychological thriller starring Debshankar Haldar,  Rituparna Sengupta and Sohini Sengupta. Gynaecologist Dr. Kingshuk Guha is caught in a mess when one of his patients dies. Rumi,  his wife,  is angry at her husband’s lack of tact. This sours their relationship and they grow apart. The doctor reaches an out-of-court settlement for his error. This angers Rumi and she has a fall. Now the doctor is in the hospital,  praying for her safe recovery!

Ramaiya Vastavaiya is a 2013 Hindi romantic drama film starring Girish Kumar, Shruti Haasan and Sonu Sood. Thi film directed by Prabhu Deva is actor Girish Kumar’s debut film. 

Ram, a rich boy, falls in love with Sona, a simple girl from the village. The difference in status creates problem from the young lovers. When Ram approaches Sona’s brother, he puts a condition which Ram must fulfil to marry Sona.

Stuck in Love is a 2012 American romantic drama film starring Jennifer Connelly, Greg Kinnear and Lily Collins. The movie won the Best Picture award at the 2012 Port Hueneme International Film Festival.
Stuck in Love is the story of a complicated relationship between an acclaimed author and his family including his ex-wife, teenage son and college-going daughter. The movie shows the family’s dealing with the complexities of love and how endings can lead to the start of something new.
Khoon Ki Pyasi is a 2013 Hindi dubbed Telugu Horror film starring Meera Jasmine and Rajeev Mohan.
