Balupu is a 2013 Telugu action film starring Ravi Teja, Shruti Haasan and Prakash Raj. The film did well at the box office and was declared a superhit.

The story revolves Ravi, a bank collection, whose friend is duped by a girl named Shruti and her uncle. Ravi decides to teach them a lesson and tries to trap Shruti in his love. Will Ravi achieve his goal or would he would he get trapped himself?

White House Down is a 2013 American action thriller film starring Channing Tatum, Jamie Foxx, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Clarke. John Cale, US Capitol police officer takes his daughter on a tour of the White House, when a group of armed terrorists capture the place. Cale leaves no stone unturned to save the lives of his daughter and the President.

Enemmy is a 2013 Hindi action thriller, starring Mithun Chakraborty, Mahakshay Chakraborty, Kay Kay Menon, Sunil Shetty and others. Undercover policemen Eklavya, Naeem, Madhav and Eric are assigned to stop a gang war. A sum of money goes missing. They get underworld don Mukhtar Memon arrested. But this doesn’t deter the war. They enlist the help of senior CBI Officer Yugantar.

Radhana Ganda is a 2013 Kannada drama film starring Komal Kumar, Poorna and Arya.
The story revolves around Krishna who loves Radha and elopes with her to get married. However, Krishna has huge debts and struggles to pay it, while Radha gets a role of a leading heroine in a movie. Radha takes to the role to pay Krishna’s debts but this makes Krishna uncomfortable and their relationship suffers.

Kanoon Apana Apana is a 2013 dubbed action drama film starring Ayesha and Ramesh Bhat. Police officer Bhairavi stands up against local don Appaji Gowda. Her superior,  the Deputy Superintendent (DSP) of Police and colleague David are in cahoots with Appaji. They all team up against her.  She is accused of slapping the DSP. Appaji Gowda kills her father and pins the blame on her as well. The entire system is against her and she has to put up a fight for justice!

Adbhoot is a 2013 Bengali drama starring Soumitra Chatterjee, Paran Bandyopadhyay, Kharaj Mukherjee, Subhasish Mukhopadhyay, Anamika Saha. A large family and their tenant try to explore the mystery around a hidden treasure in their house. They soon realise that the house in haunted. Will they succeed in their plan?

After Earth is a 2013 science fiction action film starring Jaden Smith, Will Smith, Sophie Okonedo and Billy Campbell. Set in the 31st century the humans have abandoned Earth due to cataclysmic events. General Cypher Raige sets out on his last voyage with his 17-year-old son Kitai. When their aircraft is hit by an asteroid shower and crash lands on the now quarantined Earth, Kitai must rise to the occasion and prove he is a brave soldier just like his father.

Now You See Me is a 2013 American thriller film starring Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Morgan Freeman, Isla Fisher, Michael Caine, Dave Franco and Melanie Laurent. It was a box-office hit and won several awards.
Now You See Me is the story of four magicians who are summoned to an obscure address and a year later become the Four Horsemen. They pull off a sensational bank robbery which puts the FBI and Interpol on their case to trace the money.

Bul Bul is a 2013 Kannada drama film starring Darshan, Rachita Ram and Ambarish.
The story revolves around Vijay, a young man, who rejects a girl's proposal as he loves somebody else. Dejected in love, the girl tries to end her life, which angers her father, who is a Don. The Don tries to kill Vijay, while he tries to finds ways to escape.

Greeku Veerudu is a 2013 Telugu drama starring Nagarjuna,  Nayantara,  K Vishwanath,  Meera Chopra, Brahmanandam,  M.S. Narayana,  Ashish Vidyarthi, Giridhar and Sarath Babu. Chandu is a self-made man who runs an Event Organising Company. He is a womanizer and does not believe in family and relationship. Due to some unseen circumstances, his company goes into debt. Seeing no other option he goes back to India to get some financial help from his grandparents.

Love Story is a Tamil-dubbed romantic film starring Nagarjuna and Nayanthara. Chandu runs an event organization company in New York. After being manipulated into signing a fraudulent agreement, Chandu is forced to go to his grandparents in India for money. He meets Sandhya at the airport. Chandu tricks his family into thinking that Sandhya is his wife to get the money but later confesses the truth. Chandu tries very hard and gains the respect of his family. He finally marries Sandhya.

Moondru Per Moondru Kadhal is a 2013 Tamil romantic film starring Arjun, Cheran and Vimal.

The story revolves around three men from different cities and the struggles they go through in the love life. Varun, Harris and Guna show how true love is selfless and all about sacrificing for your loved ones.

Soodhu Kavvum is a 2013 Tamil comedy starring Vijay Sethupathi and Sanchita Shetty. Das is a middle aged man who plans to kidnap minister’s son Arumai. Before he can action his plan,  another group kidnaps Arumai. Das finds out that it was Arumai who got himself kidnapped to extort money from his father. What will be Das's next step?

Chintoo 2 is a 2013 Marathi children's adventure film starring Satish Alekar,  Shubhankar Atre,  Subodh Bhave. It’s the sequel to the 2012 summer blockbuster 'Chintoo'. The film is about a boy named Chintoo and his group of friends. Together they are on their way to find a hidden treasure. On the way they must battle their fears,  solve riddles and fight some baddies too!

Commando – A One Man Army is a 2013 Hindi action film starring Vidyut Jamwal and Pooja Chopra. 

The story revolves around Karan, an Indian army commando, who escapes from the clutches of Chinese military. While on the run, he bumps into Simrit, a girl who’s being followed by Amrit Kanwal Singh and his goons. Karan comes to Simrit’s rescue which draws the ire of Amrit. Will Karan and Simrit reach their destination safely?

Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga is a 2013 Tamil romantic comedy starring Sivakarthikeyan and Vimal. The film was huge success and was remade in Kannada as Katte.

The story revolves around two unemployed friends, Kesavan and Pattai, who want to enter politics. They try hard to impress people and with their tricks but fail. Similarly, they are also rejected by the ladies whom they love. Will the two losers achieve any success in life?

Aatma - Feel it Around You is a 2013 horror film starring Bipasha Basu, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Jaideep Ahlawat and Darshan Jariwala. 

A divorced couple's daughter lives with her mother. She doesn't know that her father has died. This is hidden from her as she loves him very much. But her father starts to visit her from the dead. He is attached to his daughter and threatens to take her away with him. Now the mother has to fight him off for her daughter's safety. But what will she do?

Kidnapper is 2013 Bengali comedy-drama starring Samadarshi Dutt,  Ridhima Ghosh and Paran Bandyopadhyay. Bubkha comes to the city in search of a living. He is joined by two of his old friends. They avoid paying rent for many months due to unemployment. One day the old man in a fit of anger tells them to resort to kidnapping. They kidnap four children in which one is a nephew of Bubkha's girlfriend. How the friends manage the children and return them safely make up the crux of the movie.

Jayantabhai Ki Luv Story is a 2014 love story starring Vivek Oberoi, Neha Sharma, Vishwanath Chatterjee, Zakir Hussain,  Nassar and others. The film is a crime love story between two small-time criminals. Jayanta Bhai is a small-time thug. His enemy is the beautiful Simran. Jayanta unexpectedly falls in love with Simran. This leads to problems for him in his business. Will he let his head rule over his heart? Or is his heart set on Simarn? How will she reciprocate?

Jai Maharashtra Dhabha Bathinda is a 2013 Marathi romantic drama film starring Abhijeet Khandkekar and Prarthana Behere. 
The story revolves around Sayaji, a young Maharashtrian boy, who moves to Punjab and opens a dhaba that serves traditional Maharashtrian food. While in Punjab, he falls in love with Jaspinder Kaur, and must find a way to succeed both in personal and professional life.

Ne Jene Mon is a 2013 Bengali Action film starring Prince and Pamela in lead roles; Raju Thakker plays the villain. Prince plays the role of a gangster. He comes across Pamela's character and instantly develops affection for her. She rejects his advances at first but eventually falls for him. There is trouble in paradise when a rival gangster, played by Raju Thakkar, creates a problem. They both end up in an all-out gang war in which Raju is killed and the couple lives happily ever after.

ABCD: Any Body Can Dance is a 2013 Indian dance drama film directed and choreographed by Remo D'Souza and produced by Siddharth Roy Kapur and Ronnie Screwvala. The film stars Prabhu Deva, Ganesh Acharya and Kay Kay Menon in lead roles.

Nakili is a 2013 Telugu thriller film starring  Vijay Antoni, Siddharth Venugpal, Roopa Manjari. An ex-convict forges signature of a deceased medical student to get enrolled in a medical college. He kills his roommate by accident in a dispute and fears that his identity will be revealed.

E Kemon Prem is a Bengali movie drama starring Sabhyasachi,   Ria and Mihir Das. A member of the mafia, Surya Prakash lives with his wife and assistant Kiran. He has a daughter named Shibani. In order to make her feel less left out, he makes some plans so that Kiran's son Amar and her grow up together. When they are older they fall in love. Surya tries to kill Amar for this.

Mahaveer No.1 is a 2013 Hindi dubbed action comedy film starring Ram Pothineni and Kriti Kharbanda. Adikeshavulu owns a marketplace. White is Narayana’s son who works with him. It is later revealed that Narayana was being chased by gangster Durga on Adikeshavulu’s orders. White finds out that this is being done to become chairman of the market. Soon, White goes on a rampage, deciding to take revenge on his employer for attacking his father.

Hyde Park on Hudson is a 2012 British comedy-drama film starring Bill Murray and Laura Linney in the lead. Actor Bill Murray’s performance was acclaimed and he received a Golden Globe Award nomination for Best Actor.
Hyde Park on Hudson explores the romantic relationship between President Franklin. D. Roosevelt and his distant cousin Daisy. During the visit of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth in 1939, Daisy realizes that there is much more to Roosevelt's life than she could ever imagine.

Akaash Vani is a 2013 love story,  starring Kartik Aaryan,  Nushrat Bharucha,  Fatima Sana Shaikh and others. A conservative girl and an open-minded fun loving boy fall in love in college. After four years the boy goes abroad for further studies. The girl goes to her hometown for her sister's wedding. But her sister elopes with a man whom her parents did not approve of. Her parents are heart-broken. In order to prevent the same fate with their other daughter they get her married off.

Broken City is a 2013 American crime drama film starring Mark Wahlberg, Russell Crowe and Catherine Zeta-Jones. Mark Wahlberg is one of the producers and the film has been directed by Allen Hughes of 'Book of Eli' fame.

Broken City is the story of Billy Taggart, a detective, who is arrested for the murder of a rapist. However, the court declares him not guilty due to lack of evidence.  When Mayor Hostelier hires Billy to spy on his wife, Billy finds that he has been double-crossed and framed by Hostelier.

Gabbar Sher is a 2013 Hindi action thriller film starring south superstar Vishal, Trisha Krishnan and Sunaina. Sakthi, a young forest guide, receives a letter from his ex-girlfriend requesting him to visit her in Bangkok. Upon arrival he gets caught in the middle of a shootout between two rival gangs and discovers that it was a case of mistaken identity. How will Sakthi come out of this problem?

Manas Priya is a 2013 Bengali romantic drama film starring Abhiraj,Pamela and Rajatava Dutta. It is a love story of a couple whose families are against their relationship. Join their journey as they fight against all odds for their love.

Adhbhut Prem Kahani is a 2012 fantasy film dubbed into Hindi. It stars Parvathy Nair, Avanthikka Mohan, Faizal, Akhil Devan and Manoj Madhu in prominent roles. Naga-Yakshi, the classic mythological symbol of lust, comes to Earth. She mates with virgin boys only to kill them. However, things do not remain the same when Yakshi ends up falling in love and defying all laws that God had made for her.

Haathi Mera Saathi is a 2012 film dubbed in Hindi film starring Vikram Prabhu, Lakshmi Menon, Thambi Ramaiah and Joe Malloroi. The story revolves around Bomman and his pet elephant Manickam. When a wild elephant Komban attacks the villagers, Maickam comes to their rescue. The story traces the strong bond between Bomman and his dearest elephant.

Aayna Ka Bayna is a 2012 Marathi movie based on dance starring Sachin Khedekar, Amruta Khanvilkar, Raqesh Vashisth.
'Aayna Ka Bayna’ is a story about group of juveniles living in a remand home who are eagerly trying to sort out their bleak lives. To help them, Shivani uses the dance therapy to counsel them. As a part of it, these boys get a chance to take part in a dance competition, but their strict warden Sathe opposes them. The boys then decide to escape and show their special talent to the world.

Insaaf Ki Pukar is a 2012 Hindi dubbed horror film starring Navdeep, Sadha, Bramhanandam and Uttej. Deepu arrives with his crew to shoot a music video at a bungalow where unexpected turns of events disrupt their shooting. Deepu befriends Mythri, who helps him unravel the mystery of the house.

Killing Them Softly is a 2012 American crime film starring Brad Pitt and Dede Gardner. The film was a box-office hit and also earned nominations at top International film festivals.
Killing Them Softly revolves around a heist, where three small-time crooks rob an illegal gambling den which destroys the entire economy of the underworld. Hit men Jackie and Mickey are hired to track them down.

Shiva The Super Hero 2 is a 2012 Hindi fantasy action film starring Nagarjuna Akkineni and Anushka Shetty.

The story revolves around Malli, who is born with the divine grace of Lord Shiva. However, unknown of his powers, he turns atheist after the death of his parents. When he finally realises the purpose of his life, he sets out to stop a demon from sacrificing a young woman.

Cloud Atlas is a 2012 German-American science fiction movie starring Tom Hanks, Halle Berry and Hugh Grant. It was written and directed by The Wachowskis and Tom Tykwer and is one of the most expensive independent films of all time.
Cloud Atlas explores how the actions of an individual impacts his past, present and future, as the human soul is shaped from a hero into a killer. It is based on the bestselling novel Cloud Atlas by David Mitchell.

Chandramukhi Ki Pratigya is a 2012 action-thriller film. It stars Jayaram, Poonam Bajwa and Muktha George. A young tantrik/exorcist meets a girl named Malu. The girl has no memory of her past life. Both go their separate ways only to meet years later when the man is called to ward off an evil spirit at a rich family's mansion. It is Malu who is possessed. Using ancient techniques he manages to find out about the spirit's dark past. Will he succeed in freeing Malu from the spirit?

Durga IPS is a 2014 Hindi dubbed action film starring Ragini Dwivedi as IPS officer Ragini who fights the anti-social elements of society fearlessly. 
She is very strict with goons and corrupt politicians and wants to make sure that women can live in the society without any fear whatsoever. Ragini teaches the disruptors and molesters lessons that they will never forget.

Ondu Kshanadalli is a 2012 Kannada romantic film starring Tarun Chandra, Sanjjanaa and Bhama in the lead roles.

The story revolves around Shyam who doesn’t wish to get married early and wants to live his life to the fullest. However, things get crazy when his mother finds him a good match and he tries his best to avoid marriage.

Ekla Akash is a 2012 Bengali romantic drama film starring  Parambrata Chatterjee Parno Mittra and Goutam Ghose. Arjit and Nisha are a married couple but don’t seem like one. They seem to despise each other but live together only for the sake of their son. Arjit is involved in an illicit relationship and also doubts the nature of Nisha's relationship with her mentor. Eventually, Arijit realizes the error of his ways and gets back together with Nisha, but it's too late since their only son dies.

Lake Placid - The Final Chapter is a 2012 American horror film starring Elisabeth Röhm, Yancy Butler, Paul Nicholls and Robert Englund in the lead. It is a sequel to the film Lake Placid 3 released in 2010. Reba, the EPA agent, ventures to the Black lake that has become the home for man-eating crocodiles and builds an electric fence around it. Once the fence is unknowingly left open, when a school picnic bus enters the fence and mistakenly reaches near the lake, putting the lives of children in danger.

Hotel Transylvania is a 2012 American animated horror comedy film. Count Dracula builds a resort in Transylvania, where humans are not allowed. Trouble begins when Jonathan, a young boy, finds the resort and mixes around with other draculas. Count must try his best to keep his daughter from falling in love with Jonathan.

Chaarulatha - The Twins is a 2012 horror film featuring Priyamani. Conjoined twins Charu and Latha have always lived as one body. Ravi falls in love with Charu but Latha does not like this. She refuses to let Charu meet him and this causes differences between them. An accident occurs and Latha dies. Her mother complains that the other twin’s spirit comes and haunts them. It is revealed that Charu actually died and Latha takes her place. She does so to win over Ravi, whom she also loved.

Ok Ok is a 2012 Telugu romance film starring Udhayanidhi Stalin, Hansika Motwani, Saranya Ponvannan, Santhanam and Jangiri Madhumitha. It is the dubbed version of the Tamil movie Oru Kal Oru Kannadi.
Sravan works in a multiplex and is in love with Meera,  the daughter of a police officer. Meera doesn't show any interest in him initially. When he learns about Meera’s impending marriage,  he sets out to win her over.

ESP Ekti Rahasya Galpo is a 2011 Bengali thriller film based on a story by Shibashish Roy. The movie stars Rituparna Sengupta, Raima Sen, Debdoot Ghosh and Shaheb Chatterjee in the lead.
The movie is a tale of mystery, intrigue and imagination.

Darling is a 2012 Bengali romance film starring Mayukh Mazumder,   Pamela Mandal,   Aishwariya and Riya Chanda. The film starts with four college mates of the 1980 batch bidding farewell. They keep in touch for decades. Mayukh is the son of one among them and Aishwariya is a daughter of another. Mayukh rejects Riya's proposal and her father persuades him. He states that he loves Aishwariya and relieves himself from the situation. Mayukh and Aishwariya meet again in their parents' reunion.

Satya Savitri Ani Satyavan is a 2012 Marathi drama thriller starring Sachit Patil, Amruta Patki and Shruthi Marathe.
The story revolves around Pawar, a politician, who is murdered by his own bodyguard. When two women proclaim to be Pawar’s wives, CBI inspector Sunil is stunned by their claims and he has a reason to suspect a possible conspiracy. Can Sunil find the real culprit?

Dandupalya is a 2012 Kannada crime drama film starring Pooja Gandhi and Makarand Deshpande.
Lakshmi heads a notorious gang that targets women, kills them and escapes with the loot. Lakshmi takes a thrill in slitting throats and enjoys to watch blood oozing out. Chalapathy, a brave police officer is assigned the task to capture the gang and bring them to justice.

Teri Meri Kahaani is a 2012 Hindi romantic film starring Shahid Kapoor and Priyanka Chopra. The story revolves around a couple, set in three different eras but the tale is narrated simultaneously.
Govind and Rukshar, Krish and Radha, and Javed and Aradhana meet at various junctures of their lives and fall in love. Their love is so strong that even destiny can’t stop them from being together.

Men in Black 3 is a 2012 American action comedy film starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones and Josh Brolin in the lead. Agent J travels back in time to save Agent K from an alien who is planning to kill him. Agent J teams up with the young Agent K, to save his partner and the mankind from the menace of the aliens.

The Pirates! Band of Misfits is a 2012 animated adventure comedy with voiceovers from Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman and Imelda Staunton. Desperate to win the Pirate of the Year Award, Pirate Captain and his team travel to Victorian London and try to beat their competitor Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz.

Kazhugu is a 2012 Tamil thriller drama film starring Krishna and Bindu Madhavi. The movie revolves around four men called "Kazhugu", who handle  corpses of people who commit suicide. During one of these jobs, Sera meets Kavitha. She gradually falls in love. A local goon Iyya them not to pick up the bodies of the policemen he has killed but Sera and the others go ahead as Iyya is arrested. Iyya kills Sera's friends and Kavitha is killed too . The movie ends with Sera committing suicide.

Jungle – The Battle Ground is a 2012 Hindi dubbed film starring Aadhi, Dhansika and Archana Kavi. A gang steals from the wealthy to provide food and shelter, in the 18th century. Their leader, Kombodhi meets the valiant Varupuli. But Varupuli’s real name is Chinna. In the neighbouring village, Chinna had been chosen to be sacrificed, thanks to a youngster being killed. Chinna escaped and found the secret of the youth’s death.

Kaal Purush is the Hindi dubbed title of Tamil movie Ambuli, a 2012 science-fiction thriller starring R. Parthiban, Jagan and others. Ambuli is the name of a monster hiding in a field. It has terrorized the locals. But Amudhan and Vendan set out to find why this monster became who it is. They find out that it was created by the head of a local college, a scientist who experimented on its mother. Sengodan who guards the corn fields is said to be a suspicious sort but he helps the boys uncover the truth.

Yedyanchi Jatra is a 2012 Marathi drama starring Bharat Jadhav, Mohan Joshi, Vinay Apte, Kshitij Wagh and others. Even though Harya dreams of leaving his small village, he is bound to it by a promise he made to his grandfather on his deathbed. Harya promised to stay back and take care of the family farm. As he goes about doing his farm duties the evil landlord Bhangade Patil plots to take over Harya's land.

Underworld Awakening is a 2012 American action horror film starring Kate Beckinsale, India Eisley, Theo James and Michael Ealy. After having escaped imprisonment for years, Selene finds herself in a changed world where humans have discovered existence of Vampires and the Lycan clans. The humans want to eradicate both the species and Selene, the vampire warrior, must fight the humans for survival of her clan.

Assassination Games is a 2011 American action film starring Jean-Claude Van Damme and Scott Adkins in the lead. Roland Flint, a contract killer teams up with another assassin, Vincent Brazil, to seek revenge on a drug dealer who left Roland’s wife in coma. Vincent joins the contract as he is in need for money. Join their journey as they both fight together against the corrupt Interpol agents and gangsters.

Karz Chukana Hai is a 2012 crime film starring Venkatesh, Trishla, Prakash Raj and others. Venkatadri has been assisgned to protect Varadarajulu Naidu’s family. He accompanies Naidu’s daughter Keerthi and she is fed up of his bodyguard ways. She calls Venkatadri from a private number and he falls for the woman on the phone. Finally there’s a day when Keerthi has to tell him that she’s been making the calls.

No. 1 Businessman is a 2012 Hindi action drama film starring Mahesh Babu, Kajal Aggarwal and Prakash Raj. Following its huge success, the film was dubbed in a couple of languages.
The story revolves around Surya who comes to Mumbai to rule the underworld and strategically operate organised crime. He falls in love with Chitra, the daughter of Police Commissioner, but this doesn’t deter him from his main goal of seeking revenge on politician Jaidev, who killed his parents.

Sher-E-Hindustan: Warrior is a 2012 action thriller starring Malashri, P. Ravi Shankar, Sadhu Kokila and others. Sher-E-Hindustan is a powerhouse woman. No man has yet been her match! One hit and she can make opponents fly. She enters a house as a servant. But soon, she rises up the ranks thanks to her good nature. The astrologer in the house predicts she is no less than Chamundeshwari. She sets off to avenge the death of her sister and father.

Six is a 2012 HIndi dubbed thriller film starring Jagapati Babu and Gayathri Iyer. A remote village has cases of murders after nightfall and no one knows who’s doing this. But Tripura knows that it is the work of her ex-lover Vijay. A scientist experimented on Vijay after he died, bringing him back to life, but as a brute which attacks people and sucks their blood, after sunset. Along with a police officer, Tripura finds Vijay and gets him an antidote that brings him back to the normal condition and saves his life.
Ajana Dweep is a Bengali movie aimed at children,  starring Baby Jiniya,  Baby Anagha,  Master Anupam,  Anulipi,  Kashish and Srikant. It is a story about an unknown island.

Brothers is a 2012 Tamil action thriller film dubbed in Telugu, starring Suriya, Kajal Aggarwal and Sachin Khedekar.

The story revolves around conjoined twins, Vimalan and Akhilan. who try to protect their father's flourishing business, from rival foreign companies. A Russian lady is assigned the task to trap the twins and get the company’s trade secrets. Will the brothers fall into the trap?

Anokha Jaanwar is a 2012 Hindi dubbed romantic drama film starring Gayathrie, Jhonny and Rohini. The film is about a young man named Kartik who acts like the animals he comes across. This is because he never received love and affection from humans starting with his parents. Kartik meets a girl and they find a common ground in which love can possibly blossom.

Hindustani Yodha is a 2011 Hindi-dubbed Telugu historical drama starring Nagarjuna, Sneha and Shweta Menon. A Dorasani, a head of an aristocratic family has kept the village in her grip. She often humiliates Mallamma who everyone loves. Mallamma is drawn to a tree which is regarded pios. Dorasani is enraged when Malamma in her element sings a song in her court. She orders that if Mallamma sings again she’ll be killed. But this causes her to defy the Dorasanis orders further!

Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - 1 is an American romantic fantasy film starring Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson and Taylor Lautner. The film was a huge success and received quite a few international awards.
The story revolves around Bella, who is married to Edward, discovers that she is pregnant with a child that is half human and half vampire. As the news spreads, the wolf pack try to kill the unborn child, while the Cullens try to protect Bella. Will Bella and her child be safe?

Arthur Christmas is a 2011 animated film with voiceovers from James McAvoy, Hugh Laurie and Bill Nighy. On Christmas Eve, Arthur, son of Santa Claus, learns that due some error the Christmas gift of a girl has been misplaced and won’t reach her on time. Arthur takes it upon himself to find the gift and deliver it to the girl.

Maduve Mane is a 2011 Kannada action comedy film starring Ganesh and Shradha Arya.

Sooraj enters a train which has Suma along with her family and friends, travelling for her wedding. Sooraj gets friendly with Suma and is invited for the wedding where the bridegroom is Dushyant, a corrupt officer. Sooraj makes a plan to ruin Dushyant’s wedding and seek revenge for his sister’s death.

The Three Musketeers is a 2011 action romantic adventure film based on Alexandre Dumas’ novel of the same name. It stars Matthew Macfadyen, Orlando Bloom and Milla Jovovich.
The Three Musketeers is the story of three legendary but down on their luck Musketeers and a young D’Artagnan who come together to defeat a beautiful villainous double agent and save the French royal family from a treacherous plan to undermine the reign of King Louis and his wife.

Dost Garibon Ka is the Hindi dubbed action film starring Nandha and G. M. Kumar. Officer Muthukumar becomes an IPS officer. He is posted in his own district. But the local politicians have made life hell for the citizens. Plus, since he’s an ideal cop, upholding standards, the polticians try to hurt him in every way for being honest. He gets embroiled in a huge brawl, taking on the might of the dreaded don Gurumurthy.

Killer Elite is a 2011 British-Australian action thriller film starring Jason Statham, Clive Owen and Robert De Niro. The film is based on the novel 'The Feather Men’ by Sir Ranulph Fiennes.
The story revolves around retired assassin Danny and his mentor Hunter. When Hunter is kidnapped by an Arab Sheikh, Danny is asked to kill three members of British Special Air Service, or else Hunter will be killed. Can Danny rescue Hunter?

Arjun is a 2011 Marathi drama film starring Sachit Patil and Amruta Khanvilkar. 
The story revolves around Arjun, a Maharashtrian youngster, who aspires to start a business, which is very rare in his community. He prefers doing business rather than doing some mundane jobs. While setting up his business, Arjun faces many sociocultural and political hindrances. Will he be able to overcome these hindrances and succeed in his business?

Chennai vs China is 2011 Hindi action thriller film starring Suriya, Shruti Haasan and Johnny Nguyen. The story revolves around Bodhidharma, an ancient legend from the 6th century, who was a master of martial arts and medicines. Centuries later, when Subha, a student, tries to revive Bodhidharma’s skills and find a cure for a virus, Dong Lee from China comes to foil her plans. Will Dong Lee succeed in his plans?

Chatur Singh Two Star is 2011 Hindi action drama film starring Sanjay Dutt, Ameesha Patel, Anupam Kher and Satish Kaushik. The film revolves around a police detective Chatur Singh who is sent to South Africa to solve a high-profile murder case. However, Chatur Singh has a confrontation with a mafia don. He also meets a weird taxi driver and a damsel in distress while he tries to handle his hysterical boss.

One Day is a 2011 American-British romantic film starring Anne Hathaway and Jim Sturgess. It has been adapted from David Nicholls’ 2009 novel of the same name.

One Day is the story of Emma and Dexter who meet on the same date each year to see where they are in their lives. Emma is smart and wants to be a writer while Dexter becomes the host of a successful TV show. Over the years, their lives grow apart as they proceed in different directions till one day, they find they belong to each other.

Nirbhay: The Fighter is the Hindi dubbed version of Rowthiram, a 2011 action film. It stars Jiiva and Shriya Saran. Shiva learns martial arts from his grandfather but leads a peaceful life. He falls for Priya, a law student. But he gets engulfed in a brawl with some rowdies. Their leader Gowri wants to attack Shiva and his family. He decides to move away from his home so as to protect them. He goes off with his grandfather’s photograph as inspiration.

Mr. Duplicate is a 2011 Kannada film in the romance genre starring Diganth and Prajwal Devaraj in the lead roles. Sheetal Injudhan Khan, a new comer is the main female lead. The film is directed by veteran Kodlu Ramakrishna.

A Better Life is a 2011 American drama film starring Demián Bichir and José Julián. Originally written as The Gardener, it was nominated for the Best Actor award at the 2012 Academy Awards.

A Better Life tells the story of a Mexican single parent staying in California with his fourteen-year-old son. He works as a gardener and is afraid of his son joining the neighbourhood local gangs. He must also avoid immigration agents as tries to give his son a better future.

Kodipunju is a 2011 Telugu drama film starring Tanish,  Anchal,  Roja. 

Ramachandra Rao yearns for the village head position. When his daughter Nandini falls for Abhimanyu,  he ill-treats the boy and his mother. Abhimanyu challenges Rao for the village head position.

Friends with Benefits is a 2011 American romantic comedy film starring Justin Timberlake, Mila Kunis, Woody Harrelson and Jenna Elfman. After a brief professional relationship, Jamie and Dylan become friends and see no harm in getting intimate without getting emotional. However, things soon get complicated their friendship is ruined.

Apman ki Aag is a 2011 Hindi dubbed romantic drama starring Jithan Ramesh, Sanchita Padukone, Suhasini and Prakash Raj. The story revolves around Ganeshan who falls in love with Sandhya, who happens to suffer from a life-threatening disease.

Dhan Dhana Dhan is a 2011 Kannada romantic comedy starring Prem Kumar and Sharmila Mandre.
The story revolves around Siddhu, a gangster, who loves Charmi but has no clue how to approach her. Siddhu’s doctor, Mr. Kamath, decides to give him tips to woo the girl he loves. However, Dr. Kamath regrets later when he finds that Siddhu is in love with his own sister Charmi.

Quarantine 2: Terminal is a 2011 American sci-fi horror film starring Mercedes Mason, Mattie Liptak, Josh Cooke and Noree Victoria. Passengers of an aircraft are kept under quarantine when authorities discover that some passengers could possibly be infected with a deadly virus. Can the survivors save themselves and escape from the quarantine zone?

Bin Bulaye Baraati is 2011 is a Hindi action, comedy film starring Aftab Shivdasani, Priyanka Kothari, Shweta Tiwari, Gulshan Grover and Shakti Kapoor. The film revolves around two love birds AD and Shreya, who is a sub-inspector's neice. AD and Shreya elope in crime boss Durjan Singh's car and are chased by Durjan's men as well as the cops. Stuck between the two extremes, AD and Shreya must do everything they can to survive.

Beginners is a 2010 American romantic comedy film starring Ewan McGregor and Christopher Plummer. The movie received numerous accolades and won Christopher Plummer the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor.

Beginners is the story of Oliver, a young man who reflects on the relationship he shared with his father five years before his death. The film is structured on the two announcements made by his father and how Oliver is inspired by his father’s attitude to pursue his own romance.

Rajadhani is a 2011 Kannada crime drama starring Prakash Rai, Yash and Chethan Chandra.
The story revolves around five friends from poor families who want to make quick money and take the offer to kill dreaded Don Benku. However, Chetan doesn’t agree and leaves the group, while the other successfully kill Benku but get arrested and don’t get the money as promised. What would happen to the friends?
Noorondu Bagilu is a 2011 Kannada drama starring Kiran,  Thilak Raj,  Bianca Desai and Sandeep. It's based on M K Indira's novel Noorondu Bagilu – a house with 101 doors.
Shagird  is a 2011 Indian crime action thriller film directed by Tigmanshu Dhulia starring Nana Patekar as Hanumant Singh, Mohit Ahlawat as Mohit Kumar and Rimi Sen as Varsha Mathur in lead roles

Sniper: Reloaded is a 2011 American thriller action film starring Chad Michael Collins, Billy Zane, Richard Sammel and Patrick Lyster. Sergeant Brandon, son of ex-sniper Thomas Beckett is sent on a mission to rescue a farmer. During the mission he seeks Brandon’s men get killed and he must seek help from his father's protege's to avenge the deaths of his men.

Koffi Shop is a 2011 Kannada comedy,  romance film featuring Shashank,  Bianca Desai and Atul Kulkarni. 

The story revolves around a young man who travels to a city to earn his livelihood. He gets a job in the city and soon falls in love with a girl. But,  his happiness is shortlived. He gets blackmailed by a man. He must find a way out of it.

Raada Rox is a 2011 Marathi movie starring Neha Bam, Uday Nene, Tanvie Parab, Chirag Patil. The movie has guest appearances from Juhi Chawla, Suneil Shetty, Sukhwinder Singh. 
The movie was the directorial debut of Rahul Thackerey and is based on the story of four friends and their love for music.

Never Back Down 2: The Beatdown is a 2011 American action film starring Evan Peters, Michael Jai White, Dean Geyer, Alex Meraz, Todd Duffee, Scott Epstein and Jillian Murray. It is a sequel to the 2008 film Never Back Down. The story is about a former Mix Martial Arts star who provides training to four fighters, coming from diverse backgrounds to compete in a ruthless MMA tournament.

Private Practice is a 2011 Bengali thriller film starring Pasha,  Anshuman, Aishwarya Bose and Ratri Ghatak. Sankar Kinkar is regularly teased by his classmates and friends for his appearance. He runs away to his uncle's house. Enroute, he meets Sobhen, who is escaping from kidnappers. They decide to switch places and change their appearance before going to Sankar's uncle's house. When he reaches, turmoil ensues but the truth is revealed in the end.

Badlaa Naag Ka is a 2011 Hindi fantasy thriller film starring Raaghav, Monica, Aadukalam Naren and Thambi Ramiah. 
The story revolves around Velu who hails from Nanjupuram, a village infested with snakes. Once, while saving his girlfriend Malar, Velu attacks a snake but it escapes. As per the village superstition, an injured snakes often returns to seek revenge. Is Velu seriously in danger or the snake stories are just a superstition.

Urumi is 2011 Telugu drama starring Prithviraj,  Genelia Dsouza,  Prabhu Deva,  Chandan Roy Sanyal,  Vidya Balan,  Tabu. Kelu is a warrior in 16th century Kerala whose father was killed by Vasco da Gama and his troops. Kelu vows to avenge his father's death with the assistance of Vavvali and Ayesha,  a warrior princess.

Don Ghadicha Daav is a 2011 Marathi thriller starring Makrand Anaspure,  Sayaji Shinde,  Sai Tamhankar,  Ajinkya Deo and others. 
This catchy thriller is about life being a game,  not to be taken seriously. One needs to be ready to play,  take risks and not just wait for it to be over. In other words,  life is for living. It may be short but that doesn't mean that it cannot be lived to its fullest. This is the philosophy this film is based upon.

Mon Bole Priya Priya is a 2011 Bengali romance movie starring Raaj,   Pamela,   Tapas Pal,   Ashish Vidyarthi and Rajatava Dutta. Arjun is a village boy who travels to the city to seek admission in a college. Priya is gifted a defective car by her evil uncle so that she will meet with an accident. She runs over Arjun who was passing by and he loses his memory. Priya is sad that this was because of her,   so she regularly visits to take care of him eventually falling in love with him.

Bajirao The Fighter is a 2011 Kannada action drama starring Sudeep and Ragini Dwivedi in lead roles. 

Kempe Gowda is a good police officer whose uprightness and steadfastness irks Armugam, a crime boss. Armugam gets him transferred to Bangalore so that he can teach him a lesson. But Kempegowda is unaware of this. In Bangalore his senior works for Armugam. Unable to do anything against Armugam, Kempegowda wants to return to his village. But his love Kavya stops him and urges him to fight.

Battle: Los Angeles is a 2011 American sci-fi action film starring Aaron Eckhart, Michelle Rodriguez, Ramon Rodriguez. Aliens have invaded Earth and Los Angeles is being evacuated. Staff Sergeant Michael Nantz who recently retired is called back to lead a platoon and save the city from aliens.

Agni Chakra is a 2011 supernatural thriller film dubbed in Hindi starring Charmy Kaur and Pradeep Rawat. Mangala is a famous actress who ardent fan Chinna commits suicide. To avenge his son’s death, Chinna’s father who is a black magician invokes a deadly evil power.

S.W.A.T.: Firefight is a 2011 American action film starring Gabriel Macht, Robert Patrick, Carly Pope and Shannon Kane. S.W.A.T officer Paul Cutler is assigned the task to train the Detroit S.W.A.T team. During an emergency, Cutler and his trainees get on a rescue mission where a hostage gets killed and this leads the victim’s enraged boyfriend to seek revenge on Cutler.

Ami Adu is a 2011 Bengali drama,  starring Deblina Chatterjee in the title role. During the time of George W. Bush’s Presidency,  a young Hindu girl falls in love with Muslim boy Suleman. He decides to move to Iraq with his friend for better prospects,  and leaves Aadu behind. In March 2003,  the U.S. invades Iraq and communication between Aadu and Suleman is cut off. Not knowing what to do,  Aadu writes a letter to President Bush telling him of the turmoil he’s causing.

LBW - Life Before Wedding is a 2011 Telugu love story starring Nishanti Evani, Chinmayi Ghatrazu, Rohan Gudlavalleti, Abhijeeth Poondla, Asif Taj and Siddharth. 

The movie is about two parallel stories and how their relationship change. Rishi and Jay get introduced to Anu. Rishi develops feelings for Anu. They both start going out but Anu hates his smoking and lies. Anu and Jai's friendship develop into love. Radhika proposes Rajesh, but he rejects her. After getting his marriage fixed he wants her back.

Kote is a 2011 Kannada action film starring Prajwal Devaraj and Gayathri Rao in lead roles. 
The film revolves around Vignesh, who aspires to join the police. During his training days, Vignesh crosses path with Katari, a ganglord. Katari plans an attack on Vignesh on the very day he has his police selection interview. Will Vignesh get selected and how will he seek revenge on Katari?

The Eagle is a 2011 British action-adventure drama starring Channing Tatum, Jamie Bell and Donal Sutherland. The film based on Rosemary Sutcliff’s adventure novel ‘The Eagle of the Ninth’.
The story revolves around Marcus Aquila, a Roman soldier, who sets out to find his legion's golden emblem, which disappeared years ago. Will he find the emblem and be able to restore his father’s honour?

Just Go with It is a 2011 American romantic comedy film starring Adam Sandler, Jennifer Aniston, Nick Swardson and Brooklyn Decker in the lead. While on a weekend trip to Hawaii, Danny, a plastic surgeon, convinces his loyal assistant to pretend that he is his wife whom he is soon going to divorce. This fake story that he makes up to cover up a lie that he told his girlfriend, puts him in a complicated situation further.

Biutiful is a 2010 Mexican-Spanish drama film starring Javier Bardem. It is González Iñárritu's first film in Spanish, his native language. The movie received critical acclaim and was nominated for two Academy Awards in 2011.
Biutiful is the story of Uxbal, a single father of two children who makes a living by procuring work for illegal Chinese immigrants. His world falls apart after he is diagnosed with terminal prostate cancer and has only a few months to live.

The Roommate is 2011 American thriller starring Leighton Meester, Minka Kelly, Cam Gigandet and Danneel Harris. After joining college, roommates Sara and Rebecca become close friends and at one-point Rebecca becomes dangerously obsessed with Sarah. Her obsession reaches a point where she targets everybody who tries to come close to Sarah.

The Way Back is a 2010 American war film starring Jim Sturgess, Colin Farrell, Saoirse Ronan and Ed Harris. The film was nominated for Best Makeup at the 2011 Academy Awards.
The Way Back is inspired by the memoir of Slawomir Rawicz, a former Polish prisoner of war, who escaped from a Siberian Gulag and walked 4,000 miles to freedom. It tells their escape story as they face freezing nights, never-ending desert, lack of food supplies and ethical dilemmas in their journey towards freedom.

Guldasta is a 2011 Marathi romantic comedy starring Makarand Anaspure,  Jitendra Joshi, Tejaswini Lonari and others. 
Two men fall in love with the same woman but hide from each other. The woman has dreams of becoming an actress. But when the girl turns both of them down they turn against her and unite in their efforts to bring her down. But their effort to shame her actually help her realise her Bollywood dreams. Such is life!

Boss is a 2011 Kannada action film starring Darshan and Navya Nair. 
The story revolves around twins Ram and Raj, who are separated when Raj is ousted by his father due to his bad behaviour. Years later, when Raj learns that Ram has been killed, he returns to seek revenge.

Mirapakay is a 2011 Telugu action drama film starring Ravi Teja, Richa Gangopadhyay and Deeksha Seth. The film was a huge hit in South.
The story revolves around police officer Rishi who is asked to disguise as a college teacher for an undercover operation. Rishi falls in love with Vinamra but his seniors want him to flirt with Vaishali, the Don’s daughter. How will Rishi handle the two ladies, and will he complete his mission successfully?

Kandireega is a 2011 Telugu romantic comedy film starring Ram and Hansika Motwani. The film was a box office success and was remade in Hindi as Main Tera Hero, with Varun Dhawan.

The story revolves around Sreenu, a street-smart boy, who travels to Hyderabad for education, where he falls in love with Shruthi. However, Bhavani, a gangster, already has his eyes on Shruthi and is hell bent to marry her. How will Sreenu rescue Shruthi from Bhavani?

Ra.One is a 2011 Hindi action superhero film starring Shah Rukh Khan, Kareena Kapoor and Arjun Rampal. 
The story revolves around Shekhar, a game designer, who comes up with game called Ra.One, in which the antagonist is more powerful than the protagonist. However, the game gets out of control and the indestructible virtual characters comes to life and becomes real. Ra.One kills Shekhar and attempts to kill his family, but G.One comes to their rescue. So, who will win the final round?

Mylari is a 2010 Kannada action drama film starring Shivrajkumar, Sanjjanaa Galrani and Sadha.
The story revolves around Mylari, a frustrated man who leaves his home and reaches Bangalore, to prove his worth and achieve success in life. He encounters various experiences and witnesses many ups and downs in life. Will Mylari succeed in life?

Nagavalli is a 2010 Telugu horror thriller film starring Venkatesh,  Anushka Shetty,  Richa Gangopadhyay,  Shraddha Das,  Poonam Kaur and Kamalinee Mukherjee. A rich man and his five daughters liven in a mansion. His eldest dauhter wins a portrait of a long-dead dancer. Strange things begin happening after the portrait is brought home. A psychiatrist and a godman try to unravel the mystery of the effect a long-dead dancer’s ghost has on humans.

Mera Badla: Revenge is a 2010 Telugu horror comedy film starring Venkatesh, Anushka Shetty and Richa Gangopadhyay. The title of the Telugu version is Nagavalli.
The story revolves around Shankar Rao, a businessman, whose family starts witnessing strange events in their house. They contact Acharya Ramchandra, who further refers them to Dr. Vijay, a psychiatrist. Can Vijay solve the mystery and get them out of danger?

Olave Vismaya is a 2010 Kannada romantic film starring Dharma Keerthiraj and Prathibha Rani in lead roles. 
The story revolves around Manu and Priya, who are in love but Priya fears her father. One day, the couple have an unfortunate accident which shatters their lives and they chose to part ways. Will the couple be able to overcome their tragedy get married?

London Boulevard is a 2010 British crime drama starring Colin Farrell, Keira Knightley and Ray Winstone. The film is based on Ken Bruen’s novel of the same name.

The story revolves around Mitchel, a criminal, who falls in love with actress Charlotte and decides to give up crime and live a normal life.  Will he be able to run away from his past?

Panchakshari is 2010 Telugu drama starring Anushka Shetty and Samrat. 

Panchakshari is a story of a girl born outside the temple. The priest claims that she has divine powers. On every 'Bonalu' night the Goddess joins her and she resort to sooth-saying.

Baava is a 2010 Telugu drama film starring Siddharth Narayan and Praneetha. The movie is about a carefree boy called Veerababu. Veerababu's father had married a girl from a rich family but was not accepted as the son-in-law. So,  he wanted Veerababu to marry into a rich family. Veerababu falls in love with a girl from a nearby village,  it later turns out that she is maternal relative and they cannot get married.

Gaana Bajaana is a 2010 Kannada romantic drama film starring Tarun Chandra and Radhika Pandit. 
The story revolves around Radhe, a beautiful girl, who loves Kuttu but Kuttu doesn’t reciprocates to her love. At the behest of her family, Radhe agrees to marry Krish, while, Kuttu starts realising his love for Radhe. What will be Radhe next move?

Yaksha is a 2010 Kannada action thriller film starring Yogesh, Nana Patekar, and Roobi.
The story revolves around Yaksha, a magician, who joins the gang of Poonja, a powerful don. Soon some key members of the gang are mysteriously killed one after another. Poonja soon realizes that it is Yaksha who is responsible for the killing.

Naa Peru Shiva is a 2010 Telugu drama starring Karthi,  Kajal Agarwal,  Jayaprakash,  Soori,  Lakshmi Ramakrishnan,  Neelima,  Raviprakash,  Rajivan. Siva is a doting son and brother. He falls in love with Priya. All is well until Siva's father gets murdered. Will Siva be able to nab his father's murderer.

Anjaana Anjaani is a 2010 romantic film,  starring Priyanka Chopra,  Ranbir Kapoor and others. Akash and Kiara attempt to kill themselves in New York,  but are prevented from doing so by the Coast Guard. They try again,  but unsuccesfully. Both end up in a hospital together. After some more failed attempts,  the duo makes a pact to kill themselves on December 31. With twenty days remaining to their deadline,  they live together and do things for each other. What else will Kiara and Akash do together?

Drohi is a 1992 Hindi crime film starring Nagarjuna and Urmila Matondkar. Raghav is wanted by the crime branch for being a hitman. When the Mayor himself is assasinated, Raghav's boss pays another man and turns him in as the Mayor's killer following pressure from the police. But inspector Krishna is not convinced. He wants to investigate the case further as he thinks that Raghav killed the mayor. He also wants his sister to not date Raghav who is known to her as Shekhar.

Kala Bazaar: Underworld is a 2010 hindi  drama starring Jagapathi Babu, Tanakala and Kota Srinivasa Rao. Ram stays with his wife Vidya and adopted son Chaitanya in Bangkok. He runs a restaurant there. A group of psychopath killers try to molest one of his female employees. Ram in a fit of rage shoots them. Since he did it for a good cause, the Thai press talks about him in the international papers. We see Guruparayana shocked to see that Ram resembles his old rival Durga, who had died some time back.

The American is a 2010 American thriller film starring George Clooney and Johan Leysen. The film was a box-office hit and received a couple of nominations at some of the top International film festivals. 
The American revolves around Jack, a contract killer, who after the death of his lover Ingrid, vows that his next assignment will be his last. He is asked to prepare a high-end sniper rifle and he holes up in a small town but is unaware that he is being monitored by another assassin.

Lake Placid 3 is a 2010 American horror thriller film starring Colin Ferguson, Yancy Butler, Kirsty Mitchell, Kacey Clarke and Jordan Grehs in the lead. It is a sequel to the film Lake Placid 2 released in 2007. Nathan moves into his Aunt’s lakeside house with his wife and son Connor, who finds a few baby crocodiles and begins feeding them secretively. Very soon, these baby crocodiles, grow into monstrous man-eating crocodiles that become a menace for the humans around.

Antim Swash Sundar is 2010 Bengali drama  Subrat Dutta,  Indrani Haldar,  Paran Banerjee. A middle-class working person finds a pendant. It turns out to have the power to turn things to gold. He uses it to his advantage and soon becomes a rich businessman. However,  what happens when he has to pay a huge cost for having gone down this path?

Path Jodi Na Sesh Hoi is a 2010 Bengali romantic film starring Rishi and Vaanya.A young girl Titli meets with a gruesome accident erasing three years of her memory. She falls in love with Aranya who lives in the neighbourhood. 
However one day, Titli regains her memory and completely disassociates herself from Aranya not being able to recollect their courtship days. Will Aranya be able to convince her that he is the man she has so dearly loved?

Vichitra Premi is a 2010 love story starring Ravikumar and Divya Sridhar. The story revolves around Swapna and Arun. Swapna's parents are not very keen but they say that the duo must complete their studies before getting married. Vicky wants to spilt the lovers. An accident takes place where Swapna goes mad due to a head injury while Arun escapes unhurt. From then on, he begins his search for Swapna and finally, when he does locate Swapna, something unexpected happens.

Byomkesh Bakshi is a 2010 Bengali thriller starring Abir Chatterjee, Saswata Chatterjee and Arindol Bagchi. A mine owner Manish Chakraborty hires a detective named Byomkesh Bakshi to investigate the death of Anadi Halder. He comes in contact with many people who are in his list of suspects. Will he be able to crack the mystery?

Eat Pray Love is a 2010 American romantic film starring Julia Roberts, Javier Bardem and Richard Jenkins. A happily married Elizabeth’s life is shattered when she goes through a painful divorce. In a quest to discover her true self, Elizabeth sets out on a tour and visits Italy, India and Indonesia where she discovers the pleasure of nourishment, prayer and true love.

Cheluveye Ninne Nodalu is a 2010 Kannada romantic film starring Shivarajkumar, Sonal Chauhan and Hariprriya.
The story revolves around Vishwa, a tourist guide, who falls in love with Prakruthi. However, Prakruthi's parents force her to marry a businessman. Will Vishwa fight for his love and get to marry Prakruthi?

Sanchari is a 2010 Kannada action drama film starring Raaj, Bianca Desai, Rangayana Raghu and Subbaraj.
The story revolves around Raj, a con man who works for Gurappa. When Gurappa decides to contest elections, he finds his opponent to be strong. So he decides to kidnap the opponent’s daughter, Bindhu, and assigns the task to Raj. However, Raj is already in love with Bindhu and must find a way to save her.

Mission Possible is a 2010 romantic drama starring Pushkar Jog, Manisha Kelkar, Sai Tamhankar and others. 
Mission Possible is a love triangle between Yash, Sai and Pearl. Sai and Yash are friends. Sai is also in love with Yash. But when a new girl Pearl arrives in their their college Yash rejects Sai and then begins ignoring her. Yash falls for Pearl. They start dating. But Pearl is only pretending to be in love with him. Her real motive is something else, while Sai's love for him is real.

Eradane Maduve is 2010 Kannada comedy film starring Ananth Nag, Suhasini Maniratnam and Jennifer Kotwal.
The story revolves around Vishwanath, a suspended officer, who is humiliated by everyone including his own family. To teach them a lesson and make his wife jealous, he gets a young girl, Veena, home. But to his surprise his wife too starts romancing a young boy.

Zamana is a 2010 Kannada drama starring Nithin, Jackie Shroff, Akarsha, Vineeth Kumar and others. A man falls in love with a woman. One day when some goons misbehave with the girl in public, he bashes them up. But the rival gang sees this as an opportunity; they kill the head of the goons who had misbehaved with the girl. The man who was saving the girl gets arrested for the murder. He gets bail but now he finds that his future is only with the underworld. A cop tries to help him out.
Rowdy Hrudaya is a 2010 Kannada drama starring Rakesh,  Kavyashree and Sundar. The movie sheds light on anti-social behaviour and how it leads to self-destruction.

Mr. Theertha is a 2010 Kannada Action Drama film starring Kokila Sudeep,  Anant Nag and Saloni Aswani.

Theerta and his father have a broken relationship since childhood. This makes him rebellious and violent towards others,  for which he is sent to jail twenty-five times. Theertha is also a highly talented inventor and wants to make his father proud.
Papiyon Ka Anth is a 2010 Hindi dubbed action film starring Sri Hari, Mohan Babu, Dasari Narayana Rao, M.S. Narayana, Sayaji Shinde and Pradeep Rawat in the lead roles.

Vaishnavi is a 2010 Hindi-dubbed thriller film starring Anushka Shetty and Samrat. Vaishnavi is a village girl, who has divine powers. She is treated as a goddess by the villagers and every year during the festival of Bonalu, she becomes the goddess herself and says prophecies. She is later killed by some goons for greed. Vaishnavi manages to stop the villains from attaining the temple fortune by possessing the body of another person who looks just like her.

Vaishnavi is a 2010 Hindi-dubbed thriller film starring Anushka Shetty and Samrat. Vaishnavi is a village girl, who has divine powers. She is treated as a goddess by the villagers and every year during the festival of Bonalu, she becomes the goddess herself and says prophecies. She is later killed by some goons for greed. Vaishnavi manages to stop the villains from attaining the temple fortune by possessing the body of another person who looks just like her.

Wild Things: Foursome is a 2010 American erotic thriller starring Jillian Murray, Marnette Patterson, Ashley Parker Angel and John Schneider. During a party, Carson, a spoilt brat, spends an exciting time with three beautiful women. When Carson’s rich dad passes away and leaves behind a will, which requires Carson to get married to inherit his property and wealth. Carson and the girls swing into action and start scheming plans to inherit the wealth.

Nooru Janmaku is a 2010 Kannada romantic drama film starring Santhosh Aryan and Aindrita Ray.
The story revolves around Vinyas, who starts his own business and falls in love with his assistant Drushti. But Drushti rejects his love as she already is in love with Jeevan. Drushti quits the job and start her own company with Jeeva. Dejected in love Vinyas starts failing in business and incurs loss. Finally, when he comes to terms, he attains success and realises what failure has taught him.

Zamana Mujhe Hai is a 2010 Hindi-dubbed Tamil western comedy movie directed by Chimbu Deven. It stars choreographer-turned-actor Lawrence Raghavendra, Sandhya, Lakshmi Rai and Padmapriya. 
The movie is based on Cowboy stories, which is set in the 19th century and is a tribute to many western films.

Hasini is a 2010 Telugu drama starring Sandhya, Kamalakar, Giri Babu, Ahuti Prasad, Dharmavarapu Subramanyam, Krishna Bhagwan, Ali, Venu Madhav, Hema and Surekha Vani. Hasini and Kamal are traveling in the same bogey of the train. Their bags gets exchanged due to a thief, Anandam. Hasini had some very important stuff in the bag, so she searches for Kamal and lands up in his house. Meanwhile, Kamal is very disappointed as his diamond ring is not there in the bag. He had brought it to propose to Sony.

Magic Robot is an 2010 Hindi-dubbed fantasy film starring Keerthika, Sangeetha, Ramya Krishnan and many others. A little girl named Priya is the daughter of a middle class couple. Priya gets possessed by spirit. With the help of the spirit's brother and a powerful sorceress named Kinathadi Kaali they set out to punish evil sorcerers Nanjappan and Madiramoorthy. Through the rest of the movie they fight with the evildoers and emerge victorious in this struggle.
Preethi Nee Heegeke is  a 2010 Kannada romantic love story starring Vivek Beedu and Tejaswini.

Aakhri Baazi is a 2010 Hindi dubbed romantic action film starring Karthi, Tamannaah and Milind Soman. Shiva meets a beautiful girl Charulatha at a railway station and gets attracted to her. She mistakes him to be a cab driver and Shiva readily agrees to drive her to the destination. However, the trip soon turns out to be one helluva journey with many twists and turns.

Right Yaaa Wrong is a 2010 Hindi crime drama starring Sunny Deol and Irrfan Khan. 

The story revolves around two friends Ajay and Vinay, who are police officers. During an accident, Ajay gets injured and is confined to a wheelchair. When his wife Anshita is murdered, Ajay is the prime suspect and Vinay must investigate the case. Can Vinay find the real culprit and not get influenced by his friendship with Ajay?

Hide and Seek is a 2010 Bollywood thriller. The movie features Purab Kohli, Mrinalini Sharma, Arjan Bajwa and Ayaz Khan. The story revolves around five friends who were enjoying their Christmas night. They decide to play a game but it turned into something which they never expected. Now, twelve years later their past has begun to haunt them. They are forced to come together and play the game again costing their lives.

Teen Patti is a 2010 Hindi thriller starring Amitabh Bachchan,  Ben Kingsley, R. Madhavan, Raima Sen and Shraddha Kapoor. A genius Mathematics professor from India is invited to London by a British mathematician, where the Indian professor starts putting his theory of probability to use via the game of Teen Patti (a poker game). He further tries out his theory with other players. His theory proves to be successful. Things go out of hand when they test this theory in the real world of gambling.
Belli Modada Ambara is a 2010 Romance movie starring  Madhusudhan and Teena Ponnappa.

Don Ka Muqabla is a Hindi dubbed action film starring Ajith Kumar, Bhavana, and Sameera Reddy. Jeevanandham has three children the first two are from the first wife and the third from his second. The third inherits all the wealth as he is of righteous heart but the other two are jealous of him. They want the business all to themselves and Shiva, the third child gladly steps down. His brothers get into trouble and its now up to him to save them.

A Single Man is a 2009 American drama film starring Colin Firth, Julianne Moore and Nicholas Hoult in lead roles. Actor Colin Firth who was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor for performance as George Falconer.
A Single Man is the story of George Falconer, a professor, who is unable to cope with life after the sudden death of his boyfriend, Jim. Frustrated with life, George decides to commit suicide but comes across various people and incidents that makes him rethink about his decision.

Jaggubhai is a 2010 Tamil action drama movie starring Sarath Kummar, Shriya Saran and Goundamani. Jaggubhai is a valient cop, who goes to Australia on official business and has an affair with Illavarasi. Twenty years later he learns about his child. He returns to Australia to get her back but learns that Illavarasi was murdered by the thugs he chased 20 years ago. Then Jaggubhai tracks down and kills the thugs and brings his daughter back home.

Edge of Darkness is a 2010 British American crime drama starring Mel Gibson, Ray Winston and Danny Huston.

The story revolves around Thomas Craven, a detective, whose daughter Emma, is killed outside his home. As he investigates the case, he uncovers some hidden secrets hinting towards a corporate cover-up, corruption and conspiracy. Can Thomas find the culprits behind her daughter’s murder?

Return of Chandramukhi is the Hindi dubbed version of Malayalam horror movie Drona 2010. It stars Mammotty, Navya Nair and others. Kunjunni purchases Nellur Mana from Gireeshan even though he knows that it is haunted. His dead body is found the next day. His brother Madhavan is tantric and decides to investigate. His disciples get killed off by a mysterious force. But it is later revealed that it is Gireeshan who suffers from multiple personality disorder.

School Master is a 2010 Kannada action drama film starring Vishnuvardhan and Suhasini Mani Ratnam.
The story revolves around Jagannath, a school teacher, who is loved by students and has a loving family. When a terrorist group decides to kidnap Chief Minister’s daughter, they accidentally end up killing Jagannath’s daughter. Jagannath decides to seek revenge in his own way.

The Book of Eli is a 2010 American action film starring Denzel Washington, Gary Oldman, Mila Kunis and Ray Stevenson. After a nuclear apocalypse, Eli spends thirty years wandering across North America and fighting to survive and protect a sacred book.

Mera Krodh is a 2010 Hindi romantic comedy starring Ravi Teja, Allari Naresh, Abhinaya and others. Three friends, Karunakar, Malli and Chandu all have different dreams. But they have a good time being together as friends. While they have their own dreams they want to help their friend Santosh, who is the son of a local politician. Santosh has fallen in love with a girl who is from the opposing clan. But Karunakar, Malli and Chandu want to get these lovebirds together. What happens when they go apart?

Om Shanti is a 2010 Telugu drama film starring Navdeep and kajal Navdeep,  Kajal Aggarwal,  Nikhil Siddharth,  Bindu Madhavi and Aditi Sharma. Meghana is a lady who seeks thrills all the time. Anand works in a software company and wants to settle down by getting married; in the course,  he meets Anjali. Teja is a struggling actor. Noori is planning to get married to Akbar. It is interesting to see how these five different stories of different people intertwine.

Mitti is a 2010 Hindi action movie starring Mika Singh, Lakhwinder Singh Kandola, Vaquar Shaikh and Victor John in the lead. The film has been dubbed in Hindi from Punjabi.
Four young men who are best friends work for a corrupt politician Sardar Harmail Singh. They are slowly but surely getting sucked into the world of alcoholism and crime. One of the boys loves a girl who is their friend. But she loves another boy from the group. This causes tension between the two boys. Her father doesn't want her to mix with these men.

Preethiya Theru is a 2010 Kannada Action - Romance film starring Tanil and Madhumitha are in the lead roles. Shakti works as a henchman for a don called Swamiji. He gets violent when his girlfriend Preeti ditches him on the wedding day. Will Shakti be able to find the reason behind Preeti's rejection?

Kalloori Kaaalangal is a Tamil-dubbed Telugu romantic movie starring Varun Sandesh and Shweta Prasad. Balu is a middle-class boy whereas Swapna belongs to a rich family. They both study in the same college and they fall in love. When the Balu's parents meet Swapna's father, he informs them that she is getting married to another person. While returning home, Balu's father has an accident and dies and Swapna runs away from her home.

Yamlok is a 2010 hindi drama film starring Rajendra Prasad, Sivaji and Sonia. The story revolves around Seenu, a bachelor, who gets the special power to foresee into anybody’s future. With this blessing he soon becomes rich, successful and wins over Shweta’s love. However, his special power becomes a worry for Lord Brahma and he comes to Earth to take away his powers.

Anusochana is a 2010 Bengali drama starring Rupanjana Mitra,  Shubendu Ghosh,  Niharika and others. Rahul and Parama meet at a railway station,  10 years after separating from each other. They talk about the old days and the time they spent together. They also bring up the misunderstandings that cropped up,  that led to them moving away and separating. Parama is married to someone else. However,  through the conversation it is clear that they both still pine for each other and regret having left.

Bondho Tomar is a 2010 Bengali romantic movie starring Soumitra Chatterjee, Biswajit Chakraborty, Sudipta Banerjee and Manoj Ojha. The plot begins with a flashback mode which shows Nilabho and Jhilmil’s love story. Everything turns haywire when Jhilmil’s father does not approve of their relationship . Jhilmil gets married to Akash. Nilabho is disheartened and tries to commit suicide but is rescued by Urmi. They start liking each other until Nilabho learns about Urmi’s illness.
The Bhoot of Rose Ville is a 2010 Bengali horror drama directed by Sanghamitra Chaudhuri starring Arpita Mukherjee, Dron Mukherjee, and Satrajit Majumder in lead roles.

Be Dune Saade Chaar is a 2009 Marathi comedy film starring Vandana Gupte, Mohan Joshi, Sanjay Narvekar and others. 
This film is about a man who has two wives. One does not know about the existence of the other. This gives rise to many hillarious situations. But for how long will he be able to keep his secret?
Jallado Ka Jallad is a 2009 Hindi action film starring Desari Arun Kumar and Sneha in the lead roles.

Pandav: The Punch is a 2009 Hindi fantasy film starring Aarya, Pooja and Rajendra. In Kasi, a child Rudran is left by his father for astrological reasons. After fourteen years, he feels remorse and looks for his son, with his daughter in tow. He is shocked to find out that her son has become an Aghori. He is now a cannibal who goes after victims. He manages to give moksha and prevents the soul from being born again.
Ek Joshila is a Hindi dubbed action movie starring Vaibhav, Swetha, Pradeep Rawat, Brahmanandam, Chitram Rajesh and Srinivasa Reddy.

Gaiir is a 2009 Marathi mystery film starring  Ankush Chaudhari,  Amruta Khanvilkar, Sandeep Kulkarni and others. 
Sameer is a businessman and recently married to Neha. When Sameer's lookalike crops up Neha is curious. This look-alike even arrives at Sameer's house and sleeps with Neha. Who is this man? Neha must find out.

London dreams is a 2009 musical drama starring Salman Khan, Ajay Devgan,  Asin and Aditya Roy Kapur. A teenager from India,  Arjun travels to London after his father's death. He wants to create a band of his own which he does many years later, with two brothers from Pakistan and a girl from South India.

His best friend from India Mannu,  also travels to join the band. They go on a three-city tour. Mannu becomes more popular. Arjun is jealous and wants to destroy his friend by pushing him toward drugs.

Bumper Offer is a 2009 Telugu romance film starring Sairam Shankar and Bindu Madhav. A young man Sai does not want to marry due to the loss of his business. Although his mother keeps forcing him to marry,  he evades her by saying that his financial status is poor due to the fall in real estate. At this juncture,  he falls in love with a beautiful girl Aishwarya and after a few turn of events,  Aishwarya too falls flat for Sai. His father gives him the challenge to defeat him in terms of money.

Dil Daar - The Arya is a 2009 Hindi-dubbed action comedy film starring Suriya and Nayanthara. Aadhavan is a professional assassin, who is hired to kill a judge. He infiltrates the judge's house and befriend everyone there by impersonating the judge's son, who ran away many years ago. Thara, the judge's niece, develops feelings for him. Aadhavan is pressured by Abdul to kill the judge but he protects him, who is actually his father. He ends up saving his dad from the assassins.

Kasam Hindustan Ki is a 2009 Hindi dubbed action adventure film starring Jayam Ravi, Saranya Nag and Vasundhara Kashyap. The film was hit and was dubbed in a couple of languages.
The story revolves around Dhruvan, a forest guard, who sets out for an NCC trekking camp inside a forest with five girls. During the camp, they find a terrorist group planning to destroy India's satellite mission. Can Dhruvan and his girls foil the plan of the terrorists?

Jaganmohini is a 2009 Telugu horror film dubbed from Tamil, starring Raja Abel, Namitha, Vadivelu and Nila. Prince Jagan loves Mohini but Jagan’s parents are against their relationship and they get Mohini killed. Mohini returns to avenge her death and reunite with Jagan.

Agora is a 2009 Spanish historical drama film starring Rachel Weisz. It uses historical fiction to highlight the relationship between science and religion during the Christianization of the Roman Empire.
Agora is set in Roman Egypt and tells the story of a slave who adopts to the rising Christianity wave in the Roman Empire to pursue freedom. He is also in love with his mistress, Hypatia of Alexandria, the famous mathematics and philosophy professor.

Salute is a 2009 Kannada action movie starring Ashwini and Rachana. The film captures the journey of B.C.Patil from his early life as cop to being arrested for participating in farmers movement to becoming an MLA. It highlights his intention of creating a crime free society.
Arumugam is a 2009 romantic drama film starring Bharath, Priyamani, Ramya Krishnan and Saranya Mohan.

Yaaradhu is a 2009 Kannada thriller starring M Leelavathi, Vinod Raj, Ashwini, Nihal, Anushree, Suman Jadugar, Manjunath and others. A doting mother is very attached to her son. He loves her too. A group of boys troubles him a lot. They bully him, which leads to the boy filing a complaint with the Principal. The boy goes home for vacations. When he's returning, he meets with an accident and dies. His bullies go to a guest house owned by the boy's mother. They start going missing one by one.

Blood and Bone is a 2009 American action drama film starring Michael Jai White and Julian Sands. The film features professional wrestlers, MMA fighters and martial artists Matt Mullins.
The story revolves around Isaiah Bone, an ex-con who joins the underground fighting world in Los Angeles. While winning fights, Bone also helps Angela, a drug addict. Will Bone be able to help Angela and keep the promise made to a friend?

Eenadu is a 2009 Telugu drama starring Kamal Haasan and Venkatesh. Commissioner Eashwar receives a phone call from a man informing him that five bombs are planted in different locations in Hyderabad. Commissioner Eashwar must take action before it is too late.

Jeo Aur Jeene Do - Battle is a 2009 hindi  action drama film starring Nara Rohit, Vedhika and Sayaji Shinde. 

The story revolves around Bhagath, a youngster aspiring to join the police force. Bhagat comes across Subbalakshmi, who is being chased by a gang and saves her. This trigger a series of battles between Bhagath and the gang lord Shakti. Can Bhagath fight Shakti and inspire the many who are troubled by him.

Magno Mainak is a 2009 Bengali crime thriller starring Subrajit Dutta,   Rajashi Mukherjee, Piyali Munsi and Rupanjana Mitra. Hena Mallick stayed Santosh Samaddar's with, who turned into her guardian after her parent's death. She dies and criminologist Byomkesh Bokshi and his partner take up the case. Byomkesh doubts Santosh Samaddar's family, including him as suspects. Numerous obscure details about Santosh turn up as the case progresses.

9 is a 2009 American animated sci-fi film starring the voice of Elijah Wood, John C. Reilly and Jennifer Connelly. It is based on the Academy Award-nominated 2005 short film of the same name written by Shane Acker.

9 is a hand-stitched doll that comes to life in a world destroyed in a war between machine and war. He quickly learns he’s not alone and there are others like him who are not afraid to sacrifice their lives for the survival of mankind.
Iniya is a 2009 Kannada romantic drama film, starring Balaji, pooja Gandhi, Urvashi and Lokanath. This film is written by and directed by Mahesh and it is produced by Shailendra Babu.
Iniya is a 2009 Kannada romantic drama film, starring Balaji, pooja Gandhi, Urvashi and Lokanath. This film is written by and directed by Mahesh and it is produced by Shailendra Babu.

Male Barali Manju Irali is a 2009 Kannada film starring Srinagar Kitty, Parvathy and Naga Kiran. 
The film revolves around three childhood friends who get entangled in a love triangle. Since childhood Sneha loves Vishwas but she never confesses. Vishwas grows up and falls in love with Nayana but she dumps him. Meanwhile, Vishwas’s brother Prem enters the scene and starts liking Sneha. Things get further complicated when Vishwas starts liking Sneha but Nayana returns into his life.

Champion the Winner is a 2009 Hindi dubbed romantic-drama film starring Arun Vijay, Prabhu, Vedhika and Prakash Raj. Two brothers who are simple village folks spend all their time together. One of them falls for an RJ and goes to the city to look for his lady love. He gets a job as a driver in a courier company. All seems to be going well for him until the villain enters and makes his life a living hell.

Love Guru is a 2009 Kannada romantic drama film starring Tarun Chandra, Radhika Pandit and Yagna Shetty.

The story revolves around Pratham and Khushi who work in the same company and are attracted to each other. Pratham expresses his love but Khushi doesn’t take him seriously. Things turn ugly when Khushi's boss approaches her with a marriage proposal.

Khauff Ki Raat is the 2009 Hindi horror film starring Jayaram and Bhavana. Dr. Ramdas is fed up with city life and moves with his wife to a quiet bungalow with her wife and two kids. The villagers tell them scary stories about their new house. The children are trapped by a psychopath who has killed children before. Soon, the kids are saved, and the Doctor and his family move to another house. But it turns out that the new house has scary people too.

Rajani is 2009 Kannada romantic comedy film starring Upendra, Arathi Chabria, and Rangayana Raghu.
The story revolves around Rajani, an unemployed software engineer, who falls in love with Sandhya, but she initially thinks he is rowdy. However, after knowing the truth, she starts liking him. However, Jakka, a gangster follows Sandhya and harasses her. Will Rajani fight Jakka for his love?

Vyapari is a 2007 Telugu scince fiction comedy starring SJ Suryah, Tamanna Bhatia, Namitha, Malavika, Seetha. Suryaprakash wants to be the richest man in the world. As a result he has no time for his family. He gets a scientist to create his clone who can spend time at home in place of him. Will that work?

Nannedeya Haadu is a 2009 Kannada romance starring Ramesh Bhat,  Anand and Ramya Barna. A young man from a small town visits a veteran music teacher to learn classical music. Soon he falls for his teacher's daughter. Will the teacher accept this relationship?

Terminator Salvation is a 2009 American action thriller film starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington, Bryce Howard and Helena Carter in the lead. John Connor learns about Skynet’s new powerful model T-800, that is designed to eliminate the existence of human race completely. Will Connor succeed in saving mankind as he fights the brutal war of man and machines?

Wardaat The Revenge is a 2009 Hindi dubbed romantic thriller starring Arya, Trisha Krishnan and J.D. Chakravathy. Karthik is a carefree person who falls in love with a paediatric doctor, Sandhya. Initially she detests but she is convinced he is the one for her and the both fall in love. She dies and her heart gets transplanted into a little boy called Imman. Karthik vows to protect the boy.

Flash News is a 2009 Telugu drama starring Rajiv Kanakala,  Navneet Kaur, Ali, Nagendra Babu, Kallu Chidambaram,  Kondavalasa, M.S. Narayana. Satya is a honest and courageous reporter. Satya wants to expose Tirumala Das, a corrupt MLA who kills people just for fun. Tirumala tries to buy Satya but he refuses. He is then framed for smuggling and cops are determined on killing him.

Chellidaru Sampigeya is a 2009 Kannada romantic drama movie starring Prashanth, Biyanka Desai and Vishwas.
