The story revolves around Soumya, who returns to her village, where her father fixes her marriage with Potha Raju. However, when Soumya gathers strength and informs her fiancé that she loves Kishore, the fiancé decides to help unite Soumya with Kishore.

Anandathandavam is a 2009 Telugu drama starring Tamannah, Siddharth Venugopal and Rukmini Vijayakumar. Introvert Raghu finds love and support in innocent Madhu. He proposes her for marriage but she gets married to an NRI. Later, when she is betrayed by her husband, she realizes her love for Raghu.

Me Shivajiraje Bhosale Boltoy is a 2009 Marathi drama starring Mahesh Manjrekar, Sachin Khedekar, Makarand Anaspure and others. 
The film deals with the issue of identity for a Marathi. Tired of feeling like an outsider in his own land, a frustrated Dinkar meets with the spirit of Shivaji Maharaj. The spirit rebukes Dinkar for his narrow-minded thinking and victim mentality and it tells him to stop blaming other communities but to make himself a proud Maratha.

Ek-The Power of One is a 2009 Hindi action film starring Bobby Deol, Nana Patekar and Shriya Sharan.

Nandu, an assassin, is on the run after being accused of a politician’s murder. He disguises and reaches a village as Puran and stays with a family. Meanwhile, CBI inspector Rane is given the task to nab Nandu. Will Rane succeed in his attempt?

Manorama is a 2009 Telegu love story starring Charmy Kaur and Nishan.Gitanjali stays at an apartment that is just opposite to Manorama chat place in Koti,  Hyderabad. A stranger arrives at Manorama chat place and plants his bag containing a time bomb.The bomb is supposed to blast at 1 PM but it fails to do so. There are chances that it might go off at any point of time.That is when that stranger sees Gitanjali at chat bhandar and develop a soft corner for her.The bomb is the reason for their love.

Kannadada Kiran Bedi is a 2009 Kannada action drama film starring Malashri in the lead role with Srinivasa Murthy, Rangayana Raghu and Ashish Vidyarthi in pivotal roles. The film released on 27 March to mixed reviews. The film recorded as Hit at the box-office.

Rowdy Inspector is a Telugu movie starring Sudeep, Ragini Dwivedi and it is original version is Veera Madakari is a 2009 Kannada action film directed by Sudeep.  The film features background score and soundtrack composed by M. M. Keeravani and Produced by Dinesh Gandhi. The film released on 20 March 2009.This film is remake of Telugu blockbuster Vikramarkudu.

Anjadiru is a 2009 crime thriller starring Prashanth, Muralidhar and Ravi Kale. Its a story about two friends, Sathya and Krupa, whose friendship is ruined after the former becomes a police officer by dubious means and the latter fails despite hard work. The police department find it tough to crack the kidnappings masterminded by Keerthi and Sathya. The movie takes a curious turn when an inspector general's daughters are kidnapped. How do police track the rapist cum kidnappers?

Underworld: Rise of the Lycans is a 2009 American action adventure film starring Michael Sheen, Bill Nighy and Rhona Mitra. Lucian, a Lycan slave works for Viktor, the Vampire King and falls in love with his daughter Sonja. When Viktor learns about their affair, he opposes which results in a conflict between Lycans and Vampire and Sonja revolts against her vampire clan.

Police Adhikari is a 2009 Telugu action film starring Vijaykanth and Sarath Kumar in lead roles. The story revolves around the life of a police officer,  who believes in doing the right things at every point in time. He fights against a deadly villain with the aim of punishing him and freeing the innocent.

Shiva The Super Hero is a 2009 Hindi dubbed action thriller starring Chiyan Vikram, Shriya Saran and Prabhu Ganesan. 
A CBI officer discovers a very large amount of illegal money in a businessman's account. To escape from the raid the businessman acts paralyzed. The daughter angered by her father's situation wants to take revenge on the cop.

Haage Summane is a 2008 Kannada romantic drama film starring Kiran Srinivas, Suhasi Dhami and Pooja Gandhi.
The story revolves around Preetham, who falls in love with Khushi, after reading her diary. However, he soon gets shocked to know that the diary is not hers. How will Preetham deal with this confusion?

Wafaa is a 2008 Hindi mystery drama film starring Rajesh Khanna, Laila Khan, and Sahib Chopra. Amritlal is a rich businessman. He marries Beena who is much younger than him in age. He cannot satisfy her and she resorts to an illegal relationship with her chauffer Raj. She gets Amritlal killed and writes it off as a suicide. Later Amritlal's lookalike claims to be her husband.

Ek Aur Vinaashak is a 2008 Hindi dubbed Telugu action movie featuring Ravi Tejha, Sandhya Gautham, Subbaraju and Mumaith Khan. The story revolves around Ravi who was a new director. He went to the producers and Mallik,  but no one agreed to work with him. He somehow convinced Mallik and they began shooting. Many problems arose during the course of shooting. But the death of Mummaith was the biggest trouble for him. He will have to hand these tough times carefully to finish up with the shoot.

Cadillac Records is a 2008 American musical drama film starring Adrien Brody, Beyonce and Jeffrey Wright. Set in 1947, Leonard Chess, a Jewish immigrant hires African American musicians, and their success opens door to many other African musicians. Chess starts Chess Records, however the musicians lose focus after getting influenced by sex and violence.
Janumada Gelathi is a 2008 Kannada drama starring Srinagar Kitty and Pooja Gandhi, Avinash and Ashish Vidyarthi.

Okkamagadu is a 2008 Telugu drama starring Simran,  Nandamuri Balakrishna,  Anushka Shetty and Nisha Kothari. Satyam looks after the villagers of Venkatapuram who respect and love him. Meanwhile there is a man called Om who is on a killing spree and is somehow connected to Satyam.

Maathaad Maathaadu Mallige is a 2007 Kannada drama film starring Vishnuvardhan, Suhasini and Sudeep.
The story revolves around Hoovaiah, a floriculturist, who opposes the government’s decision to give MNCs licence to acquire land. However, corrupt politicians scheme a plan against Hoovaiah to get him out of the way. Will Hoovaiah succumb to pressure or continue the fight?

Vacancy 2: The First Cut is a 2008 American horror thriller film starring Agnes Bruckner, Trevor Wright, Arjay Smith and David Moscow. At the Meadow View Motel, the managers record the intimacy of guests and sell the videos. When Mr. Smith, a psychopath, comes to the motel and kills his partner, the managers hire him to kill other guests and record the entire happening to make movies. When Caleb, Jessica and Tanner check into the motel, they must try to survive from the evil intentions of Mr. Smith and the managers.

Kotha Bangaru Lokam is a Tamil-dubbed Telugu romantic movie starring Varun Sandesh and Shweta Prasad. Balu is a middle-class boy whereas Swapna belongs to a rich family. They both study in the same college and they fall in love. When the Balu's parents meet Swapna's father, he informs them that she is getting married to another person. While returning home, Balu's father has an accident and dies and Swapna runs away from her home.

Nenu Meeku Telusa is a 2008 Telugu thriller film starring Manchu Manoj,  Sneha Ullal,  and Riya Sen. Aditya has amnesia,  a mental disorder. He is cheated on by his girlfriend who intentionally frames him for his uncle's murder. Aditya's ex-girlfriend comes to his rescue.
Mr. Fantoosh is a 2008 Bengali action drama film starring Prasenjit, Rachana Banerjee, Malanika, Angsuman and Hara Pattanaik. The film is directed by Raj Mukherjee.

Patre Loves Padma is a 2008 Kannada action drama starring Ajith, Kruttika and Ravindra. Patre has some memory problems but is haunted by his childhood friend Padma's memory who had died because of a motor accident. Patre decides to marry some one with the same name as Padma. And the search for Padma begins.

Dheemaku is a 2008 Kannada romantic drama film starring Naveen Krishna and Pavani and Asha Saini.
The story revolves around Balu, a college dropout, who marries Priya, daughter of rich Indira Devi. After marriage Indira succeeds to create misunderstandings between the couple and keep them apart. Will Balu and Priya realize their mistake and unite once again?
Ashta chemma is 2008 comedy romantic drama starring Nani, Colors Swathi, Avasarala Srinivas, Bhargavi and directed by Indraganti Mohana krishna.

Galgale Nighale is a 2008 Marathi romantic film starring Ramesh Deo,  Siddhartha Jadhav,  Bharat Jadhav,  Shahir Vitthal Umap,  Ketakee Thatte and others.
Galgale is in love with Gauri. She has three brothers who are mafia dons in Mumbai. The film's story is about how the young lovers try to stay together and avoid the bloodshed and politics that threatens to tear them apart.

Aadivishnu is a 2008 Telugu drama starring Dasari Arun,  Sneha,   Aishwarya,  Kota Srinivasa Rao,  Suman,   Pradeep Rawat,  Venu Madhav,  MS Narayana,   Ali,  Dharmavarapu,   Prema. Adi is an IT genius and is about to go to the US when he gets embroiled in a murder while trying to save Anjali. Adi decides to take revenge and eliminates all responsible for the ruining his career and the death of his father.

Arjun is a 2008 Kannada action drama film starring Darshan, Meera Chopra and Ananthnag.
The story revolves around Arjun, who joins the police force to fulfil his father’s wish. His father wants the society to be free of crime and Arjun strives to achieve it. When Arjun’ father is killed by criminals, he goes all out to finish the criminals.

Jwalamukhi - Man with Fire is a 2008 Tamil action drama movie starring Simbhu, Jyoti and Sangeeta. Jeeva comes to the city seeking revenge from a man who killed his grandmother. He begins to woo the man's daughter, and when the time is right, he abducts her and holds her hostage.

Pineapple Express is a 2008 American action comedy film starring Seth Rogen and James Franco in the lead. Dale, a pot-smoking process server and Saul, his drug dealer witness a murder of an Asian man, which was committed by a corrupt policeman and a drug lord. They both run for life but Dale mistakenly drops his stash at the scene, which contains a rare strain of Marijuana called Pineapple Express.

Anaconda 3: Offspring is a 2008 English thriller film starring David Hasselhoff and Crystal Allen in the lead. An anaconda is kept in a genetic research facility for researching a medicine to cure a terminal illness. The anaconda frees him and the queen anaconda, and goes on a killing spree when provoked by Mr. Murdoch, who flashes light at him. Join the thrilling journey of a team of animal hunters who is called in by Mr. Murdoch to capture both the snakes.

Minchina Ota is a 2008 Kannada action drama film starring Vijay Raghavendra, Sri Murali, Lakshmi Rai.
The story revolves around Bhadra and Vijay who are rivals. Vijay who loves Lakshmi, but she is in love with Bhadra. When her brother tries to get her married to another man, Vijay helps Bhadra to rescue his lover from the clutches of her brother.

Victory is a Telugu film directed by Ravi. C. Kumar,  released in 2008. The film stars Nitin Kumar Reddy,  Mamta Mohandas,  Shashank and Sindhu Tolani in lead roles and Ashutosh Rana in a negative role. Nitin plays a vibrant,  energetic youngster who is also a well responsible boy. Nitin who fight against the dreaded land mafia and at last wins over them.

Haal-E-Dil is 2008 Hindi Romantic Drama featuring Amita Pathak, Nakuul Mehta, Nassar Abdulla and Ajay Devgun and Kajol in a special appearance. The story revolves around Shekhar and Sanjana. Shekhar loves Sanjana. He tries to propose her while they were on their way to Shimla but realises that she still loves her former boyfriend, Rohit, who is dead. Rohit must try hard to win Sanjana's heart.

Hancock is a 2008 American action comedy film starring Will Smith, Jason Bateman and Charlize Theron. Despite possessing superpowers and having saved many lives, John Hancock is ridiculed and hated by the people for his clumsy and careless acts. John comes across Ray who takes it upon himself to improve his public image. However, when John meets Ray’s wife Mary, he discovers she too has super powers.

movietitle: You Don’t Mess With The Zohan
description: You Don’t Mess With The Zohan is a 2008 action comedy film starring Adam Sandler, Emmanuelle Chriqui, John Turturro and Rob Schneider. Zohan, an Israeli soldier, escapes from his country and arrives in US to become a hairstylist. During his stint he comes across Palestinians and is attracted to Dalai who owns a Salon. While he continues to make a mark in hairstyling, he must also fight his Palestinian enemy Phantom and protect Dalai and his friends.

Prom Night is a 2008 American horror film starring Brittany Snow, Scott Porter, Dana Davis and Johnathon Schaech. One evening when Donna returns from a date she finds her family killed by a psychopath killer who is obsessed with her. Three years later the killer returns while Donna attends her senior prom and is having a good time.

Aag Ka Gola is a 2009 Hindi dubbed action film starring Gowtham, Sridevi Vijaykumar and Raghuvaran. Menacing criminal Ansari has a deep-rooted rivalry with the cunning Baaji. Vasu works for Ansari. Beena comes to Hyderabad to return a ring that Vasu had lost when on a mission in Vizag. Her brother-in-law wants to sell her to a Sheikh based out of Dubai. Beena however is on the lookout for Vasu.

Yeh Hai Jalsa is the Hindi dubbed title of Jalsa, a 2008 Telugu action comedy starring Pawan Kalyan, Ileana D’Cruz and others.
Sanjay is a gym instructor who rescues Bhagi and Jyothsna from hoodlums. Bhagi woos him with the help of her friend Sreenu. Damodar Reddy is a powerful land grabber who is after Sanjay who has always created problems for his illegal jobs. Bhagi wants to marry Sanjay but her father reveals that he used to be a Naxalite and thus is not right for her.

Gooli is a 2008 Kannada action drama film starring Sudeep and Mamta Mohandas.
The story revolves around Gooli, a gangster, who falls in love with Ramya and marries her. However, very soon they part ways and few months later Gooli gets the news of Ramya’s death. How will Gooli cope with the loss?

Zombie Strippers is a 2008 American horror comedy starring Robert Englund, Jenna Jameson, Penny Drake and Roxy Saint. A laboratory develops a virus that can bring dead marines back to life. A man infected with the virus reaches a strip club and infects dancer Jessy, who turns into a zombie. Looking at Jessy make more money, the other dancers are tempted to get infected not knowing that they would turn into zombies and take pleasure in killing the clients.

Hitch is a 2005 American romantic comedy starring Will Smith, Eva Mendes, Kevin James and Amber Valletta. Alex Hitchens, a date doctor, helps his shy and meek clients to woo women. His latest client Albert is smitten by his boss Allegra. Alex struggles to help Albert while he to has to deal with his own love life.

Check Mate is a 2008 Marathi thriller starring  Ankush Choudhary,  Swapnil Joshi,  Rahul Mehendale,  Sonali Khare,  Sanjay Narvekar,  Anand Abhyankar and Vinay Apte. 
While trying to double their money three men get duped of crores. Now they must find the culprit and get their money back from him. They do this by making multiple moves like in a game of chess.

Swagatham is a 2008 Telugu romantic film starring Jagapati Babu,  Anushka Shetty,  Bhoomika Chawla. KK, a business man, moves to the US with his daughter. There he meets an Indian girl names Shailu who is neck deep in financial problems. KK decides to help her overcome her problems. Eventually they fall in love.

Vaana is a 2008 Telugu romantic film starring Meera Chopra and Vinay Rai. Abhiram falls in love with Nandini,  whom he does not know. He tries to convince Nandini but she is already engaged and rejects him. Coincidentally they are trapped in the rains and Nandini develops feelings for Abhi. Nandini is faced with a dilemma for she has to marry someone else.

Boogeyman 2 is a 2008 American horror film starring Danielle Savre, Matt Cohen and Tobin Bell. Since childhood, after the death of her parents, Laura has a phobia of the boogeyman and she undergoes therapy to overcome her fear. However, people around her are targeted and murdered one by one. Can Laura find the reason behind the deaths and overcome her fear, or will she be the next victim?

Aapadamokkulavadu is a 2008 Telugu drama starring Nagendrababu, Asmitha, Rayapati Sambasiva Rao, Sreenivas, Sai Kumar, Sana, AVS, Surekha Vani, Babu Mohan, Posani, Tanikella Bharani, Udaya Bhanu. Rangayya Naidu witnesses the injustice caused to his villagers and decides to fight against it and in the process loses his wife. He emerges as leader and accomplishes the mission to bring justice for all by killing the corrupted politicians and officers.

Chae Mon Tomake is a 2008 romantic Bengali movie starring Mihir Das, Uttam Mohanty, Hishi, Barsha and Kajal Dushmanta. Swapna is in love with Jeet  who is the bother of a very rich and influential man. He is against their relationship. Ananda is also in love with Swapna but she rejects his proposal. Later Swapna finds out that Ananda is actually her childhood friend who has once saved her life.Who will she choose?

Meravanige is 2008 Kannada romantic drama film starring Prajwal Devraj, Aindrita Ray and Sadhu Kokila.
The story revolves around Vijay, a student, who hates Nandini, his classmate Things take a turn when they get kidnapped and find themselves getting drawn to each other.

Ek Dulara is a 2008 drama starring Raghava Lawrence, Sneha, Namitha, Nassar, Saranya Ponvannan and others. Pandi does menial jobs in Dubai and saves every penny to send it to his family in India. But days before Pandi's sister's wedding, Sriman runs away from the house with the money. Pandi helps his family. He loves Sneha from his village. Sneha leaves home to marry Pandi. When he returns from Dubai, Pandi finds that his mother is dead. Who killed her and why?
Bhavachi Laxmi is a 2008 Marathi movie starring Milind Gawli, Nanda Shinde, Sudhir Dalvi, Usha Naik in the lead.
Maya Bommalu is a 2007 telugu Animation film.
Samarasimha is a remake of Tevar Magan Tamil movie which was released in Telugu as Kshatriyaputrudu. The same was remade in Kannada starring Upendra,  Sakshi  Shivanand, Laila.

Maisamma IPS is a 2008 Telugu crime drama starring Mumaith Khan,  Sayaji Shinde and others. An orphan girl child loses her parents in a natural calamity. Her elder sister brings her up. The elder sister marries a criminal who forces her into prostitution. He also tries to rape the younger sister. 

When they try to escape the man lets his dog loose after them. The dog kills his wife while the younger sister escapes. She grows up to become a police officer and wants to avenge her sister's death.

Orata I Love U is a 2007 romantic drama film starring Prashanth, Soumya, and Sathyajith.
The story revolves around Vardha, a rowdy, who loves Kavya, but she is already in love with Santosh. However, when Vardha learns that Santosh is a fraud, he comes to Kavya’s rescue and saves her from embarrassment. Later, things turn ugly for Vardha when he is tricked by a politician. Can Vardha come out of this trap?

Takkari is a Telugu flim released in 2007,  starring  Nitin,  Sadha and directed by Amma Rajashekhar. Tirupathi is an intense guy who's financial condition is very poor and wish to become a huge business man. He falls in love with a rich girl,  Priya Sada,  sister of a business tycoon and a mafia don in city Guru. The rest of the story is how Tirupathi convinces Guru and marries Priya.

Bats: Human Harvest is a 2007 American sci-fi thriller film starring David Chokachi, Michael Jace and Pollyanna McIntosh. In this sequel, a group of soldiers travel to Afghanistan to arrest Fazul, a terrorist, who has escaped into the caves. As the soldiers try to find their way, they encounter genetically altered bats who feast on human flesh.

Main Faisla Karunga is a 2007 action film starring Suriya, Asin, Vadivelu, Kalabhavan Mani and others. A couple is traveling by train with their twins. One baby gets kidnapped. He is found by another couple that raises him. The brothers meet after 27 long years. Vasu wants his kidnapped brother Vel to come home with him away from his village where his enemy Sakkarapandi wants to kill him and his family. Vasu sends Vel to meet their parents and stays back in the village himself. But Vel returns.

Bal Hanuman is a 2007 animated film based on the childhood of the Indian mythological character Hanuman. Hanuman was blessed with supreme intelligence, strength and divine powers. With his super powers, he helped Ram to defeat Ravana and rescue Sita.

Aa Dinagalu is 2007 Kannada crime drama starring Chethan Kumar, Archana and Sharath Lohitashwa. The film is based on the mafia in Bangalore that existed during the 1980s. 
The story revolves around Chetan who loves Mallika, but Chetan’s rich father is against the relationship. His father approaches underworld don Kotwal to separate the lovers. Meanwhile, Chetan seeks help from a rival gang to deal with Kotwal and gets entangled in the world of crime. How will Chetan come out of this?

Thanikaattu Raja is a 2007 Tamil dubbed action thriller film starring Mahesh Babu and Amrita Rao. Athidi is falsely convicted for killing his adopted parents and goes to jail for 13 years and when he comes back he loves Amrita unaware that she is the daughter of his adopted parents.

Geleya is a 2007 Kannada crime drama film starring Prajwal Devaraj, Tarun Chandra and Pooja Gandhi. 
The film revolves around two friends Guru and Vishwa, who move to Bangalore to become rich. Lured by quick money, they join rival gangs and become enemies. Vishwa’s wife tries to make peace between the two friends but in vain.

Road Romeo is a 2007 Kannada Drama film starring Dilip Rai and Ashitha. Dilipa falls in love with Anjali and proposes her. She spurns his love seeing his financial instability. Dilipa take a sales job and focusses on his career. Things take a new turn when he becomes successful.

Good Luck Chuck is a 2007 American romantic comedy starring Dane Cook, Jessica Alba, Dan Fogler and Troy Gentile. During childhood, a girl curses Chuck (Charles) that any woman he gets intimate with, will break up with him and marry the very next man they meet. Due to this curse, Chuck grows up and becomes very popular amongst women, but after all the break ups he must find a way not to lose the girl he loves the most.

Milana is a 2007 Kannada romance drama film starring Puneeth Rajkumar, Pooja Gandhi, and Parvathy.
The story revolves around Anjali, whose father forces her to marry Aakash. However, Anjali is unable to forget her past and demands a divorce from Aakash. But things take an unexpected turn and their lives change.

Nava Vasantam is a 2007 Telugu drama starring Tarun,  Akash,  Sunil,  Rohith,  Priyamani,  Ankita,  Kota,  Tanikella,  Jeeva,  Telangana Shakuntala. 
Vijay,  Prasad and Raja live in a rented room aspiring to become a mimicry artist,  IAS officer and a singer respectively. Ganesh joins them and changes their approach towards life. Ganesh wants to marry Anjali,  but her father rejects him. His friends help him marry Anjali.

Gandhi My Father is a 2007 Hindi biography film starring Akshaye Khanna, Darshan Jariwala, Bhumika Chawla and Shefali Shah. The film is produced by Anil Kapoor and is based on the biography of Harilal Gandhi.

While the Father of Nation had great plans for the country, but his own son Harilal was unhappy with the plans his father had for him. While Harilal wanted to study abroad and become a Barrister, Mahatma Gandhi wanted him to join the freedom struggle. The film traces the troubled relationship between Gandhi and his son.

Dishyum Dishyum is a 2006 Telugu romantic film starring Jeeva, Sandya and Nasser. 
A stuntman and a college arts student meet. He falls in love with her. She promises to marry him if in the future she falls in love with him. The girl's mother disapproves of this. When the girl loses her father unexpectedly, her mother tries to get her daughter married to someone else. Will the mother succeed? Will the girl fall in love and stand up against her mother?

Snehana Preethina is a 2007 Kannada romantic film starring Darshan, Aditya, and Sindhu Tolani.
The story revolves around two rich friends Raghuram and Rajiv who want their children Adi and Lakshmi to marry each other. But, Adi loves Sindhu and Lakshmi loves Surya, who are from poor families. Raghuram and Rajiv hatch a plan to separate Adi and Lakshmi from their lovers and succeed to some extent. Will the young lovers ever reunite?

Lakshyam is a 2007 Tamil-dubbed action film starring Gopichand and Anushka. Chandu is a college student who falls in love with his classmate Indu. Shafi, Chandu's classmate, works for his uncle Shankar and lusts after Indu. He kidnaps Indu but she is rescued by Chandu. When Chandu and Indu go to Indu's hometown they are attacked by Shafi and Indu is kidnapped again. Chandu along with his brother set out to rescue Indu. After a brief struggle with Shafi and his uncle Shankar, he rescues Indu.

Half Past Dead 2 is a 2007 American action film starring Kurupt, Bill Goldberg, Angell Conwell and Robert Madrid. In the sequel, inmate Twitch gets himself transferred to another prison where he crosses path with Burke. After a gang war breaks in the prison, Cortez takes Twitch’s girlfriend and Burke’s daughter hostage. Twitch and Burke must join hands to save their loved ones.

Fool N Final is a 2007 Hindi comedy starring Sunny Deol, Shahid Kapoor, Ayesha Takia, Sameera Reddy, Vivek Oberoi and others. A really valuable diamond is sent from India to Dubai. The man responsible for collecting it at the airport is kidnapped and the diamond is stolen from him. A team of amateur thieves go to steal the diamond. They fail to steal it but see the previous robber get killed. Finally,  they steal the diamond. Now,  there are some really dangerous gangsters and criminals after them.

Veduka is a 2007 released Telugu love story directed by Jitender Y. Starring  Raja,  Poonam Bajwa,  Anuradha Mehta. Harini is a fun loving girl who pranks young boys she meet. She rubs on the wrong side of a psycho Srikar. Srikar is a down to earth person who likes to lead a simple life though he is a son of a rich man. Harini rents out the upper part of her house portion to Srikar. And they fall in love. The rest of the film is all about how they express their love to each other.

Sri Mahalaksmi is a 2007 Telugu suspense thriller film starring Srihari, Shamna. Lakshmi Krishna is an advocate who believes in justice and truth. He believes that God has set his work to give justice to the people. He defends criminals and kills them himself afterwards. He gets upset when his sister's rapists get released by the court.

Munna is a 2007 Telugu action film starring Prabhas and Ileana D'Cruz. Munna is a college student and an orphan who grows up in an orphanage and studies with the help of scholarships.Kakha is the mafia don who lives in the city. In college, Munna fights with Kakha's son and confronts Kakha. Munna becomes 'Mr. dependable' to the locals and starts building his empire to help the needy,  whereas Kakha tries to eliminate Munna. Munna decides to defeat Kakha.

Lake Placid 2 is a 2007 American horror thriller film starring John Schneider, Sarah Lafleur, Sam McMurray and Chad Michael Collins in the lead. It is a sequel to the film Lake Placid released in 1999. Two male and one aggressive female man-eating crocodile, who are protecting their nest, re-appear in the calm waters of Lake Placid, endangering lives of the villagers. Sheriff James Riley teams up with Emma Warner, a wildlife officer to venture out on the lake for rescue, along with their teams.

Adavari Matalaku Ardhale Verule is 2007 Telugu comedy starring Venkatesh, Trisha,  Sriram, Kota, K Viswanath, Swati and Sunil.

Keerthi motivates an unemployed man Ganesh to get a job in a software company. He eventually proposes her. Keerthi is already engaged and refuses the proposal. A sudden tragedy takes place in Keerthi's life that puts him into a tricky situation.

Vacancy is a 2007 American horror film starring Kate Beckinsale and Luke Wilson. When David and Amy’s car breaks down, they check into a motel in an isolated area. The TV at the motel screens violent murder films which David and Amy find entertaining until they realise that all the films were shot in the same room where they had checked in. They couple must find a way to escape from the motel or they could be the next victim to be filmed.

Madurai Veeran in a 2007 Tamil action drama film starring Githan Ramesh and Saloni Aswani. Shiva is the son of a wealthy businessman. Priya is the daughter of a gangster Mayandi. Initially, they keep their distance but fall in love. Shiva's father doesn't approve of their relationship, but Shiva announces his wedding in front of the court. His father brings a battalion of police but is overwhelmed by the number of students present there. They get married happily and are blessed by Priya's father.

Police Story 2 is a 2007 Telugu action movie starring Saikumar and Rockline Venkatesh in lead roles. The story revolves around the rivalry between Agni,  a police officer and Timmakka,  who is a powerful political godmother. Things turn bad for Agni,  when he kills her son,  a rape and a murder convict.
Ganesha, an imminent dancer gets beaten up by Anthony. Hence, he decides to pass on his dancing talent to Raghava. Later, Raghava strives hard to beat Anthony in a dance competition

Lava Kusha is a 2007 Kannada drama film starring Shivrajkumar, Upendra and Charmy Kaur.

The story revolves around two friends Cheeni and Chakri, who con people to make a living. When they separated due to an unexpected turn of events, they go to extreme lengths to strengthen their bond of friendship.

Koodi Balidare is a 2007 Kannada animated movie directed by Venky Babu. The story revolves around four friends,  Vichu,  Varadhu,  Vaithi and Govin,  who desire to be rich and famous. They meet a Swamiji who agrees to help them if they can bring him a necklace from the demon's cave.
Rakhee is a 2006 Telugu action-drama film starring Charmme Kaur, Ileana D'Cruz, Prakash Raj and Suhasini.

Turistas is a 2006 American horror film starring Josh Duhamel and Melissa George in the lead. 
The story revolves around a group of backpackers in Brazil who are marooned in a remote area that holds a dark secret. The group has to fight all odds to survive and escape from the dangerous region.

Ab Humse Na Takrana is a 2006 Hindi-dubbed movie starring Mahesh Babu, Trisha Krishnan and Irrfan Khan. Siddharth along with his friends save a village in Warangal from severe flooding. They wait and are convinced that the government will provide relief to those affected. Turns out, Papu Yadav hogged all of the funds and is contesting for elections. To show his opposition, Siddharth kidnaps Pappu's fiancée, Varalaxmi and is wanted by villains and police alike.

Apna Sapna Money Money is a 2006 Hindi romantic comedy film starring Riteish Deshmukh, Shreyas Talpade, Riya Sen, Celina Jaitley and Anupam Kher. 
A devout Hindu widower is against his daughter Shivani's relationship with their neighbour Arjun who is a Christian. Arjun, along with his friend Kishen tries to stop Shivani's father from getting her married to another man. Arjun and Shivani's life takes a turn when Kishen trying to escape from his money lenders, disguises himself as Arjun's aunt.

Autograph Please is a 2006 Kannada romantic film starring Sanjana, Akash Shetty, Sangeeta Shetty, Naveen Mayur. Satya is an aspiring filmmaker who is in love with Preethi, a rich orphan. Spoorthi is in love with Satya and is determined to marry him. The two marry but Satya cannot forget Preethi and is indifferent to his wife Spoorthi. ls.

The Covenant is a 2006 American horror thriller film starring Steven Strait, Taylor Kitsch, Toby Hemingway, Chace Crawford, Sebastian Stan, Laura Ramsey and Jessica Lucas. Four boys who are born with superpowers are bound by their supernatural ancestry. Secrets begin to unravel, when a dead body of a student is discovered at the Spencer Academy. Will these four students break the covenant of silence that has been protecting their families?

Jane Hoga Kya is a 2006 Hindi thriller film starring Aftab Shivdasani, Bipasha Basu, Rahul Dev, Paresh Rawal, Tinnu Anand, Preeti Jhangiani. A scientist successfully makes his own clone. However things go awry when the clone disappears from the lab. The clone commits murder for which the scientist is put behind bars.

February 14 is a 2005 Indian Tamil romance film directed by debutant S. P. Hosimin. Produced by Sri Saravanaa Creations, the film stars Bharath and Renuka Menon, whilst its soundtrack was composed by Bharathwaj.
Shiva falls in love with Pooja, a girl raised in the US, who is in India visiting her grandparents. When she wants to return to the US, he creates a fictitious character to impress her.

The Smart Hunt is a 2006 Hindi dubbed crime thriller film starring Kamal Haasan, Jyothika and Prakash Raj. A police officer’s daughter’s finger is found at his door. When she turns out to be dead, detective Raghavan investigates the case. The police officer is killed in New York and Raghavan works with the NYPD. A series of murders with similar stories come up, thus making it clear that it is a serial killer who is after them.

Bommarillu is a 2006 Telugu romantic comedy starring Siddharth,  Genelia D'Souza,  Prakash Raj,  Jayasudha and others. The film questions how much hold parents should have over their grown children. A young man is fed up of his father's interference in his life. He wants to live life on his own terms. But his father arranges his marriage to someone he doesn't even like. He likes another girl whom he brings home after his father sees him with her. The man applies for a loan to start his own company.

Gandugali Kumararama is a 2006 Kannada biographical drama film starring Shivrajkumar, Rambha and Anitha. The story is based on the life of warrior prince Kumara Rama.
The story revolves around Kumara Rama, a warrior prince, whose lover gets married to his father and becomes his step mother. Despite this personal crisis and being falsely accused by his step mother, Kumara remains loyal to his father and wins many battles for him.

Omkara is a 2006 Hindi action drama film starring Ajay Devgn, Saif Ali Khan, Kareena Kapoor and Vivek Oberoi. The film is an adaption of Shakespeare’s novel ‘Othello’. The film won three National Awards and seven Filmfare Awards.

The story revolves around Omkara, a gangster who facilitates political crimes. Omkara loves Dolly and they decide to get married. However, Omkara’s close aide, Tyagi, schemes a plan and creates a misunderstanding between Omkara and Dolly. Will Tyagi succeed in his plan?

Kittu (Telugu: కిట్టు) is a 2006 traditionally animated Indian feature film. It is the first animated film to be made in the Telugu language.It won the prestigious National Film Award and is also credited with AP state award(Nandi Award) as second best children's film in 2006.

Aaruchamy is a 1996 Tamil drama starring Vikram, Anand and Jayasudha. Lakshmi gets married with the condition to keep both the brothers with her. But soon her family sends them to an orphanage. Lakshmi while trying to protect her brothers loses her memory.

Cyanide is a 2006 Kannada drama  starring Ravi Kale,  Malavika Avinash,  Tara and Rangayana Raghu. The plot of the film set in and around Bangalore from 1 August to 20 August 1991,  deals with incidents surrounding the assassins of former Indian Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi.

Vikram Singh Rathode IPS is a 2006 Hindi-dubbed action movie starring Ravi Teja and Anushka Shetty. 

Shiva is a local thug who resorts to petty thefts along with his friend 2G. He falls in love with a girl and plans on leaving robbery after the last heist. He steals a girl's bag and sees the photo of his lookalike who is a brave and valiant cop

Yanda Kartavya Aahe is a 2006 Marathi romantic comedy film starring Ankush Choudhary and Smita Shewale. The movie is the third venture of ace director Kedar Shinde.
Yanda Kartavya Aahe is the story of a newly-wed couple’s honeymoon and how the two eventually get involved in each other emotionally.

Hollow Man 2 is a 2006 American science fiction thriller film starring Christian Slater, Peter Facinelli and Laura Regan. After an invisible man kills a scientist for a formula, detectives Frank and Lisa are hired to solve the case. The detectives need to protect Dr. Maggie who could possibly be the next victim and also find the invisible hollow man.

Aatma is a 2006 horror film starring Kapil Jhaveri, Neha and Vikram Singh. A doctor is approached by a gun-toting couple on the beach who threaten him and ask him to sign a Death Certificate for a male named Avinash Malhotra,  pronouncing his death due to natural causes. They also pay him. The doctor is reluctant to prepare this document,  but when his wife's life is threatened,  he has to do it. The angry spirit of the dead male possesses his wife. What will the doctor do?

Godavari is a 2006 Telugu romance film starring Sumanth,  Kamalinee Mukherjee,  Neetu Chandra and others. 

The story takes aboard a boat called Godavari where Ram and Seetha meet. Ram is sad as he wanted to marry Raji. But Raji's father had other plans for her,  so now Ram is on his way attend her wedding. Seetha married under pressure from her parents,  but now she isn't happy in her marriage. Seetha likes Ram. But due to turn of events,  Raji asks Ram to marry her. Ram plans to elope with Raji.

Tapori Wanted is a 2006 Hindi dubbed action film starring Mahesh Babu, Ileana D’cruz and Prakash Raj. A local goon joins an underworld gang and soon wins their trust by eliminating rival gang. However, his true intent is revealed after the mysterious death of his own gang members, which forces the most wanted international don, Ali Bhai, to return to India.

36 China Town is a 2006 is a Hindi thriller movie starring  Akshaye Khanna, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Shahid Kapoor, Esha Koppikar and Upen Patel. Sonia Chang, a wealthy casino owner who lives in 36 China town is found murdered. Police suspect her debtors, staff and friends. Raj and Sonia find Sonia's kidnapped son and reach her mansion to return the boy. Things complicate when police question the suspects who share their version of the crime scene but fail to produce any alibi.

Shaadi Se Pehle is a 2006 Hindi romantic comedy starring Akshaye Khanna, Ayesha Takia and Mallika Sherawat. 
The story revolves around Ashish, a youngster who is in love with Rani but circumstances forces him to lie. A series of lies puts Ashish in trouble and he must find a way out of the mess.

Ram is a 2006 Telegu drama film starring Nitin, Genelia D'Souza, Hrishitaa Bhatt. Raam is an upcoming cycle champion from Hyderabad. He reaches Mumbai for the final round of a competition when life takes a turn and he is tangled in his family affairs. Does he get success

Humko Tumse Pyaar Hai is a 2005 Hindi romantic film starring Arjun Rampal, Ameesha Patel, Bobby Deol and others. A poor blind girl loses her lover at the same time as she gains her eyesight. He is killed by an evil man who wanted to marry the girl. Soon she meets a good man who wants to marry her. She agrees. At their engagement party, her fiance's friend shows up. He resembles her first boyfriend. She is united with him with her fiance's approval.

7 O' Clock is a 2006 Kannada romantic thriller starring Pooja Kanwal, Mithun Tejaswi, Nithya Menon, Sneha and others. A soon to be doctor plays pranks by calling random numbers. She calls up a guy one day who outsmarts her. They both decide to meet at 7 o'clock at the railway station. The guy is a painter who is looking for a muse. The 7 o'clock train is late by two hours and the guy's mobile gets stolen. When he goes to her house she isn't there because she's at the railway station waiting for him.

Underworld Evolution is a 2006 American action-adventure film starring Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman and Tony Curran. Selene the vampire warrior loves Michael, a lycan bird. In this sequel, the lovers unite and try to understand the history behind the intense conflicts between their races.

movietitle: Radha Ne Mala Japi Shyam Ki
description: Radha Ne Mala Japi Shyam Ki is a 2006 Hindi movie starring Vipul Roy and Rubina Shergill in the lead roles. The story revolves around a traditional joint family and the issues they face with their younger generation.

Jothe Jotheyali is a 2006 Kannada film romatic drama starring Prem and Ramya. 

The story revolves around a married couple Nakul and Divya who are on the verge of divorce. They have already faced many ups and down in their relationship and eventually when the are about to get divorce, an untoward incident forces them to rethink about their decision.

Jejon Thake Majhkhane is a 2006 romantic drama movie starring Amitabh Bhattacharjee,   Sabyasachi Chakraborty and Arijit Guha. Animesh,   a famous doctor,   is so involved in his job that he ignores his family. Nita,   his wife divorces him and marries Jayanta. Animesh is faced with a moral dichotomy when an accident puts him in the position of saviour to Jayanta. Will he save his ex-wife's current husband or won't he?

The Legend of Zorro is a 2005 American action film starring Antonio Banderas, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Rufus Sewell and Nick Chinlund in the lead. Zorro has promised Eléna that he will give up his secret identity and lead a normal life with her, but when the enemies secretively pose a threat to the state of California, he must step in, as Zorro. Will this breach of promise pull him apart from Eléna?

movietitle: Stuart Little 3: Call of the Wild
description: Stuart Little 3: Call of the Wild is a 2005 American animation comedy film. When Stuart and his family go on a vacation to a lakeside cabin, they learn about a forest beast who threatens all animals to give him food. However, when the beast captures Snowbell, Stuart sets out to rescue her.

Sehar is a 2005 Hindi action drama film starring Arshad Warsi and Mahima Chaudhary. The movie is loosely based on the encounter of the notorious criminal of a notorious gangster from UP. 
The story revolves around officer Ajay Kumar who sets up a special task force to curb criminal activities and arrest notorious crime boss Gajraj Singh. Ajay Kumar and his team are determined to eradicate organised crime from Lucknow.

Stealth is a 2005 American Sci-Fi action film starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Jamie Foxx in the lead. The story is about three skilled fighter pilots who join a secret project of preparing an automated robotic stealth aircraft ahead of a war.

Urban Legends: Bloody Mary is a 2005 American horror film starring Kate Mara, Robert Vito, Tina Lifford and Ed Marinaro. After a prom night, Samantha, Gina and Mindy chant an incantation, which unleashes the spirit of Mary, who was killed years ago. What follows is a series of mysterious deaths inciting the girls to find out what happened transpired with Mary, years ago.

Oka Oorilo is a 2005 Telugu romance film starring Saloni,  Tarun and Raja. Ravi,  Seenu,  and Lalitha are childhood friends from a remote village. As a kid Ravi moves to town and loses contact with both of his friends. As Seenu and Lalitha grown up together,  they fall in love. Seenu and Lalitha elope because Seenu's father opposes their love. They meet Ravi who at once who gives them shelter. Suddenly,  Seenu goes missing.

Aparichit The Stranger is a 2005 Hindi thriller starring Vikram, Prakash Raj, Sadha, Vivek, Yana Gupta. Aparichit is one of the multiple personalities of Ambi. He punishes criminals without  Ambi actually knowing about all it. Aparichit must bring peace in society without doing any harm to Ambi.

Koti (Arjun) is a brutal murderer. This is because his mother died when he was just 6 months old, and then his teacher died when he was 4 years old. He decides that he's not going to watch helplessly any more as people around him die, and so starts killing them himself. If Sigmund Freud had heard this script, he'd have killed himself when he was 6 years old.

Confession Of A Young Bride is a 2005 American romantic comedy film starring Shannon Elizabeth, Eddie McClintock and Geoff Stults. Samantha and Ben are to get married but demanding parents and interfaith dilemmas stresses out Samantha. Just then Luke, a handsome hunk from Samantha's past, enters her life again.

Vampires: The Turning is a 2005 American action horror film starring Colin Egglesfield, Stephanie Chao and Patrick Bauchau. Connor, a Muay-Thai fighter, visits Thailand for vacation with his girlfriend Amanda. When Amanda is kidnapped by a vampire lord, Connor joins forces with a group of vampire hunters to track down the vampire and save his girlfriend.

movietitle: Wild Things: Diamonds in the Rough
description: Wild Things: Diamonds in the Rough is a 2005 American erotic thriller starring Sandra McCoy, Serah D'Laine, Linden Ashby and Dina Meyer. Marie is to inherit two diamonds of her late mother, but Marie’s step-father Jay challenges the will. When Elena, Marie’s classmate, accuses Jay of rape and tries to claim the diamonds, Marie must find a way to win the diamonds.

Pak Pak Pakaak is a 2005 Marathi adventure comedy film starring Nana Patekar, Saksham Kulkarni and Narayani Shastri. 
The story revolves around Chiklu, a mischievous boy who enters the forest, against his family and villager’s advice. In the haunted forest he encounters Bhootya, a ghost. Chiklu and Bhootya became friends and Bhootya teaches him to respect nature and life.

Socha Naa Tha is a 2005 Hindi romantic comedy starring Abhay Deol and Ayesha Takia. The film marked the debut of Actor Abhay Deol and director Imtiaz Ali.
Socha Naa Tha revolves around Viren and Aditi who are introduced by their families but Viren refuses the proposal as he’s already dating Karen. However, Viren and Aditi meet again as friends, get very close and realize their love for each other. Will Viren marry Karen or would it be Aditi?

Shanti is a 2005 Drama movie starring a sole actress Bhavana. Shanti, an illustrator and painter, is chosen to create the logo of a world peace conference. However, she is kidnapped by terrorists who want to blow up the conference. The film features only a single actor and hence has found an entry in the Guinness World Records In the category Fewest actors in a narrative film.  A dove in the film is used as a symbol for peace and guns are used to portray war and terror.

Bewafaa is 2005 Hindi romantic drama film starring Akshay Kumar, Anil Kapoor, Manoj Bajpayee, Kareena Kapoor, Sushmita Sen and Shamita Shetty. The film revolves around the life of Anjali who is forced to marry her brother-in-law Aditya for the sake of his kids after the death of her sister Aarti. However her world comes crashing down when she meets her ex-lover Raja. While she wishes to rekindle her romance with Raja, she is torn between her duties as wife and mother and her former lover.

Jurm is a 2005 Hindi thriller film starring Bobby Deol, Lara Dutta and Milind Soman. 

The story revolves around Avinash, an industrialist, who is arrested for his wife’s murder. Though all evidences prove Avinash guilty, Avinash himself is unsure if he committed the crime. He seeks help from his lawyer friend Rohit who takes up his case. Can Rohit prove Avinash innocent?
Chita is 2005 Bengali action film starring Mithun Chakraborty, Rambha and Kaushik Banerjee.

Kisna is a 2005 Hindi romantic drama starring Vivek Oberoi and Isha Sharvani. 
Set in 1930s the story revolves around Kisna, a young Indian, who is engaged to Laxmi. When Catherine, a British woman, arrives in India and is threatened by an Indian mob, Kisna takes it upon himself to escort Catherine to the British High Commission, for safe passage back to England. The small journey leaves a lasting impression in the lives of Kisna and Catherine.

Insan is a 2005 action film, starring Akshay Kumar, Esha Deol, Ajay Devgan and Lara Dutta. Inspector Rathod is after terrorist Azhar. Amjad is an autorickshaw driver who falls in love with Heena. Struggling actor Avinash helps Amjad profess his love for her. Inspector Rathod is still haunted by his wife’s death. Azhar turns out to be Amjad’s brother. Amjad is horrified to learn he’s a terrorist. He helps Inspector Rathod in bringing him to justice.

Ab Tumhare Hawale Watan Saathiyo is a 2004 Hindi action drama film starring Amitabh Bachchan, Akshay Kumar and Bobby Deol. The story revolves around Major Amarjit Singh and his family who dedicate their life for the Indian army.
Major Amarjeet Singh’s son Vikramjeet joins the army but gets killed. Years later, when Vikramjeet’s son, Kunal, is expected to join the army, he prefers to settle abroad and make money. Will Kunal realize the pride and honour associated with serving the army?

Aitraaz is a 2004 Hindi romantic thriller starring Akshay Kumar, Kareena Kapoor and Priyanka Chopra. The film revolves around the theme of sexual harassment.
Raj is happily married to Priya and is expecting a promotion at work. Trouble begins when Raj's boss arrives with his newlywed wife Soniya, who's none other than Raj's ex-girlfriend. When Sonia accuses Raj of sexual harassment, he must prove his innocence.

Sniper 3 is a 2004 action adventure film starring Tom Berenger, Byron Mann, Denis Arndt and John Doman in the lead. NSA officials hire Beckett, a sniper for a secret mission against a suspected terrorist in Vietnam. Finnegan, the terrorist turns out to be Beckett’s war buddy, who he thought had died. Beckett gets on to investigating the purpose of the mission, when he suspects his employer’s real motives.

Aar Paar is a 2004 Hindi romantic drama starring Nithiin and Genelia D'Souza. The story is set in a college where two rival groups are vying for the upper hand. Every squirmish is settled with a rugby match. But when the college land falls into the hands of a local goon they come together. Group leaders Prithvi and Shashank bury the hatchet and get back the land. The goon dares the students for a rugby match with his own group. What happens next? Do the students win or lose?

Kung Fu Hustle is a 2004 Hong Kong-Chinese action comedy film starring Stephen Chow, Yuen Wah, Yuen Qiu, Danny Chan Kwok-kwan and Bruce Leung Siu-lung. Sing, a thief, wishes to become a part of the dreaded ‘Axe Gang’, however, when he attempts to rob an apartment called the Pig Sty Ally, the residents defend themselves using their high-end Kung Fu skills.

movietitle: Anacondas: The Hunt For The Blood Orchid
description: Anacondas: The Hunt For The Blood Orchid is a 2004 adventure thriller starring Johnny Messner, KaDee Strickland, Salli Richardson Whitfield and Matthew Marsden. A group biologist travel into Amazon rainforest in search of Blood Orchid, a flower which is believed to be the key for everlasting youth. However, the team soon runs into trouble when they get trapped in an area infested with anacondas.

Kyun! Ho Gaya Na is a 2004 Hindi romantic film starring Vivek Oberoi, Aishwarya Rai and Amitabh Bachchan. 

The story revolves around Diya and Arjun, who love each other but Arjun doesn’t confess his love. A heartbroken Diya leaves for her uncle’s home and Arjun follows her. However, he finds that Diya has decided to marry her childhood friend Ishaan. Will Arjun ever confess his love for Diya?

Qatilon Ka Qatil is a dubbed 2004 drama starring Chitra Shenoy and Darshan Thoogudeep. Balu has been destined to pass away at the ripe age of 25 years. His grandma makes him worshop Lord Yama so that he can make this horrible end go away. She sends him to the US. But Balu wanders around and turns into a bum. So Lord Yama himself comes to Balu, hoping to improve his prospects. He makes him fall in love with Swapna. Perhaps that will make Balu ‘live long and prosper’.

Aan: Men at Work is a 2004 action film starring Akshay Kumar, Suneil Shetty, Shatrughan Sinha and Paresh Rawal. DCP Patnaik arrives at the Mumbai Crime Branch to help weed out the corruption and drudgery faced by the police department. He is aided by Appa Kadam and Inspector Singh. They are under pressure from politicians and businessmen who use underworld dons to do their bidding. But Patnaik galvanizes the force to take action against criminals.

Cruel Intentions 3 is a 2004 American drama film starring Kerr Smith, Kristina Anapau and Nathan Wetherington. Cassidy, a manipulative student, challenges her friends Jason and Patrick to seduce Sheila and Alison, the two most popular girls in college. However, things turn ugly when Patrick rapes Alison to fulfil the bet.

Run is a 2004 Hindi romantic action film starring Abhishek Bachchan and Bhumika Chawla. 
The story of Run revolves around Siddharth and Jhanvi, a young couple in love, who face opposition from Jhanvi's gangster brother, Ganpat. The film is best remembered for comedian Vijay Raaz's cracking performance.

Arya- Ek Deewana is a 2004 released Drama movie featuring Allu Arjun, Navdeep,  Kajal Aggarwal and Shraddha Das. The story revolves around two friends Arya and Ajay. They both lived together in an orphanage. Arya believed Ajay to be his best friend but Ajay just put a mask of being his friend. When they grow up,  Arya joins Ajay's company. Soon,  they both fall in love with Geetha. Ajay some how manages to win over her cleverly. Arya,  must find his real face and propose Geetha.

Arya Ki Prem Pratigya is a 2004 romantic drama. It stars Allu Arjun, Anu Mehta and Siva Balaji. The film is a love triangle between Geetha, Ajay and Arya. Ajay blackmails Geetha into accepting him by threatening suicide. Geetha doesn’t want a guy to die because of her and she accepts. Earlier in the film a guy had dived into the sea to retrieve her anklet which had fallen in the water. Geetha thinks that guy is dead. But he is Arya who helps Geetha and Ajay elope. Will Geetha marry Ajay?

Wild Things 2 is a 2004 erotic thriller starring Susan Ward, Leila Arcieri, Isaiah Washington and Linden Ashby. When Brittney’s step father Dunlap passes away, he leaves a will as per which Brittney would get just a small amount per year while the rest of the wealth will go to a trust, unless a blood heir is found. Maya, Brittney’s classmate, claims to be Dunlap’s illegitimate child which gets proved by a DNA test. What will be Brittney’s next move to acquire the wealth.

Savarkhed: Ek Gaav is a Marathi crime thriller film starring Ankush Choudhary, Makarand Anaspure and Upendra Limaye. Savarkhed is a village divided. One group believes that the village should concentrate on, agriculture. The other group is interested in industrialization for a better future. Rahul, the son of the local MLA returns from his studies much to the delight of his friend Suresh. Then, strange occurrences begin in the village and grips the village in fear. What is happening and why?

Police Police is an 2004 Hindi-dubbed crime drama film starring Ravi Teja, Sneha and Ashutosh Rana. Venky and three of his companions get chosen for the police training. They board a train where an old man and a young lady get killed and they turn into the suspects as they were in the same compartment. They risk their lives and discover the truth behind the killings. In the process he protects Sarvani, the old man's daughter, and they fall in love.

Avale Nanna Gelathi is a 2000 Indian Kannada Romantic language film directed by Om Saiprakash. The film features Vijay Raghavendra, Rakshitha, Devaraj, Vishal Hegde, Ashitha, Avinash and others. The movie describes friendship dwelling in love.

50 First Dates is a 2004 American romantic comedy starring Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Rob Schneider and Sean Astin. Henry is a commitment phobic until he meets Lucy and is assured that he has found the woman of his dreams. However, Lucy suffers from short term memory loss and fails to remember Henry every next day. How will Henry cope with this problem?

Diler- The Daring is a 2004 Hindi mythological fantasy thriller film featuring Chiranjeevi, Bhupinder Singh, Tinnu Anand, Namrata Shirodkar and Nagendra Babu. The movie revolves around Atmalingam which had supernatural powers in it. The evil eye of Bhatia traced the Atmalingam. He found the Professor who did detailed study on it. The professor handed over the diary to Swapna. Meanwhile,  Anji accidentaly discovers Atmalingam. Now, he must save it from Bhatia and even protect Swapna.

movietitle: Shriman Shrimati Lekin Abhi Shadi Nahi Hui
description: Shriman Shrimati Lekin Abhi Shadi Nahi Hui is a 2004 dubbed Hindi drama starring Shivaji and Laila. Krishna and Shailaja are both traveling to Annavaram to seek Lord Satyanarayana’s blessings. They both happen to share the same berth on a train and are forced to share the same room when they arrive at Annavaram. How will they deal with this unforeseen situation?
Munna Bhai is a dubbed Bengali movie starring Jr. NTR. The movie has been directed by Puri Jagannadh.

Matrubhoomi: A Nation Without Women is a 2003 futuristic drama starring Tulip Joshi, Sudhir Pandey and Piyush Mishra. In dystopian rural Bihar female foeticide and infanticide have wiped out female population, leading to sexual frustration among males. They go to any extent to procure wives for themselves. A wealthy man buys a young woman Kalki, for his five sons. Only the youngest son treats her kindly, but he is killed by his brothers. Kalki becomes pregnant and gives birth to a baby girl.

Kagaar is a 2003 Hindi action drama starring Om Puri, Amitabh Dayal and Nandita Das. 
Kagaar’s story revolves around Bhaskar, an honest police officer, who is framed by an underworld don Adi, due to which he is suspended from his services. The police believe Bhaskar works for Adi. Bhaskar then vows to clear his name and get back his lost respect.

Boom is a 2003 Indian film starring Amitabh Bachchan, Jackie Shroff, Gulshan Grover and Katrina Kaif. This film was Katrina Kaif debut film in Bollywood.

Hundreds of diamonds were to be stolen and smuggled to crime boss, Bade Miya, in Dubai, but during a fashion show models Anu, Sheila and Rina unintentionally foil a heist plan. In order to recover the diamonds, the gangsters start chasing the models and they must find a way to get out of trouble.

Jaal-The Trap is a 2003 Hindi action film starring Sunny Deol, Tabu and Amrish Puri. The story revolves around Ajay, the son of army officer Major Amrish Kaul. Ajay falls in love with Neha, a widow, and struggles to get approval to marry her. However, when Neha is kidnapped by a terrorist group, Ajay is forced to kidnap Anita, the home minister's daughter. While doing so Ajay discovers a shocking truth.

Bad Boys II is a 2003 American action-comedy film starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Jordi Molla and Gabrielle Union. In this sequel, Police officers Mike and Marcus investigate the flow of Ecstasy drugs into Miami. Their hunt leads them to a dangerous drug lord who can go to any extent to expand his business and take over the city’s drug trade.

Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines is a 2003 Sci-Fi action film starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl and Edward Furlong. John has met his future wife Kate whose father oversees the military computer systems. When a Skynet virus infects the military systems, the machines start taking over and a war is about to begin. The Terminator arrives to protect John and his wife from the robotic attack.

Identity is a 2003 American thriller film starring John Cusack, Ray Liotta and Amanda Peet. During a rainstorm, ten strangers find themselves stranded at an isolated motel in Nevada. The strangers soon get friendly with each other and decide to spend the night at the motel. However, they soon realise that some stranger is killing them one by one.

Yodha No. 1 is a Hindi dubbed 2003 Telugu action comedy film starring Ravi Teja, Asin and Prakash Raj. The film was a huge success and won three Filmfare Awards in South.
The story revolves around Chandu, a kickboxer, who after his mother’s death travels to meet his estranged father, Raghuveer, who runs a kickboxing academy. When Raghuveer’s best student Anand, gets greedy and abandons the academy, Raghuveer looks for a replacement and discovers Chandu. Can Chandu win the championship for his father?

Sniper 2 is a 2003 American action film starring Tom Beranger, Bokeem Woodbine, Dan Butler and Linden Ashby. Thomas, a former marine sniper, is lured back to take up a secret mission of assassinating a Serbian General. For this Thomas must team up with Jake, a death row convict.

Khushi is a 2003 Hindi romantic film starring Kareena Kapoor and Fardeen Khan. The film is remake of the superhit Tamil film of the same name.
Khushi is the story of Karan and Khushi who love each but are kept apart due to their inflated egos. The film highlights the problems faced by couples today where they may not face opposition from parents but have to deal the own egos.

Dum is a 2003 Hindi action drama film, starring Vivek Oberoi, Diya Mirza, Atul Kulkarni and others. Uday joins the police academy and falls in love with Kaveri. He becomes an upright policeman. Meanwhile corrupt inspector Shankar (Encounter Shankar) molests Kaveri and this enrages Uday. He takes on him and Shankar decides to toy with Uday’s life and make him suffer. This leads to a conflict between these two men at different ends of the police spectrum.

Half Past Dead is a 2002 American action film starring Steven Seagal, Morris Chestnut, Ja Rule and Nia Peeples. Sasha, a criminal mastermind, enters a high tech prison to persuade an inmate to reveal the whereabouts of $200 million worth of gold.

Shakti-The Power is a 2002 Hindi action drama starring Karisma Kapoor, Nana Patekar, and Sanjay Kapoor. Karisma and Nana Patekar's performance was acclaimed and they both were nominated for the Best Actor Female and Male categories. 
Shakti- The Power is about Nandini who struggles to escape from the clutches of his violent father-in-law, who is engaged in feudal gang wars. The film highlights the problems of patriarchal society and the struggle of a mother to protect her son.

Men in Black II is a 2002 American Sci-fi action film starring Tommy Lee Jones and Will Smith in the lead. It is the first sequel to Men in Black film. After retirement of Agent K, he reunites with Agent J to investigate the murder of an alien. Join their journey as Agent J and Agent K, fight against a shape-shifting plant-like Kylothian who takes form of a lingerie model and makes evil plans along with her two-headed servant.

movietitle: Kuch Tum Kaho Kuch Hum Kahein
description: Kuch Tum Kaho Kuch Hum Kahein is a 2002 romance drama film starring Fardeen Khan and Richa Pallod. Abhay and Mangala fall in love with each other, only to realize that their families are rivals. Abhay decides to sacrifice his love to reunite the family. Mangala is to get married to Vikram to reconcile the family; she elopes. Abhay gets her back and the family understands their love for each other. Abhay and Mangala get married and the families reconcile.

Panic Room is a 2002 American thriller film starring Jodie Foster and Kristen Stewart in the lead. Meg, a divorced mother moves into a new house with her 11-year old diabetic daughter Sarah. When three intruders break in their house for $3 million bearer bonds, Sarah and Meg hide themselves in a secret room. Meg leaves no stone unturned to save her daughter who suffers a seizure, when they are stay put in the room.

Swapner Pheriwala is a 2002 Bengali drama starring Subrata Dutta,  Ferdous Ahmed,  Nilanjana Sharma. Two street-smart magicians help a young woman save her family from the clutches of a fake godman who schemes on seizing their house and abusing the young woman.

Company is a 2002 Hindi action crime thriller film starring Mohanlal, Manisha Koirala, Vivek Oberoi, Ajay Devgan and Antara Mali. The film revolves around Chandu who enters the crime world and works with a dreaded gangster Mallik. While the gangs expands its supremacy over Mumbai underworld, tension begins to brew between Chandu and Mallik. They eventually fall apart leading to a gang war.

Koi Mere Dil Se Poochhe is a 2002 Hindi Romantic film starring Aftab Shivdasani and Eshal Deol.
The story revolves around Aman, a fashion designer, who loves Esha but she declines his proposal. However, they soon fall in love and decide to marry. Trouble begins when Dushyant shows up claiming to be Esha's husband. Who would Esha marry?

Vidhaata The Suprimo is a 2002 Hindi dubbed action film starring Balakrishna, Simran Bagga and Reema Sen. Visweswara Rao & Chandra Sekhar are best friends and have a kid each. Visweswara Rao is a business magnate & Chandra Sekhar is a police officer. He arrests a dreaded goon. The goon's men kidnap Visweswara Rao son as hostage. If Chandra Sekhar does not release him, he will be getting a promotion & prize money of 5 lakhs. He becomes selfish,  which results in the death of Visweswara Rao's son.

Thirteen Ghosts is a 2001 Canadian-American horror film starring Tony Shalhoub, Embeth Davidtz, Matthew Lillard and Shannon Elizabeth. After the death of Cyrus, the ghost hunter, his nephew Arthur inherits his glass house and moves in with his family. Trouble begins when Arthur finds that the house serves as a prison to 12 vengeful ghosts trying to free themselves.

Ishtam is a 2012 Tamil romance film starring Vimal and Nisha Aggarwal. Saravanan and Sandhya are modern individuals hailing from a city and a village respectively. They meet while going for an interview. Initially after some fights they decided to get married which their families oppose. After few months they start fighting again and get divorced. They agree comply with their parents' decision to find a new partner. But then the love between them resurfaces.

Pyar Ishq Aur Mohabbat is a 2001 romantic film, starring Arjun Rampal, Sunil Shetty, Aftab Shivdasani, Keerti Reddy and others. A medical student Isha,  goes to Scotland for advanced research. Her wealthy suitor Yash hires a man to go with her and make her fall in love with Yash.

While in Scotland another wealthy man falls in love with Isha. But she falls in love with the man Yash hired. He loves her too. Yash asks him to break Isha's heart so she can go running into Yash's arms. Will he do it?

Yaadein is a 2001 romantic film starring Hrithik Roshan,  Jackie Shroff,  Kareena Kapoor and others. Raj Singh Puri raises his three daughters,  Avantika,  Sania and Isha. Isha doesn’t believe in love,  but falls for Ronit Malhotra. Ronit has an uncle J K Malhotra who always looks down upon Raj Puri. This comes to a head when Raj opposes Ronit getting married to someone else,  but the other Malhotras manage to convince their patriarch that Raj is right. Ronit and Isha finally get married.

Gadar: Ek Prem Katha is a 2001 Hindi action drama film featuring Sunny Deol, Amisha Patel and Amrish Puri. The story revolves around the partition of India. Tara Singh falls in love with a muslim girl, saves her life from fellow Sikhs and eventually, marries her. They live happily until Sakina's father enters their life and hatches a plan to separate the two. Sakina moves to Pakistan while Tara struggles to reunite with his love.

Little John is a 2001 trilingual fantasy film starring Jyothika and Bentley Mitchum. 

The story revolves around John, an American student, who comes to India to research on the Mookuththi temple. He stays at Vasu’s house and gets attracted to Vasu’s sister Vaani. However, when the Mookuththi (nose stud) goes missing, the cops suspect John for the theft. John seeks help from a Swamiji, who accidentally puts a powder of John which makes him very small in size. Can John prove his innocence?

The Tailor of Panama is a 2001 Irish-American thriller starring Pierce Brosnan, Geoffrey Rush and Jamie Lee Curtis. When MI6 spy Andy is reassigned to Panama, he comes across Harry Pendel, a tailor whose clients includes the elites of Panama. Andy lures Harry to work for him and get information for him.

Snatch is a 2000 British crime comedy film starring Jason Statham, Stephen Graham and Brad Pitt in the lead. The story has two main plots, one is about the search of a stolen diamond and the other is about an unlicensed boxing promoter named Turkish who is indebted to a brutal gangster.

Mahakali Ka Insaaf is a 2001 Hindi dubbed Tamil movie starring Bhanupriya, Ramki and Ramya Krishnan. 
A tribal girl is molested and is killed by a group of men the night before her wedding. The men kill her fiance too. The girl takes birth again and seeks her revenge.

Antarghaat is a 2010 Bengali drama starring Victor Banerjee,  Debashree Roy,  Sabyasachi Chakraborty and others. 
Pratap’s sister is raped and killed by Meghnad. Angered by this,  Pratap takes the law in his own hands and kills Meghnad. However,  Meghnad’s son,  Avinash is a police officer. He imprisons Pratap for this crime. Years later,  when he’s released,  Pratap decides to take revenge upon officer Avinash by going after him.

movietitle: Raja Ko Rani Se Pyar Ho Gaya
description: Raja Ko Rani Se Pyar Ho Gaya is a 2000 Hindi Comedy musical film Arvind Swamy,Manisha Koirala,Dilip Dhawan,Vanessa Francis lead roles.

Vertical Limit is a 2000 American action, adventure film starring Chris O'Donnell, Bill Paxton and Robin Tunney. Annie, a mountain climber, sets out on an expedition to K2, the highest and most dangerous mountain. However, when Annie and her team is trapped in a crevice, her brother Peter assembles a team for the rescue operation. Having retired from mountain climbing years ago after a tragic accident, Peter must return to climbing to save his dear sister.

The 6th Day is a 2000 American action film based on science fantasy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Tony Goldwyn, Michael Rapaport and Robert Duvall in the lead. Set in future, where cloning is a part of everyday lives, the story is about Adam Gibson who learns about some MNC that is into illegal cloning of human beings.  His search for the culprit begins when he encounters his own clone, who has been duplicated as part of a conspiracy.

movietitle: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Rehta Hain
description: Jis Desh Mein Ganga Rehta Hain is a 2000 romantic comedy,  starring Govinda, Sonali Bendre, Rinke Khanna and others. A simple village man lives with his parents and has a girlfriend. Before he is to marry his parents inform him that his real biological parents livs in the city. He goes to the city and finds that his parents are very wealthy. After facing a murder accusation,  the man is unable to adjust to the fast paced and corrupt city life and prefers to return to his village and marry his girlfriend.

Urban Legends: Final Cut is a 2000 American horror thriller film starring Jennifer Morrison, Matthew Davis, Hart Bochner and Joseph Lawrence. When Amy decides to base her thesis film on Urban Legends, she finds that her crew members are getting killed under mysterious circumstances. She must find out the truth about the killer before she becomes a victim herself.

Hamara Dil Aapke Paas Hai is a 2000 Hindi drama film starring Anil Kapoor and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan. 
The story revolves around Preeti who is raped by Babloo Choudhry for testifying against his brother in court. Preeti’s own family disowns her and she leaves her house. She finds shelter with Avinash, who treats her like a friend. Will this friendship mature into love?

Hollow Man is a 2000 science fiction thriller film starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens. Dr. Sebastian develops a serum that can make any person invisible. He decides to test the serum on himself and turns invisible but fails to return to the normal visible state. As a result, he is kept locked in the laboratory but his obsession with Linda makes him violent and goes on a killing spree.

Yuvaraju is a 2000 Telugu romantic drama starring Mahesh Babu, Simran, Sakshi Sivanand and others. Srinivas falls in love with Srivalli. When they are about to get engaged, a woman Srilatha arrives with a kid. What is the connection between Srinivas and Srilatha?

Pukar is a 2000 Hindi action drama film starring Anil Kapoor, Madhuri Dixit and Danny Denzongpa. The film won two National awards including Best Actor Award for Anil Kapoor.Pukar is the story of Major Jai, his courage, passion and the sacrifices he makes for the country. Jai is assigned the task capture Abhrush, a most wanted terrorist, who is planning a huge attack on India. Can Jai thwart his plans?

American Psycho is a 2000 American crime thriller starring Christian Bale, Willem Dafoe, Jared Leto and Josh Lucas. Patrick Bateman, an investment banker, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from all. During the day he works hard and by the night he turns wild and violent. When his illogical fantasies escalate, and he submits to an uncontrollable bloodlust.

Bulandi is a 2000 Hindi action drama film starring Anil Kapoor, Rajinikanth and Rekha. 

The story revolves around the Thakur family of Bharatpur who are considered the head of the village. After the death of Ghajraj Thakur, his son Dada Thakur takes over his position and punishes Jagganth in a rape case. Years later, when Dada Thakur’s son Arjun is accused of raping a woman, the villagers expect Dada Thakur to give Arjun a fair punishment.

Khoon Ka Rishta is a 2000 Hindi-dubbed action drama film starring Chiranjeevi, Ravi Teja and Soundarya. Rajaram raises his two younger brothers with great care. He throws them out when they come drunk to their engagement. The brothers hold a grudge against Rajaram not knowing the fact that Rajaram sells his property to secure a business deal for his brothers. His brothers want to repay him the favour but are injured and put in a hospital. A battle commences in which Rangarao dies.

Mrugajal-Ek Naslela Astitva is a 2000 Marathi sci-fi thriller and drama starring Sachin Khedekar, Tushar Dalvi and Resham Seth. Shantanu and Sharmila have a daughter named Meeta. After eight years in Mumbai they move to Pune. Meeta starts school here. Their peaceful life is interrupted when Meeta starts having nightmares. Sharmila complains of being stalked by an unknown male.

Yuvakudu, A telugu Romantic sentiment movie released in 2000 starring Sumanth,  Jayasudha and Bhoomika Chawla. 
Yuvakudu,  is a story of a young man,  Siva who falls in love with Sindhu. Sindhu initially rejects him. Siva is ambitious to join army and serve the nation. Sindhu does not like this idea,  which is a cause of separation between them. Siva’s mother becomes instrumental in convincing Sindhu. Will she succeed,  will Siva and Sindhu unite?

Sautela is a 1999 action, drama starring Mithun Chakraborty, Suresh Oberoi, Gulshan Grover, Rami Reddy and others. Raghuvir and Arjun are step-brothers. Raghuvir is the head of village Panchayet. Arjun respects him even though they don't live together. Raguvir's wife and daughter love Arjun but Raghuvir dislikes him. When the local goons try to rape Raghuvir's daughter, Arjun comes to her rescue. Without any knowledge of this, Raghuvir punishes Arjun. Their enemy uses this hatred to his advantage.

Oke Okkadu is a 1999 Telugu action drama film starring Arjun Sarja and Manisha Koirala. Oke Okkadu is the story of Purushottam, a TV reporter who is to interview the Chief Minister. During the interview, Purushottam asks a few valid questions that offend the CM and he in turn challenges Purushottam to occupy his seat for one day. Purushottam accepts the challenge and brings a tremendous change in the state, which irks the CM.

The Bone Collector is a 1999 psychological thriller film starring Denzel Washington and Angelina Jolie in the lead. The story is about Lincoln, a tetraplegic forensics expert, who along with Amelia Donaghy, a police officer, is investigating a series of murders committed by a serial killer who creates havoc in the New York city.
Dhangad Dhinga is a 1999 Marathi romantic comedy film starring Mahesh Kothare, Laxmikant Berde, Kishori Ambiye, Razak Khan and Varsha Usgaonkar.

Bats is a 1999 American sci-fi thriller film starring Lou Diamond Phillips, Dina Meyer and Bob Gunton. In Texas, when an experiment on bats goes wrong, it results in genetically mutated bats who escape and attack people. The bats have become intelligent, vicious, and omnivorous and its up to bat expert Sheila and her team to stop them, before things get worse.

Kanchanmala is a 1999 romantic film starring Kaushik Banerjee, Moumita Chakraborty, Rahul Chakraborty. 

The story is about a village boy named, Kanchan, who falls in love with the King's daughter, Mala. What happens next is the hardships Kanchan and Mala have to face to save their love.

Taal is a 1999 Hindi musical drama film starring Anil Kapoor, Akshaye Khanna and Aishwarya Rai. The film won three Filmfare awards including Best Supporting actor for Anil Kapoor and Best Music for A.R. Rahman.

The story revolves around Mansi, daughter of singer Tara Babu who falls in love with Manav. But Manav’s rich family disapproves their relationship and insults Tara Babu. Desperate to make name for herself, Mansi joins Vikrant’s troupe and soon becomes popular. Will the lovers ever unite?

Lake Placid is a 1999 American horror thriller film starring Bill Pullman, Bridget Fonda, Oliver Platt and Brendan Gleeson in the lead. A giant man-eating crocodile comes out of a lake in the Maine woods and creates havoc on the vacation spot. Will the team of experts called in to control the menace be successful in taming this gigantic crocodile?

Haseena Maan Jayegi is a 1999 romantic comedy starring Govinda, Sanjay Dutt, Karisma Kapoor, Pooja Batra, Kader Khan and Anupam Kher. 

Tired of his two mischievous sons, Sonu and Monu, Amirchand decides to keep them apart by assigning them different tasks. Sonu leaves for Goa, while Monu stays back in Mumbai to look after the family business. Trouble begins when Monu disguises and reaches Goa to meet Sonu and the two brothers fall in love with Gulzarilal Verma’s daughters.

Bindhast is a 1999 Marathi adventure/mystery film starring  Gautami Gadgil,  Sharvari Jamenis,  Reema Lagoo and others. 
Mayuri and Vijayanti are best friends. Their common enemy is Sheila. When Mayuri's aunt wants her to get married Mayuri lies to her and tells her that she already has a boyfriend and his name is Mahesh. To Mayuri's surprise a man named Mahesh actually turns up and asks to meet her. Who is this mystery man?

Hogi Pyar Ki Jeet is a 1999 romantic film, starring Ajay Devgn,  Shabana Raza (Neha), Arshad Warsi, Mayuri Kango and others. Surjit goes to Thakur's house to ask for Thakur's son's hand for his sister in marriage. But Thakur humiliates him,  and later kills Surjit and his wife. His sister brings up Surjit's two sons. Surjit's dying wish is that his sons should get married to Thakur's and his brother's daughters when they grow up and that Thakur must beg for the alliance. But this is easier said than done.

The Thirteenth Floor is a 1999 sci-fi thriller starring Craig Bierko, Armin Mueller-Stahl and Gretchen Mol. Hannon Fuller, a noted computer genius, makes an important discovery and is eager to share it with his colleague Douglas Hall. However, Fuller is murdered, and Hall is deemed to be the prime suspect and he must prove his innocence.
