Cruel Intentions is a 1999 American romantic drama film starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, Reese Witherspoon and Selma Blair. Step siblings, Kathryn and Sebastian are manipulative individuals and know how to get things done. Kathryn makes a bet and challenges Sebastian to get intimate with their headmaster’s daughter Annette. Who will win the bet and what is Kathryn’s intent?

Nirmala Machindra Kamble is a 1999 Marathi crime drama starring Chandu Beloskar, Avdut Bhatt, Master Abu and others.
A  B.A. passed peon-turned-Sarpanch Machindra Kamble is accused of killing the ousted Sarpanch of Ambedkar Nagar, Anandrao Patil. Kamble is absconding leaving behind his wife and son. Anandrao's wife is also missing and is untraceable. The investigating officers are inept and corrupt. Shyamrao Kamble, a retired teacher stages a hunger-fast until the killer is brought to justice.

Neoti is a 1999 Bengali family drama film starring Ranjit Mallick, Indrani Haldar, Lokesh Ghosh. Umanath and Sashinath are stepbrothers. Haranath, the family priest causes misunderstandings in the family and when his daughter falls in love with Umanath, things take an ugly turn and a death occurs.

movietitle: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
description: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer is a 1998 American horror mystery film starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Junior and Muse Watson in the lead. It is a sequel to the 1997 film I Know What You Did Last Summer. Julie and Ray are followed by the revengeful fisherman, Ben Willis who is back with his hook once again, this time at a resort and is on a killing spree.

Moner Mon Mon is a 2016 Bengali romantic film starring Mohini, Amin Khan, Victor Banerjee and Uttam Mohanty. 
It is a story of a couple who meet each other on a tour and eventually fall in love. However, the girl’s dad wants her to get married to his childhood friend. He tries to convince her father that he is the most suitable boy for her. Will they marry each other?

Urban Legend is a 1998 American horror mystery film starring Jared Leto, Alicia Witt and Rebecca Gayheart. In a New England University, Natalie an her friends are taught by professor Wexler. The learn about a professor who killed his students 25 years ago. The students soon realises that there is a killer in the campus who is using the same methods.

Pavitra Prema is a 1998 Telugu film produced by V. Srinivasa Reddy on Srinivasa Productions directed by Muthyala Subbaiah. The film stars Nandamuri Balakrishna, Laila and Roshini in the lead roles and music composed by Koti.

Les Misérables is a 1998 crime drama film starring Liam Neeson, Geoffrey Rush, Uma Thurman and Claire Danes. It is based on a novel of the same name by Victor Hugo. Jean Valjean, a former criminal gives up his past and becomes a mayor during the French Revolution. However, he comes across Javert, a policeman who is determined to arrest and penalize Valjean for his past deeds.
Keemat - They Are Back is a 1998 Hindi movie starring Akshay Kumar, Saif Ali Khan, Raveena Tandon and Sonali Bendre.

Military Raaj is a 1998 Hindi drama starring Mithun Chakraborty, Aditya Pancholi, Pratibha Sinha and many others. An army major is often blamed by the police when he fights crime. He is assigned the job of training some disobedient cadets whom he later moulds into perfect soldiers.

Pardes is 1997 Hindi drama film starring Shah Rukh Khan and Mahima Chaudhry. The film takes a look at the life of westernised NRIs and are losing the traditional values of India. 
Pardes revolves around Kishorilal, an NRI, who comes to India in search of an Indian bride for his son Rajiv, and finds Ganga. However, when Ganga visits the U.S. she finds it difficult to adjust with Rajiv’s sensibilities. Will Ganga return to India, where her heart lies?

movietitle: I Know What You Did Last Summer
description: I Know What You Did Last Summer is a 1997 American horror film starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe, and Freddie Prinze Junior. The film is loosely based on the 1973 novel of the same name by Lois Duncan. It is a story of four friends who are followed by a killer after they try to cover up a car accident that happened a year ago. Will they be able to save their lives and find out about the secret killer?

Nuvva Naena is a comedy thriller movie which is the dubbed version of Nerrukkku  Ner Tamil movie, with the main cast of Surya, Vijay, Simran, Kousalya and produced by Maniratnam, under the Direction of Vasanth. It is the story of a departed wife and husband Shanti, Raghu. Surya is brother of shanti and Vijay is the brother of Raghu. How Raghu, and Vijay started quarreling and how they succeeded to reunite the couple is the story.

Prithvi is a 1997 Hindi drama film starring Sunil shetty, Shilpa Shetty, Faraz Khan, Shweta Menon and Shakti Kapoor. Prithvi, a famous photographer and Neha fall in love and get married. They go to America for their honeymoon where Neha is kidnapped and held for a ransom. 

Meanwhile Prithvi finds a look-alike of Neha, Rashmi, who was supposed to be kidnapped. Neha is held in ransom to prove the innocence of the kidnapper. Rashmi and Prithvi rush to court to settle things.

movietitle: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation
description: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation is a 1994 American Horror Thriller starring Renée Zellweger, Matthew McConaughey, Robert Jacks and Tonie Perensky. While returning from the prom night, Jenny’s car crashes into the woods and she along with her three friends start looking for help. They reach a farmhouse which is occupied by Leatherface and Vilmer, who take great pleasure in killing and stuffing people.

Lav Kush is a 1997 mythological film starring  Jeetendra, Jayaprada and others. The story begins after Lord Ram returns to Ayodhya, is crowned the emperor and settles down to lead a happy family life. To protect his reputation he sends his pregnant wife to exile. Sita is rescued by Maharishi Valmiki, who takes her to his Ashram, renames her Lokpavni. She gives birth to two sons - Kush and Lav. Valmiki trains them in everything. Ten years later, the twins visit a drought and famine-ravaged Ayodhya.

Gupt is a 1997 Hindi suspense thriller film starring Bobby Deol, Manisha Koirala and Kajol. The film was one of the highest grossing films of the year and won three Filmfare Awards, including Best Villain for Kajol.

Governor Jaisingh wants his son, Sahil, to marry Sheetal but Sahil loves Isha. When Jaising is murdered, Sahil is accused and arrested. Sahil escapes from the prison to prove his innocence and his helped by both Isha and Sheetal. Will Sahil prove his innocence?

Men in Black is a 1997 American Sci-fi action film starring Tommy Lee Jones and Will Smith in the lead. Agents K and J work for a secret organisation who monitor activities of extra-terrestrial lifeforms on earth that hide their existence from ordinary humans. Sporting black outfits, these Men in Black agents, use neuralysers to erase memories of alien sightings.

Judaai is a 1997 film starring Anil Kapoor, Sridevi and Urmila Matondkar. Sridevi's performance received a nomination for Best Actress Award.

The story revolves around Raj and Kajal, a middle class married couple. When Jahnvi gets attracted to Raj and expresses her desire to marry him, Kajal agrees for the marriage on being paid two crores. Kajal then divorces Raj and he marries Jahnvi. Will Kajal ever regret her decision?

Raja Hindustani is a 1996 romantic film,  starring Aamir Khan,  Karisma Kapoor,  Suresh Oberoi,  Johnny Lever and others. It’s a love story between a poor man and a rich girl. The girl goes to a small hill station where she meets a carefree driver/tourist guide Raja. They fall in love. But her father will accept him only if he agrees to go to the city,  but Raja refuses. The girl's other family members seize the opportunity to add fuel to the fire. She is forced to choose between her father and Raja.

Bal Bramhachari is 1996 Hindi drama film featuring Karishma Kapoor,  Deepak Tijori and Simran.  The story revolves around Mahavir who was born with special powers as that of Lord Hanuman. Mahavir took a vow of celibacy. Asha is attracted to him and uses her seductive power to please Mahavir and compel him to break his vow. Soon,  Mahavir figured about the death of his parents. Now he is determined to punish the culprits.

Matilda is a 1996 American children's comedy film starring Mara Wilson, Danny DeVito, Rhea Perlman and Embeth Davidtz in the lead. It is based on Roald Dahl's novel of the same name. It is a story of an intelligent little girl Matilda, who is never appreciated by anyone at home or school. When they trouble her, she uses her telekinetic powers to teach them a lesson.

Nirbhay is a 1996 action film starring Mithun Chakraborty, Sangeeta Bijlani, Sadashiv Amrapurkar, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Anupam Kher, Paresh Rawal and others. A mother abandons her baby boy by leaving him at an orphanage. He grows up as an orphan and is falsely accused of two murders. He is sent to prison for no fault of his. After he walks out of prison, he seeks revenge from the culprits who were responsible for the murders and his prison term.

Sagar Kanya is a 1996 Hindi dubbed film starring Venkatesh, Shilpa Shetty and Kaikala Satyanarayana. During a treasure hunt in the ocean, a mermaid is drawn to the shore and Ravi, a local rescues her. They fall in love and Ravi must find a way to protect the mermaid from the treasure hunting gang.
Ek Aur Sangram is a 1996 Hindi dubbed action film starring Rajasekhar and Ramya Krishna in the lead roles.

Ram Shastra is a 1995 Hindi action movie starring Jackie Shroff, Aditya Pancholli and Manisha Koiralla. Dhonga is sentenced to five years in prison after Ram Sinha busts his plans of assassinating a police commissioner. After his release, Dhonga seeks revenge on Ram, now a police inspector.

Saajan Ki Baahon Mein is a 1995 Hindi romantic drama starring Rishi Kapoor, Raveena Tandon, and Tabu. Sagar and Sapna fall in love but gets separated due to her father's opposition to their love. When they meet each other after many years, the chance of them getting together is bleak.

Raavan Raj is 1995 Hindi action film starring Mithun Chakraborty and Aditya Pancholi. An rickshaw driver is behind various crimes in the city. ACP Arjun is assigned to this case. As he goes deeper he faces lots of troubles from sources. He finds a trail of dead bodies of various kidnapped women and also stolen body parts of hospital patients. His wife abandons him and his sister is abducted. He pushes himself to the extreme and solves the case, bringing the goon to justice.

Maidan-e-Jung is a 1995  action drama starring Dharmendra, Akshay Kumar, Karishma Kapoor and others. Daata Guru, a powerful village head owns all the villagers and their land. He is cruel and crushes any voice that rises against him. Shankar and his son Guman help him. His eldest son Karan returns to the village after completing his studies. He falls in love with Shankar's sister Tulsi. But Daata Guru turns against Shankar as he saves his widowed daughter-in-law and marries her. He threatens the villagers.

Bad Boys is a 1995 American action comedy film starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence and Téa Leoni. Marcus and Mike are detectives with Miami Police Department. While Marcus is a family man, Mike is an outspoken guy popular amongst the ladies. The boys have five days to track down a consignment of drugs, which they had seized, but is now stolen from the police headquarters.
Nishana is a 1995 Hindi revenge action film starring Mithun Chakraborty, Rekha, Paresh Rawal, Pankaj Dheer, Raza Murad, Shafi Inamdar and Aparajita in the lead.

Zorawar is a Punjabi action film directed by Desh Gautam. It stars Sharandeep, Upasana Singh, Jatinder Bhardhwaj, Surinder and Arun Bali in lead roles. The story revolves around a brave man who fights for the truth and justice.

Ab Insaaf Hoga is a 1995 action film starring Mithun Chakraborty and Rekha.
The movie is about a self-respecting woman Jankidevi who faces sexual harrassment at the hands of many lecherous men. 
Janki's husband Ramcharan is left paralysed in an accident. Her employer Girdharilal agrees to loan her money for the treatment only if she spends a night with him. In his lust for Janki, the cunning Girdharilal murders Ramcharan. 
Janki now has to fend for herself and her young daughter. She finds a supporter in Gaurishankar with whose help she seeks revenge.

Mohini is a 1995 horror-thriller film starring Sudesh Berry, Madhoo, Mohan Agashe, Shagufta Ali and Johnny Lever. A professor with a disfigured face lives a largely secluded life. He is researching on vampires and lives with his wife, Ragini. He suspects his wife is not a human being, but a vampire who has come to drink his blood.

Paapi Devata is a 1995 hindi action film starring Dharmendra,  Jeetendra. Truck driver Rahim Khan’s employer Ratan Seth has been smuggling drugs and his partner Niranjan confronts him about this. Ratan Sheth forces Niranjan to molest Rahim’s sister Reshma. This angers Rahim and he kills Niranjan. Ratan shows false sympathy towards Rahim and makes him continue working for him,  as a taxi driver.  But DCP Ram Singh investigates Niranjan’s death and befriends Rahim. Will he find out the truth?

Aao Pyar Karen is a 1994 Hindi romance starring Saif Ali Khan, Shilpa Shetty, and Somi Ali. Suraj is wealthy and lives with his parents. He decides to marry a poor girl against his parents' wishes. Anjali, his mother is enraged and decides to never let his new family in their house. Unfortunately, Suraj and his wife die in an accident and leave behind Raja. After much reluctance, Raja is welcomed into Anjali's home but as he wants to marry the housekeeper's girl more drama ensues.

Charachar is a 1993 Bengali movie starring Rajit Kapoor, Sadhu Mehar and Laboni Sarkar. Lakha, who comes from the family of bird catchers is against the idea of catching birds and putting them in cages. Lakha's wife Sari accusses him of not being ambitious and only thinking about the birds. A city dealer,Kalicharan asks Lakha to sell all his birds to him. Lakha along with Bhushan takes all thei catch of birds to him. But a twist is about to happen.

Eena Meena Deeka is a 1994 released Bollywood Comedy movie featuring Vinod Khanna, Rishi Kapoor and Juhi Chawla. The story revolves around Eena,  Meena and Deeka who are strangers. Deeka has returned from his imprisonment and decided to lead a life in a noble manner.

Soon, in a bank coincidentally Deeka is seen with Eena,  who was robbing a bank. The cops believed Deeka to be involved in this. Now,  Deeka must capture Eena to prove his innocence.

Laadla is a 1994 Hindi action drama film starring Anil Kapoor and Sridevi. The film was superhit film and actress Sridevi was nominated for Filmfare Best Actress Award.

The story revolves around Raju, a caring son, who lives with his disabled mother. When Raju gets a new job, he fights for the rights of the workers, which irks Sheetal, the company owner. Their hatred reaches an extreme level and Sheetal decides to marry Raju to make his life hell.

Tahqiqaat is a 1994 Hindi thriller film starring Jeetendra, Aditya Pancholi, Sangeeta Bijlani, Ronit Roy and Farheen in the lead. 
A young woman's corpse goes missing from the grave and is replaced with the cadaver of a priest. Arun, the priest's brother, decides to solve the mystery of this crime.

Dharti Putra is a 1993 Hindi drama movie featuring Mammootty,  Jaya Prada, Nagma and Farah. This was the first Hindi movie of Mollywood sensation Mammootty. 
The story revolves around Jeeva who was in love with Shiva. On their wedding night,  Yashpal Singh kills Shiva. Jeeva was burning in the fire of revenge and she killed Yashpal Singh. She was sentenced to life imprisonment and gave birth to Munna. Yashpal Singh's wife and Kripal Singh wanted Jeeva and her son to die. Jailor Kapil Dev must save them.

Phir Teri Kahani Yaad Ayee is a 1993 Hindi drama starring Rahul Roy, Pooja Bhatt, Avtar Gill. Rahul falls in love with Pooja who is mentally unstable and she is sent to an asylum where she dies in a fire.

Her memories keep haunting him as he is unable to get over her.

Rayaru Bandaru Mavana Manege is a 1993 Kannada romantic drama film starring Vishnuvardhan and Bindiya.
The story revolves around Suma whose father is a wealthy man, who wants her to marry and settle down. However, Suma is not keen on marriage but has to pretend to get married to please her father. She hires Vishnu and they act as a married couple, until the truth comes out.

Antim Nyay is a 1993 Hindi drama starring Jackie Shroff, Neelam, Alok Nath, Tanuja and others. Jay lives with his parents in Bombay. When his father is killed he tries to get justice but is denied. He takes the Indian Police Services exam and is about to secure a job in the police force when his fiance's father is also murdered. Jay is arrested for the murder and tortured. He is released and marries Seema. But a criminal is adamant on making their lives hell. Will Jay be able to save his family from him?

Shaktimaan is a 1993 Hindi action drama starring Ajay Devgan, Karishma Kapoor, Mukesh Khanna, and Kulbhushan Kharbanda. 

After being childless for many years, Rai Bahadur and his wife adopt their servant Diler’s son, Vicky. Trouble begins when Rai Bahadur’s wife gets pregnant and delivers a son, Amar. This makes Diler insecure and tries to kill Amar but his wife Parvati escapes with Amar to a safer place. Years later, Amar grows up and joins the police force. Can Amar seek revenge on Diler for his family’s sufferings?
Sukher Swarga is a 1993 Bengali romantic film starring Prosenjit Chatterjee, Satabdi Roy, Uttam Mohanty, Aparajita Mohanty, Biplab Chatterjee, Arun Mukherjee and Rita Koiral.

Divya Shakti is a 1993 Hindi action drama movie starring Ajay Devgun,  Raveena Tandon, Amrish Puri and Shakti Kapoor. 

The story revolves around Prashant Verma who is a journalist. He is soon fed up of the corruption,  and injustice prevailing around him. He decides to fight against it single-handedly. The gang led under Tau gets affected by his activities. Fighting against Tau,  Prashant loses his limb and the loved ones. He must assassinate all the criminals and Tau.

Yugandhar is a 1993 Hindi action movie starring Mithun Chakraborty, Kabir Bedi and Sangeeta Bijlani. Poor villagers, who are evicted from their lands and forced to become anti-social elements, struggle to get their property back. They get treated as outcasts by the government.

Soundarya Chandramukhi is a 1993 Telugu-dubbed Kannada horror film starring Vishnu Vardhan, Soundarya and more. A married couple, Ganga and Ramesh, buy a palatial house. A vengeful spirit resides in the house, unknowingly Ganga sets the spirit free and strange incidents start occuring. In the beginning the couple suspect their child but the psychiatrist reveals the truth.
Pyar Pyar is a 1993 Hindi Action Drama film starring  Beena Banerjee, Kishore Anand Bhanushali,Isha Gupta,Paresh Rawal in lead roles.

A Few Good Men is a 1992 American drama film starring Tom Cruise, Jack Nicholson, Demi Moore and Kevin Bacon. A courtroom drama in which military lawyer Daniel Kaffee defends two US marines accused for the murder of a fellow marine. However, investigations throw light on the negative influence that exists in the military.

Mayabini is a 1992 Bengali romantic movie starring Tapas Paul and Debashree Roy. Rajabahadhur is the owner of a large forest estate where laborers report suspicious killing activities. He plans on engaging his son Kumar to Madhabi the daughter of his friend but is killed by a masked man on the same day. Madhabi is kidnapped and an imposter is sent instead of her. One thing leads to another and in the end, the accountant is found guilty and Kumar marries Swathi the imposter and lives happily.
Jaagruti is a 1992 Hindi action film starring Salman khan and Karishma kapoor.

Zakhmi Sipahi is a 1995 Hindi action movie starring Mithun Chakraborty, Punit Issar, Om Puri, Rituparna Sengupta and Vikas Anand. A pilots’ daughter is kidnapped by criminals and they force him to illegally transport drugs, arms, and ammunition to terrorists. Will he manage to release his daughter from their clutch?

Mere Sajana Saath Nibhana is a 1992 Hindi love story starring Mithun Chakraborty, Juhi Chawla, Shantipriya and Prem Chopra. Kanhaiya and Chanchal fall in love but Chanchal’s father insults Kanhaiya’s mother and refuses to accept their relationship. Kanhaiya meets Janki and falls for her but Thakur considers her as his mistress and won’t let anyone come near her. What will Kanhaiya do now?

Raat is a 1992 horror film starring Revathi, Jeethendra Reddy, Rohini Hattangadi, Akash Khurana and others. Mini moves into a new house with her family. The house is haunted. Strange events start occurring. Mini's friend Rashmi dies in a gruesome manner on her wedding day. Her father consults a psychiatrist as he finds Mini's behavior worrisome. Their neighbor advises them to go to Sharji who finds the ghost to be of a woman who was murdered in that house. Sharji makes her leave Mini's body.

Dil Ka Kya Kasoor is a 1992 released Bollywood Drama movie starring Divya Bharti,  Suresh oberoi and Prithvi. The story revolves around Shalini Saxena who is a college student. She writes poem under the name of Seema. Arun who gives her poems his voice on occasions. Shalini was secretly in love with Arun. Shalini secretly helped Arun to become a great singer and a richer man. Arun gets married to Meena. When Seema's identity is revealed,   Arun must choose between his wife and Shalini.

Vishwatma is a 1992 Hindi action drama film starring Sunny Deol, Naseeruddin Shah and Chunkey Pandey. This box-office hit is mainly remembered as the debut film of Divya Bharti and for its famous song ‘Saat Samundar’.

The story revolves around Inspector Prabhat who seeks revenge on crime boss Ajgar Jurrat, who has escaped to Kenya. Prabhat is joined by Akash and they reach Kenya where they seek help from Kenyan Inspector Surya Pratap, to eliminate Ajgar and his gang.

Bol Radha Bol is a 1992 Hindi romantic thriller film starring Juhi Chawla,  Rishi Kapoor and others. An industrialist, Kishen, travels to a village to expand his business, where he meets a village belle Radha. While he is romancing her, a tragedy takes place back home. His mother passes away and an imposter lookalike has taken Kishen's place. Kishen is thrown out of his own house. Now the real Kishen has to prove himself or risk losing everything. Radha helps him.

Police Aur Mujrim is a 1992 Hindi drama movie starring Raaj Kuma, Vinod Khanna and Meenakshi Sheshadri. Veer Bahadur Singh is Bombay's Police Commissioner and he lives with his wife, Sharda and their daughter Jyoti. 

After DSP Vishal locks up Shera and Jaaga, their boss Banarsi kidnaps Jyoti. Vishal convicts the 2 and saves Jyoti. The trio decide to take revenge by turning Veer Bahadur's life hell and they are backed by the Home Minister.
Bombay police is a 1992 Hindi dubbed Telugu action film starring Nagarjuna, Shobhna and Silk Smita in the lead.

Phool Aur Kaante is a 1991 action drama film starring Ajay Devgn, Madhoo and Amrish Puri. This film marked the debut of Ajay Devgn in Bollywood and also won him Filmfare Best Male Debut Award.

Phool Aur Kante is the story of Ajay, whose father Nageshwar is an underworld don. However, Ajay lives a simple, peaceful life away from his father and marries Pooja. Trouble begins when Nageshwar’s rivals kidnap Ajay’s son, which further strains the troubled father-son relation.

Love is a 1991 Hindi romantic film starring Salman Khan, Revathi and others. A young man and woman love each other but the woman's mother opposes their relationship. The reason is the man's criminal past. 

When he was younger the man was charged with killing his abusive father. His mother committed suicide due to this. When they keep seeing each other the girl's mother sends goons to beat up the man leading to her daughter getting injured. Will they continue seeing each other?

Chiranjeevi is a 1991 Hindi action-comedy film starring Chiranjeevi, Vijayshanti and Radha in lead roles. Kaali, a small-town goon steals from the rich and helps the poor. When Kaali is killed accidentally and reaches hell, he argues with Yamraj over his death and is sent back to Earth. A superhit film starring Chiranjeevi in a double role.

Saathi is a 1991 drama starring Aditya Pancholi, Mohsin Khan, and Varsha Usgaonkar. Suraj and Amar are brothers who as children saw their father being brutally beaten up by a cop. They grow up to become small-time criminals. Suraj wants to become rich and so he continues with his criminal ways. But Amar quits. Suraj kills dreaded gangster Pasha and becomes the gang leader himself. Amar thinks that Suraj is lost in the world of crime,  but when Sultan asks Suraj to kill Amar,  he refuses.

Saudagaar is 1991 Hindi thriller starring Dilip Kumar, Raaj Kumar,  Vivek Mushran, Manisha Koirala, Amrish Puri, Anupam Kher, Dalip Tahil, Gulshan Grover, Dina Pathak. The friendship between Veeru and Rajeshwar turns bitter and they become enemies. They choose to confront their enmity only years later when their respective grandchildren fall in love with each other.

Trinetra is a 1991 Hindi movie dubbed in Bengali starring Mithun, Shilpa Shirodkar, Amrish Puri, Dharmendra, Anupam Kher, Kader Khan, Shakti Kapoor and Deepa Sahi. Raja is killed by Singhania in the presence of his wife, Seema. When she plans to get back at her husband's murderers, she is imprisoned for murder. Will she be able to avenge her husband's death?

Ek Raatra Mantarleli is a 1991 Marathi thriller starring Ashwini Bhave,  Ashutosh Gowariker,  Sanjay Mone,  Asavari Joshi,  Prashant Damle,  Makrand Deshpande,  Nilu Phule and Shreeram Lagoo. 
The story is about a group of young college students who are friends. Something sinister happens and one by one they all begin to die. What is happening? Is it some unseen force or a serial killer is doing this?

Roohani Taaqat is a 1991 Hindi-dubbed horror movie starring Chinna and Mayuri.  
Pavan and his wife Pallavi along with their two kids shift in a new house. Soon unnatural things begin to occur in the house. While Pavan does not believe in ghosts, his friend suggests him to go see an astrologer. The astrologer makes an observation that leaves him spellbound yet he chooses not believe it.

Ajooba is a 1991 Hindi fantasy adventure film starring Amitabh Bachchan, Rishi Kapoor, Dimple Kapadia, Sonam and Amrish Puri. The film was directed by veteran actor Shashi Kapoor. 

In Baharistan, the Sultan’s wife is expecting a child, but the evil Wazir tries to kill the royal family and seize the throne. The family escapes the attack but are separated and the young prince grows up with superpowers and is called Ajooba. Can Ajooba seek his revenge and save the people from the Wazir’s atrocities?

Saugandh is an 1991 Hindi  Action drama film starring Akshay Kumar, Raakhee and Shantipriya. A proud zamindar named Chowdry adores his sister Chand who is in love with Shiva a farmer's son. Chowdry kills all of Shiva's family members as well as his sister when he comes to know of their relationship. Shiva's sister-in-law was pregnant and swears to Chowdry that she will make him bow his head.

Fateh is a 1991 released Hindi Action movie featuring Sanjay Dutt and Sonam in the lead roles. 

The story is about Anand who along with his time was supposed to execute Samrat,  a smuggler, and Mafia. Anand lost his leg and was soon forced to get retired. Samrat took this as his advantage and killed helpless Samrat. Karan,  Rajvir, and Salim,  the team members of Anand decide to avenge Samrat for Anand's death.

Phool Bane Angarey is a 1991 Hindi action drama film starring Rekha and Rajinikanth. 

The story revolves around Inspector Ranjit Singh, an honest cop, who investigates the murder of Mr. Dutta and finds evidence against Bishamber Prasad. Being an influential politician, Bishamber gets Ranjeet killed. How will Ranjit’s wife Namrata, an ordinary woman, avenge her husband’s death?

Baaghi revolves around Saajan (Salman Khan) who is a college youth, enjoying his life and Kajal (Nagma) the girl of his dreams at a brothel. Kajal is an innocent victim of Dhanraj, who runs this brothel. Saajan eventually falls in love with Kajal, but this love affair is not acceptable to the society, which includes his parents Mr. and Mrs. Sood. Saajan's dad Col. Sood wants his son to join the Indian army. On the other side, this relationship of love is also not acceptable to Dhanraj, since he doesn't want any of his brothel girls to go into normal respectable society. Trapped between both, Saajan, along with his friends, rescues his love from the brothel. But the question remains: Will Saajan's parents accept him along with Kajal or Will Dhanraj's evilness overcome the couple's love?

Sheshnaag is a 1990 fantasy hindi film starring Jeetendra, Rishi Kapoor, Rekha and others. Aghoori is after an icchaadhaari naag (snake) couple Pritam and Banu. They hold the key to immortality. In a village, Champa takes care of her brother Bhola. Her husband and his goons attack her and she commits suicide. Since Bhola is very good with snakes and can charm them with his flute, Banu the female snake turns into Champa and takes care of him. But Aghoori is hot on their trail!
Kuthe Kuthe Shodhu Mi Tila is a 1990 Marathi film starring Laxmikant Berde, Varsha Usgaonkar, Priya Arun and Rekha Rao in the lead.

Paap Ka Ant is a 1989 Hindi drama starring Govinda, Madhuri Dixit, and Hema Malini. When the Deputy Commissioner of Police is murdered before the hearing of a high-profile case, the lead prosecutor begins conducting her own investigation and avenges all those hurt by the criminal.

Ladaai is a 1989 drama starring Mithun Chakraborty, Rekha, Dimple Kapadia and Mandakini . Dindayal is poor and works for Dinanath. His associate, Sunderdas, accuses Dindayal of killing him, right before he dies. He is sent to prison. His wife Shanti loses her mind. She is institutionalised after giving birth to two sons. 18 years later Dindayal is out of prison. He goes to Judge Shakuntala, kills himself and asks her to find the real killers of Sunderdas. She tracks down 3 possible suspects.

Toofan is 1989 Hindi action superhero film starring Amitabh Bachchan, Meenakshi Sheshadri and Amrita Singh. 

The story revolves around twins Toofan and Shyam who are separated at birth. While Shyam grows up to be a magician, Toofan receives the gift of immense strength from Lord Hanuman, to fight the evil. Will the brothers ever reunite and punish the culprits responsible their sufferings?

Tridev is a 1989 action film,  starring Naseeruddin Shah,  Sunny Deol,  Jackie Shroff,  Madhuri Dixit,  Sangeeta Bijlani and Sonam. Police Commissioner's daughter and a Judge's son (who is an inspector )are engaged to be married. But the man is framed by a criminal who also kills the mans' father. Due to corruption and other pressures the commissioner transfers him to a village. When the Commissioner's daughter is kidnapped for the release of the criminal's brother,  the Inspector is brought back.

Clerk was a 1989 Bollywood drama starring Manoj Kumar, Rekha, Anita Raj, Shashi Kapoor, Ashok Kumar and Prem Chopra. The story revolves around Bharat, an honest clerk. He faces difficulties due to his poverty. His adverse circumstances lead him to the path of corruption. He realises his mistakes and regrets his actions. He decides to correct himself and return to the path of honesty.

Nafrat Ki Aandhi is a 1989 Hindi action film starring Dharmendra, Jeetendra, Madhavi and Anita Raj. Inspector Ravi has an enmity with gangsters Chandi and Chotu. Sonu, a thug always quarrels with Ravi. Chandi plans to kill Ravi and blames it on Sonu. But, Ravi and Sonu become friends and imprison Chandi. After his release, Chandi kills Sonu's wife and children for theft. Enraged Sonu, sets out to capture him. Ravi and Sonu join together to capture Chandi. Finally, Sonu sacrifices himself to save Ravi's child.

Main Tera Dushman is a 1989 Hindi action drama film starring Jackie Shroff, Jaya Prada and Sunny Deol.

The story revolves around forest officer Kishan Srivastav who is transferred to Ramgarh, where he discovers about the atrocities of Thakur Dayalu. Kishan attempts to disrupt Thakur’s activities but is framed for murder and gets suspended. Can Kishan prove his innocence and seek revenge on Thakur?

Hum Bhi Insaan Hai is a 1989 released Bollywood Action drama movie featuring Sanjay Dutt, Jackie Shroff, Raj Babbar, Neelam,  Jayapradha and Sonam. 
The story is about two love birds Bhola and Rekha. Dharampal, Rekha's father uses his cunning mind to separate the two. He abducts Bhola for raping Rekha. He even ruins the life of people who try to help them. Soon, Kishanlal comes for the couple's rescue from this plight.

Chaalbaaz is a 1989 Hindi comedy film starring Sridevi, Sunny Deol and Rajnikant. The film is the remake of the 1973 superhit film Seeta Aur Geeta.

Chaalbaaz revolves around twins Anju and Manju who are separated during childhood. The girls grow up and get interchanged which creates confusion for everybody around them. Can Anju and Manju come together to seek revenge on their cunning uncle, Tribhuvan.

Ganga Tere Desh Main is a 1988 Hindi mystery-drama film starring Dharmendra, Shatruguhan Sinha and Jayapradha in lead roles. Ajay is a police inspector who lives with his mother. He is tasked to capture Cobra a notorious criminal. Once arrested he finds out Cobra is insane and is institutionalized. One day Ajay takes lunch to Cobra, which is packed by his mother. When dies of poisoning after eating it, Ajay sets off to find the truth which turns his life around forever.

Jhansirani is a 1988 Telugu thriller starring Rajendra Prasad,  Bhanupriya and others. 

A fiesty woman called Jhansi Rani is after a man called Mr. V who is a con man. He fools women by marrying them and then fakes his own death and disappears with the dowry. Unknowingly,  her handicapped sister married him and then committed suicide after his disappearance. Jhansi Rani is unable to attend the wedding so she doesn't know what he looks like. But she must catch him before he fools more women!

Zalzala is a 1988 adventure,action  film starring Dharmendra, Shatrughan Sinha, Rati Agnihotri, Kimi Katkar and others. Inspector Shiv Kumar arrests dacoit Sona Singh, who is madly in search of a hidden golden temple full of treasures. Sona Singh breaks out of prison and kills Kumar's wife. Kumar resigns and goes after the dacoit but he gets caught by the dacoit's men. Now Sona Singh wants Kumar to lead them to the treasure as Kumar is the only one who knows the way.
Kab Tak Chup Rahungi is a 1988 Hindi action film starring Aditya Pancholi, Amala and Kiran Kumar in the lead.

Tamacha is a 1988 action film, starring Jeetendra, Rajinikanth, Amrita Singh, Bhanupriya and others. Raju and Vicky are childhood friends. Both attend the same school, are excellent students and spend their time together. Their lives change when the two months summer vacation begins. Raju’s dad loses his eyesight and Vicky’s Mom passes away after giving birth to a baby boy while his dad is on the run from the police for murder. Years later, Raju becomes a Police Inspector and Vicky a notorious gangster.

Insaaf is a 1987 Hindi Action drama film starring Vinod Khanna, Dimple Kapadia and Suresh Oberoi. Avinash Kapoor, a lecturer, attempts to punish a few students and in turn they kidnap his blind sister. He is convicted for beating them up. He loses his job and to gain money for his mother's surgery does unlawful things for Agnihotri. He falls in love with Sonia, who is forced to commit suicide by Dilip. Avinash kills him and faces the court.

Jawab Hum Denge is a 1987 Hindi action drama movie starring Jackie Shroff, Shatrughan Sinha and Sridevi. Vijay is a union leader who wants all employees to be treated equally. He entrusts Dharmaraj with the task who has other plans. Dharmaraj manipulates accounts and steals a lot of money leading to a huge loss for the company.

Gundammagari Krishnulu is a 1987 Telugu drama starring Rajendra Prasad,  Rajani,  Subhalekha Sudhakar,  Poornima,  and Suryakantham. Pedda Gopala and Chinna Gopala are brothers and they work in different companies and cities. Pedda is transferred to his brothers town. He falls in love with Saroja. Chinna's marriage is canceled so his bride,  Lakshmi runs away from home in search of him. She faces a lot of hurdles and is suspected of murder. Finally,  the case is closed.

De Danadan is a 1987 Marathi drama starring  Mahesh Kothare,  Laxmikant Berde,  Nivedita Joshi,  Prema Kiran,  Deepak Shirke and others.
The story is of Lakshya,  a police constable. After he survives a bomb blast Lakshya somehow manages to achieve some extraordinary super powers. But all his powers fail when he sees the colour red. But Lakshya needs the powers to fight crime! What will he do?

Allah Rakha is a 1986 Hindi drama featuring Jackie Shroff, Shammi Kapoor and Waheeda Rehman. The story revolves around Karim khan and Allah Rakha. Karim was imprisoned for the accident which he never did. In return Karim demanded for hefty amount of money from Don. But Don later refuses to give money and even tries to rape Razia. Later Razia and her son die. Karim must avenge their death.

Vikram is 1986 Telugu action film starring Akkineni Nagarjuna and Shobhana.,  released in the year of 1986. When Sardar gets arrested,  he seeks Vikram's help. Vikram kidnaps Radha to pressurise her father to release Sardar. Eventually Vikram falls for Radha.

Manav Hatya is a 1987 Hindi drama film starring Shekhar Suman, Madhuri Dixit, Sharat Saxena and Gulshan Grover. The story revolves around Rama who is a law student. Her father loses his eyesight in an accident with an illicit businessman BB. Her little brother is killed unjustly. When Rama demands legal aid, BB abducts her. She escapes to find her father dead. Rama meets Varun, an honest journalist, who promises to expose all of these to the public. Together they succeed to find justice for her family.

Baat Ban Jaaye is a 1986 Hindi comedy movie featuring  Sanjeev Kumar,  Mithun Chakraborty,  Raj Babbar,  Zeenat Aman,  Amol Palekar,  Aruna Irani and Shakti Kapoor. 

The movie revolves around Nisha who was a neice of wealthy Mr. Singh. He wanted Nisha to marry a guy but Nisha hates wealthy men. Nisha wants to marry a guy who was is not rich. Mr. Singh began to search her a perfect guy but failed. He must do everything to find her a perfect match.

Naseeb Apna Apna is a 1986 Hindi romantic drama film starring Rishi Kapoor, Farha and Radhika Sarathkumar.

The story revolves around Kishan, whose domineering father fixes his marriage, without his consent, with Chando, who is unattractive and has a funny hairstyle. To escape from this, Kishan gets a transfer to Mumbai where he marries Radha. What would happen when Chando finds about Kishan second wife?

Mera Dharam is an 1986 Hindi drama movie starring Jackie Shroff, Amrita Singh, and Shakti Kapoor. Two friends while on a hunt quarrel over who killed the tiger. This quarrel lead to a gun fight where Sehgal is killed and Thakur Is injured but succumbs to his injuries and dies. The families become sworn enemies. After few years Durga from the Thakur family and Jai from Sehgal family fall in love. Will the lovers unite their families?
Long Da Lishkara is a 1986 Punjabi romantic film. It stars Raj Babbar, Gurdas Maan, Harpreet Deol and Om Puri in the lead roles.

Maa Kasam is a 1985 action film starring Mithun Chakraborty, Amjad Khan, Divya Rana and others. Balwant is a criminal who comes to know that Thakur has a treasure map hidden in a diamond ring. He kills Thakur, but isn't able to get the ring. His dying wife, takes their young son, Dharma and leaves him in the care of Thakur's widow.Balwant is arrested and gets a long jail term. Dharma grows up to be a hard-working honest man. His father Balwant completes his sentence and returns for the ring.

Bhavani Junction is a 1985 crime film starring Shashi Kapoor, Shatrughan Sinha, Zeenat Aman and Rati Agnihotri. Police Officer Ram's wife is raped and murdered by Rakesh. He arrives at Bhavani Junction which is ruled by his friend Raja Bhavani Pratap unaware that the killer he's looking for is Bhavani's own son. Bhavani refuses to believe Ram and protects his son until his love interest Reshma helps him in seeing the truth. Bhavani ends up getting shot by Ram who also and arrests Rakesh.

Pachani Kapuram is a 1985 Telugu drama film starring Krishna and Sridevi. A man rescues a drunk girl from being harassed by the group of goons in the car. After series of incidents,  they become lovers and get married. They have a child but get separated. The girl’s parents convince here that the baby has died at birth but in reality,  the man has raised the child.

Wafadaar is a 1985 action drama starring Rajnikanth,  Padmini Kolhapure and Vijayeta Pandit. Daya Sagar and his wife have brought up their daughter Chanda very well. They don’t approve of her being around Ranga and want her to marry someone else. Ranga is said to be having an affair. A woman who had assisted Daya Sagar’s wife during her pregnancy reveals that he has two daughters,  not one! This leads to turmoil in the family.

Teri Meherbaniyan is a 1985 Hindi action drama film starring Jackie Shroff and Poonam Dhillon.

The story revolves around Ram, an honest man, who becomes the voice of poor villagers. This irks Thakur and he gets Ram killed. However, Ram has a pet dog Moti who witnesses the murder and seeks revenge on Thakur.

Masterji is a 1985 Hindi drama film starring Rajesh Khanna, Sridevi and Anita Raj.

The story revolves around Radha, a prankster, who falls in love with the new village school teacher, fondly called as Masterji. In spite of being aware that Masterji is a widower and has a son, Radha pursues to marry him. After marriage Radha realises, that Masterji liked Shobha, his colleague and things get complicated between them.

Ek Se Bhale Do is a 1985 romantic drama starring Kumar Gaurav, Rati Agnihotri, Amjad Khan and Shammi Kapoor. After David is killed by Gomango and his widower friend Balram also dies, the latter's son Bhima moves in with David's wife Mary. He grows up with David's son Bunty. Years later both young men work on a stud farm. Bunty is in love with Jenny but her dad will only allow marriage after Bunty accumulates some wealth. In order to get rich quickly Bunty robs Gomango. This changes their lives.

Ram Tere Kitne Naam is a 1985 romantic  drama starring Sanjeev Kumar, Rekha, Prem Chopra and others. Peturam loves Radha. Her brother asks him to first earn at least Rs Ten Lakhs. Peturam goes to Bombay and starts driving a cab. He buys lottery tickets but has no luck. Far from his goal, he meets a Producer who takes him in his film. The film is a success and Peturam becomes a star. He goes back to his home town but sees that Radha is already married to someone else and about to have his baby.

Do Dilon Ki Dastaan is a 1985 Hindi Drama starring Sanjay Dutt,  Padmini Kolhapure, and others. Vijay falls in love with a woman at the airport but doesn’t know who she is. He can’t get the woman out of his mind and is overjoyed when he meets her,  Sona in Srinagar. They fall in love. But they meet with an accident and Vijay loses his legs. Sona is discharged by a young Kamal,  who Vijay discovers,  also loves her. He tries to find out whether Sona withdrew from him because of this new man.

Pyar Jhukta Nahin is a 1985 romantic Hindi drama starring Mithun Chakraborty, Padmini Kolhapure, Danny Denzongpa. Ajay and Preeti get married despite the opposition from Preeti's parents. But their marriage goes through a tough phase and Preeti returns to her parents' house.
Guddo is a 1985 Punjabi action film starring Satish Kaul, Shashi Ranjan and Mohammad Sadiq.

Kasam Paida Karnewaale Ki is an 1984 Hindi drama starring Mithun Chakraborty and Smita Patil. Sathish Kumar is the heir to a huge estate and a insane amount of wealth but can only obtain it one he reaches the age of 20. He is terrorized by his uncle in his childhood and has a general fear for him. Even after many years he retains that fear. He is married to Arthi. Uday kills Sathish and Arthi swears revenge.

John Jani Janardan is a 1984 Hindi action comedy film starring  Rajinikanth, Thiagarajan, Poonam Dhillon and Rati Agnihotri. Jani and Janardan are the twin sons of John who are separated after the death of their parents. 

John who was a police inspector was killed by a criminal Gajju. 25 years later, Janardan kills a man to avenge his father. Gajju brings in a witness, Jani who is disguised as Jingju aims to kill Janardan and thus preventing him from avenging John's death.

Yaadgaar is a 1984 Hindi film starring Kamal Haasan, Sanjeev Kumar and Poonam Dhillon in the lead. 
After his father passes away, an unemployed slacker has to go live with his married sister. He is a huge liar and people are so used to his lies, no one believes him when something actually goes wrong. He is said to be good-for-nothing until he meets a wealthy, superstitious man. He finds the slacker lucky and adopts him. However the slacker meets his end thanks to his wayward ways.

Insaaf Kaun Karega is an 1984 Hindi drama starring Dharmendra, Rajnikanth, Jaya Prada and Madhavi in lead roles. Jageera abandons his wife and son Vikram to join a life of crime. Years later, when Vikram, now a police officer, sets out to put an end to Jageera's activities, he swears to kill him.

Ab Aayega Maza is a 1984 romantic comedy starring Farooq Sheikh, Anita Raj, Ravi Baswani and others. Vijay is a young man who has never been lucky with love. His luck changes when he meets Nupur. But soon he begins doubting his luck when Nupur’s childhood friend, Sidey returns from abroad. Vijay is worried that Sidey’s charms will draw Nupur towards him and she would dump Vijay. The film follows the hilarious events that happen after this.

Gandu Bherunda is a 1984 Kannada film directed by S.V. Rajendra Singh Babu and produced by Vajramuni. The film was released in the year 1984. The music was composed by Sathyam. Bollywood actor Amrish Puri made an appearance as a villain in the movie.

Hero is a 1983 romantic drama starring Jackie Shroff and Meenakshi Sheshadri. Radha falls in love with her kidnapper Jackie. Although he lies to her and tells her that he is a police inspector. Radha urges him to surrender. Jackie is imprisoned for two years. While waiting for Jackie Radha pretends to be dating Jimmy just so her family doesn't marry her off to someone else. But Jimmy falls in love with Radha. Her brother finds out that Jimmy smuggles drugs. Radha marries Jackie in the end.

Qayamat is a 1983 drama starring Dharmendra, Smita Patil, Jaya Prada and others. Shyam helps Kamal pay his school fees. When he grows up Kamal becomes an IPS officer in Delhi while Shyam moves to Bombay and becomes a criminal. He is known as Rajeshwar. When a politician molests and kills his lady love Geeta, Shyam kills the politician. The Police unable to find evidence against Shyam, call in Kamal. He arrests Shyam who is sentenced to prison. When Shyam comes out he wants to make Kamal's life hell.

Haadsaa is a 1983 thriller, starring Akbar Khan, Ranjeeta, Naseeruddin Shah, Smita Patil, Amrish Puri and others. Asha is married to a rich, but impotent man, by her father, for money. She is sexually frustrated and yearns for love. Asha ends up seducing a car mechanic who repairs her car. But he doesn't wish to go ahead with her anymore, as he is in love with another woman. Asha finds out who she is and prepares to do away with her. She won't let anyone stand in the way of getting what she desires.

Woh 7 Din is a 1983 drama starring Anil Kapoor, Padmini Kolhapure and Naseeruddin Shah. Soon after their wedding, Maya's husband Dr. Anand finds out that she tried to commit suicide. She tells him that she was forced to marry him. She loves Prem. He loves her too, but wasn't deemed as fit for Maya by her family. They were caught eloping, Prem was thrown out of the house and Maya was married off. Dr. Anand promises Maya that he will unite her with Prem after his sick mother's death.

Painter Babu is a 1983 drama, starring Rajiv Goswami and Meenakshi Sheshadri. Young painter Shyam thwarts his industrialist father Srivastav’s request to marry the daughter of a rich man. He elopes with his love, Renu but is caught in the midst of a conspiracy. A girl, Meera is found to be dead and Shyam is blamed. But it turns out Meera is alive. When Shyam is free and goes back to Renu, she has married someone else. Thus begins a path of self-destruction for our painter.

Platform is a 1993 action film starring Ajay Devgan, Tisca Chopra and others. Two orphan brothers get separated at a railway platform. The elder brother gets arrested for a murder he didn't commit. The younger becomes an efficient henchman of the man who actually committed that murder. After completing his sentence the elder brother comes out of prison and goes to meet his brother. But the younger brother is still holding on to the belief that his brother abandoned him at the platform years ago.

Coolie is a 1983 Hindi drama film starring Amitabh Bachchan and Rishi Kapoor. The film was critically acclaimed and was a superhit at the box office.

The story revolves around Iqbal who gets separated from his family at a young age. Iqbal grows to become a coolie and fights for their rights and yearns for his missing family. The film is based on the superhit Bollywood formula of lost and found.

Vidhaata is a 1982 action film, starring Sanjay Dutt, Dilip Kumar and Padmini Kolhapure. Shamsher Singh’s son gets killed by a smuggler. His grandson, Kunal grows up to be an ideal man while Shamsher becomes a Don in the big city. Kunal’s guardian Abu Baba’s death leads him to investigate into the crimes that his grandfather may have committed. Kunal is also not allowed to marry his love Durga, since she’s of lower social status. Soon, Kunal realizes the true nature of Shamsher Singh’s power.

Teesri Aankh is a 1982 thriller  drama starring Dharmendra, Shatrughan Sinha, Zeenat Aman and others. Malti has three sons out of which one is adopted. Her husband testifies against a bandit and is killed by the bandit's son Sheroo. He is arrested and imprisoned for 20 years. Malti loses one of her sons and holds her adopted son Ashok responsible for it. He grows up with Malti's hatred. Malti's second son falls into bad company and gets arrested for a murder. In the end she is left with Ashok. But she hates him.

Ek Hi Bhool is a 1981 Hindi drama film starring Jeetendra, Rekha and Shabana Azmi. The film is a remake of Tamil superhit Mouna Geethangal.

Ek Hi Bhool is the story of Ram and Sadhana, a happily married couple. Trouble begins when Ram cheats on Sadhana with her best friend Urvashi. As a result, Sadhana divorces Ram but later finds that she is pregnant. Years later, when destiny brings them together, Ram learns about his son. Will Sadhana forgive Ram for his mistake and reunite with him?

Khuda Kasam is a 1981 Hindi Drama starring Vinod Khanna and Tina Munim. Ranvir takes the blame for a murder by his employer Raiszada Hukumchand. But Ranvir switches the dead man’s clothes to make it seem as if Ranvir is killed. He changes his name to Girdharilal and turns into a wealthy businessman. His wife Geeta and son Sumer believe he’s dead. When Sumer finds out he’s alive he decides to expose him,  thus putting his own life in danger!

Jail Yatra is a 1981 action film, starring Ashok Kumar and Vinod Khanna. Middle-class Raju falls in love with nurse Shobha. But he often gets mixed up in the wrong crowd. He has landed in trouble with the police and been to jail. Finally one day he antagonizes a notorious gangster. But when he tries to seek refuge while running for his life, no one believes him. He has to fight the gangster himself and make sure he doesn’t run into any more trouble.

Kranti is a 1981 Hindi action drama film starring Dilip Kumar, Manoj Kumar and Shashi Kapoor. This multi starrer was directed by Manoj Kumar and was declared a hit at the box-office.

The story is set in pre-independence era and highlights the struggle of freedom fighters Sanga, Bharat and Kareem. When Sanga discovers that British are taking out gold from India, he revolts and forms a group of revolutionaries, to free India.

Mahfil is a 1981 Hindi drama starring Mohan Chandulkar, Anil Dhawan, Sadhana. Ragunath Singh lives a rich lifestyle with his daughter Shalini. When Raghunath gets assaulted Shalini finds out she has a twin sister, Ratnabai. She gets her home but will Ratnabai accept her?

Karz is a 1980 thriller, starring Rishi Kapoor, Tina Munim, Simi Garewal and others. While fighting a legal battle against his late father's business partner, a man falls for the woman who works for the business partner without knowing who she really is. She throws him off a cliff and he dies. Twenty one years later,  he is reborn as Monty and goes to the site of his death while visiting the girl he loves. The memories of his past life come back to haunt him. He takes revenge from the woman who killed him.

Buchi Babu is a 1980 Telugu comedy action film starring Akkineni Nageswara Rao and Jaya Prada. Buchi Babu returns to India to marry his childhood sweetheart Bujji. However the rivalry between Buchi Babu and Bujji's family forces Buchi to become a servant in Bujji's house and win her parents.

Devudichina Koduku is a 1980 Telugu film starring Krishna and Sridevi in the lead.

Gopi comes to rescue a rich man from his family problems, and later he realizes that, he is only the person to save them. How he wins all the affection of family members is rest of the story.

Hum Paanch is a 1980 film starring Mithun Chakraborty, Sanjeev Kumar, Naseeruddin Shah and Amrish Puri. The film was Boney Kapoor’s maiden venture as a producer.

The story of Hum Paanch is inspired by Mahabharata. Zamindar Thakur Vir Pratap Singh is ruthless and kills anybody who opposes his rules. Five men come together to free the village from Pratap Singh’s atrocities.

Baaton Baton Mein is a 1979 romantic comedy starring Amol Palekar, Tina Munim, Pearl Padamsee, David and others. Nancy Perreira is introduced to a young man Tony Braganza by her uncle and neighbour, Tom in a local train journey. They fall in love but Nancy’s mother Rosie is not sure Tony is the right suitor for her daughter. Tony is hesitant in committing to her and this drives a wedge between the lovers. Will they talk to each other about what they feel?

Phool Khile Hain Gulshan Gulshan is a 1978 drama starring  Rishi Kapoor, Moushumi Chatterjee, Mithun Chakravorty and others. Lala Ganpat Rai, puts a clause in his will that his grandson Vishal won't receive anything from his estate unless he fulfills either of two conditions. One, that he marries a woman of Rai's choice who shall inherit half the property. And second, that he re-locates to their farmhouse in a village, does some farming. Vishal has no choice, he goes to the village to grow crops.

Azaad is a 1978 Hindi thriller movie starring Dharmendra, Hema Malini, Ajit and Prem Chopra. The story revolves around Ashok, who was an unconventional man. He helps people without thinking about the outcome. Rajkumari, a princess decides to teach Ashok a lesson. But instead she falls for Ashok after he saves her life. The two love each other but face numerous difficulties. Will their love survive these odds?

Priyatama is a 1977 Hindi love story starring Jeetendra, Neetu Singh, Rakesh Roshan. Ravi and Dolly marry each other after a long courtship. But soon misunderstandings arise and their marriage is on the rocks. They opt for divorce. They don't listen to their friends also. But Dolly's father Justice Sinha visits them for his heart treatment. The two are forced to act like a happily married couple in front of him. He sees through their act and wants to ensure that they don't separate permanently.

Chandi Sona is a 1977 crime thriller drama film starring Sanjay Khan, Parveen Babi, Pran and Premnath. Mayur and Rita are stage actors and lovers. They arrive on an island which has a tomb of Shahenshah Chandi Sona. Under the tomb is lot of wealth. The film is about Mayur and Rita's dramatic attempt to steal this wealth by taking help from escaped jailbirds and deep-sea divers. They do so by constructing an underground tunnel through the swimming pool in the house that they've bought from Mayadevi.

Mukti is a 1977 Hindi romantic drama film starring Shashi Kapoor, Sanjeev Kumar and Vidya Sinha in lead roles. Sentenced to death, Kailash asks his wife, Seema to take their daughter and relocate elsewhere. Moving to Bombay, she remarries and is content with her new life. Meanwhile, Kailash's sentence is changed and he comes to Bombay to look for his family.

Dream Girl is a 1977 Hindi romantic drama starring Hema Malini, Dharmendra, Ashok Kumar, and Prem Chopra. The story revolves around Sapna who is a modern day girl. She plays five different characters and steals money in order to run a orphanage. However, she falls for a wealthy man who takes her along with him. But her past begins to haunt her. She must prevent her past from ruining her present relation.

Chani is a 1977 Marathi musical starring Ranjana Deshmukh and Siddharth Ray. The songs were written by a Marathi poet, Chintamani Khanolkar under the pseudonym Arti Prabhu. It is a story set in a village on the Konkan coast. It shows how a fisherwoman wants to be accepted among her community. She is the illegitimate daughter of a local Koli woman (fisherwoman) and an English gentleman.

Laila Majnu is a 1976 Hindi fantasy starring Rishi Kapoor,  Ranjeeta and Danny Denzongpa. It is based on the legendary story of Layla and Majnun. Majnu,  known as Qais and Laila are born to rival clans. The heads of the clans kept them apart. But many years later,  Qais visits Laila’s town to buy camels,  meets her and they fall in love. But her brother Tabrez has killed Qais’ father and he now wants revenge. Qais is exiled,  Laila gets married off to a prince and they remain star-crossed!

Anari is a 1993 Hindi Drama film featuring Venkatesh and Karishma Kapoor in the lead roles. The story revolves around Rama who is Nandini's bodyguard. Nandini is the only sister of three arrogant and rich zamindar brothers. Once Rama is beaten by Nadini's brothers for touching her. But Nandini comes to his rescue. They develop affection for each other. They must try hard to get acceptance from Nandini's brothers.

Kaala Sona is a 1975 action drama starring Feroz Khan, Parveen Babi, Prem Chopra and others. Rakesh's father was killed years ago. His killer died too. Or, so Rakesh thought. But when he finds out that the killer is alive and the police have closed his file, he decides to avenge his father's murder himself. Killer's name is Sardar Poppy Singh as he runs a vast underground business of growing and selling cocaine. Rakesh joins his business. What will he do?

Khushboo is a 1975 drama starring Jeetendra, Hema Malini and others. Kusum and Vrindavan get married to each other as children. Later, Vrindavan's father rejects Kusum as his daughter-in-law. She moves to a different village. After she grows up she refuses to marry anyone else as she considers herself to be Vrindavan's wife. But Vrindavan marries another girl and they have a baby. His wife dies. Kusum and Vrindavan meet again,  but he fails to recognise her. They gradually come close and end up together.
Abhimanavathi is a 1975 romantic drama film starring Krishna, Vanisri, G. Varalakshmi, Sarath Babu, Prabhakara Reddy, Ravi Kondala Rao, Mada in lead roles.

Deewaar is a 1975 Hindi action drama film starring Amitabh Bachchan, Shashi Kapoor and Nirupa Roy. The film was a superhit and won 7 Filmfare awards.

Deewaar is the story of a mother and her two sons, who make different choices in life. While the elder son Vijay joins the underworld, the younger brother Ravi becomes a police officer. As fate would have it, the brothers are pitted against each other. Can Ravi and his mother help Vijay to mend his ways?

Mayura is a 1975 Kannada drama film starring Rajkumar, Srinath and Vajramuni.
The story revolves around Mayura, a Brahmin boy, who discovers his connections to the royal family. He then takes it upon himself to avenge the death of his father and works towards building his kingdom.

Roti, Kapda Aur Makan is a 1974 drama film starring Manoj Kumar, Shashi Kapoor and Amitabh Bachchan. The film was blockbuster and Manoj Kumar won the Filmfare Best Director Award.
The film revolves around the struggles of a poor family and highlights the three basic necessities that everybody needs, that is food, clothing and shelter. Bharat, the eldest son, has the responsibility of the entire family, but he struggles to earn money the right way and finally resorts to crime.

Ankur is a 1974  romantic drama starring Ananth Nag, Shabana Azmi and others. Surya, the son of the village landlord takes over his father’s share of land. Lakshmi and Kishtayya, a Dalit couple, work as servants there. Surya tries to win Lakshmi’s affections. Kishtayya leaves the village because of alcoholism. Lakshmi and Surya do sleep together. Surya’s young wife comes back and fires Lakshmi. Lakshmi finally gets pregnant and Kishtayya mistakenly thinks this is the blessing of the Goddess.

Us Paar is a 1974 romantic drama starring Vinod Mehra and Moushumi Chatterjee. 
Mohan, a college student returns home to his village and falls in love with a gypsy girl, Kamli at a local fair. He photographs her and they meet every day. But when he asks to marry her, she says she’s betrothed to Bhairo, part of her gypsy group. They plan to elope. But on the day they are to run away, Bhairo comes and takes her away and Mohan never shows up!

Joshila is a 1973 thriller, starring Dev Anand, Rakhee and Hema Malini. Amar has been sentenced for murder and is in Jailor Manmohan’s custody. Manmohan’s daughter, the beautiful poet, Shalini meets Amar and falls in love with him. As she spend time with him, she finds out that he had been falsely implicated for killing the brother of his former lover. She tries her best to get Amar released and live happily with him.
Jungle Mein Mangal is a 1972 Hindi romantic film starring Kiran Kumar, Reena Roy and Sonia Sahni.

Roop Tera Mastana is a 1972 Hindi suspense thriller starring Jeetendra,  Mumtaz, and Pran. Princess Usha’s assistant Ajit eliminates her and brings along her look-alike Kiran to pose as the princess. When she refuses,  Ajit threatens her family. Kiran meets Usha’s fiancé,  who was a prince as well and soon falls in love with him. But this will not stay the test of time. Soon the Prince will know her true identity and she would have to give up being wealthy and return to her poor lifestyle.

Maalik is a 1972 Hindi drama starring Rajesh Khanna, Sharmila Tagore. Raju is an orphan who grows up in a temple. When he is accused of theft, the temple priest sends Raju to Mumbai. Raju begins to lose his faith in God. One day a man gives him Rs. 10000 for helping him. Raju starts selling painting of Gods.

Guduputhani is a 1972 Telugu suspense/thriller starring Krishna,  Subha,  Halam,  Chittor V. Nagaiah,  Rajababu and others. Deepa is a rich heiress to a vast fortune. She loves and marries Vijay,  a small-time criminal. Various attempts on Deepa's life are made as someone is trying to kill Deepa for her property. While Vijay is the very first suspect he is actually trying to protect Deepa and her property. Soon Vijay unearths a conspiracy against his wife. What is it? Who is trying to kill Deepa?

Subah-o-Sham is a 1972 Indian-Iranian drama starring Mohammad Ali Fardin, Waheeda Rehman and Sanjeev Kumar. Aarun lives in Tehran, Iran with his brother Naseer and their widowed mother. He falls in love with a dancer girl Shirin from India, but his mother is against their union. Shirin changes her mind and this angers Aarun and he marries someone else. Years later, his son makes friends a fatherless kid. It is revealed that this is Shirin and Aarun’s own son.

Mere Jeevan Saathi is a 1972 romance film starring Rajesh Khanna, Tanuja and others. An artist falls in love with a Doctor but his past interferes with his present. As he sorts that out, he loses his eyesight in an accident before his wedding. A cruel Princess captures him. He manages to escape and is helped by a stranger. When he recovers he goes to his fiance and finds that she is now engaged to the same man who helped him.

Sharmilee is a 1971 drama starring Shashi Kapoor and Raakhee. Capt. Ajit Kapoor meets a young woman at a party. When he reaches home, his guardian, Father Joseph, wants him to get married to Kanchan. Ajit finds out that she is the same girl he met at the party and says yes for marriage. But it is infact the twin sister of that girl Kamini. Ajit is even more happy when he finally meets Kamini, who also recognizes him. The Colonel wants Ajit's help in finding a female spy, who resembles her.

Love in Bombay is a 1971 romantic comedy starring Kishore Kumar, Waheeda Rehman, Ashok Kumar and others. Under unusual circumstances, village boy Baadal falls in love with city girl Preeti. Preeti’s father and fiancé both try to make sure the couple doesn’t end up getting married. They end up making one scheme after the other. Jealousy and drama ensues and finally, a challenge is thrown at Baadal. After a lot of hard work, he completes the task and wins Preeti’s hand.

Ek Paheli is a 1971 Hindi thriller film starring Sanjeev Kumar, Tanuja, Feroz Khan, Madan Puri and Aruna Irani. Dr Sudhir returns to India from the UK to take care of his family business after his father's death. He buys an old piano after which strange things start happening. He meets a ghost called Maria, who asks him to not let anyone else play the piano. Those who go against this advice start turning up dead. The mystery deepens as he finds out who Maria is.

movietitle: Jal Bin Machhli Nritya Bin Bijli
description: Jal Bin Machhli Nritya Bin Bijli is a 1971 romantic film starring Sandhya, Abhijeet and Dina Pathak. Alaknanda runs away from home to dance in Kailash’s troupe. However she meets with an accident and has a fractured leg that may never heal. She tries to escape from the troupe in disgrace, but Kailash rescues her. Now he wants her to get up on stage and dance. She is worried if she can do that since she is now handicapped for life.

Kuheli is a 1971 Bengal thriller movie starring Biswajit Chatterjee,   Sandhya Roy,   Sumita Sanyal and Ajitesh Bandyopadhyay. Shankar and his daughter live in a haunted bungalow. Sheba Mitra is Rani's babysitter. Sheba investigates some mysterious occurrences. She finds out that two killings have occurred in that mansion almost 7 years ago. Now all that Sheba can do is pray as things have gotten out of hand. The trio struggles to survive and find the reason behind the strange events.

Johny Mera Naam is a 1970 crime thriller film,  starring Dev Anand,  Pran,  Hema Malini, Jeevan, Premnath and others. Two sons of a police inspector are into boxing. Their father is killed by a criminal. Years later one son goes on to become a CID officer who solves his cases by taking up different guises. He takes the identity of Johny,  a petty thief and gets himself arrested. In jail he befriends a criminal who is his resource to find the  main criminal.

Humjoli is a 1970  Fiction drama, starring Jeetendra, Leena Chandavarkar and others. A shrewd villager, Gopalnath, visits Bombay and marries a plain-looking but sole heiress to a wealthy man's property. After marriage he has his wife killed, dumps his daughter in an orphanage and leaves for his village, where he marries his real love Shyama. Years later, his past comes back to haunt him. Shyama's relative and Gopalnath's daughter's suitor will not leave any stone unturned to teach Gopalnath a lesson.

Abhinetri is a 1970 romantic Hindi film starring Hema Malini and Shashi Kapoor. Shekhar and Anjana fall in love and get married. After a few months Anjana realises that Shekhar likes to spend more time at work in his lab than with her and she starts dancing again which her husband doesn't like. They argue and start living separately. When Shekhar's mother visits them they live together to show her that all is well and re-discover their love for each other.
Himmat is a 1970 Bollywood Action film, directed by Ravikant Nagaich. It stars Jeetendra, Mumtaz and Prem Chopra in the lead roles.

Purab Aur Pashchim is a 1970 Hindi patriotic drama film starring Manoj Kumar and Saira Banu.

The story revolves around Bharat, son of a freedom fighter, who travels to Britain for studies. In Britain, he finds that the NRIs are apprehensive about Indians and Indian culture, but are open to Western culture. Can Bharat bring a change in their thinking?

Pagla Kahin Ka is a 1970 romantic film starring Shammi Kapoor, Asha Parekh, Helen and others. Sujit is a roadside singer,  who is picked up by Shyam to sing in a nightclub. The owner objects to Sujit falling in love with dancer Jenny. An argument ensues and Shyam ends up killing the owner. Sujit takes the blame for it. He pretends to be insane,  thus being admitted in an asylum. However when he returns,  he finds Jenny is now engaged to Shyam. This betrayal turns him insane for real.

Saat Hindustani is an 1969 Hindi drama film starring Amitabh Bachchan, Madhu and Utpal Dutt. 
A Muslim writer Anwar Ali, his five other friends from different religions and places in India, join Maria, a local from Goa to bring patriotism up in the state by lifting Indian banners on Portuguese posts and structures.

Ek Shriman Ek Shrimati is a 1969 Bollywood romantic comedy starring Shashi Kapor and Babita. Pritam falls for Deepali who has alrady chosen to marry Ajit. She sees Pritam as just her friend. Pritam meets Deepali's uncle and wins him over with his charm. Deepali's uncle is convinced that Pritam will be a better match for his niece but Deepali won't hear any of it! The film is about how Pritam eventually wins Deepali over.

Kismat is a 1968 drama starring  Biswajeet, Babita and Helen. Police Commissioner is looking for those behind bomb blasts in the country. He is informed by a man that he has all the information on the mastermind in a microdot. The mastermind is Scorpion. He sends his goons to the informant's shop to recover the microdot. But the informant slips it in a customer's guitar. The customer is Vicky. He takes his guitar and leaves.

Kanyadaan is a 1968  romantic drama starring Asha Parekh, Shashi Kapoor, Om Prakash etc. Amar Kumar marries a village girl Rekha. He knows that she was married as a child to his friend Amar. But he takes advantage of having the same name as her husband and convinces her that he is the one she got married to. When Rekha comes to know the truth she leaves his home. She meets the Amar who she was married to. He is now happily settled with Lata, so Rekha doesn't tell him who she is. Will she go back to her Amar?

Jedara Bale is a 1968 thriller movie starring Rajkumar,  Udaykumar, Jayanthi, K.S. Aswath and Shakti Prasad. The story revolves around Prakash, a CID officer who is famous by the code name 999. Prakash is given the responsibility of safeguarding a chemical formula that can convert any metal into gold. A gang of notorious goons try to rob the formula. Prakash must prevent the gangsters from getting the formula.

Dil aur Mohabbat is a 1968 action drama starring Joy Mukherjee, Sharmila Tagore, Ashok Kumar and others. A widower police officer brings up his son alone. He sends him to college in Bombay. When he himself gets a transfer to Bombay he is delighted and asks his son to pick him up from the station. The son doesn't show up but the father sees his picture in the newspaper as wanted in a murder case. He tries to reach his son before the city police do. But soon the son is accused of another murder.

Boond Jo Ban Gayi Moti is a 1967 Action, drama starring Mumtaz and Jeetendra in lead roles. Satyaprakash is an honest school teacher who is falsely implicated for a murder he didn't commit. Shefali is in love with him. She helps him to come out of this unfortunate circumstance. It turns out that Satyaprakash's younger brother Mahesh was having an affair with a woman. When she got pregnant he killed her and Satyaprakash got arrested.

Amne Samne is a 1967 mystery film starring Shashi Kapoor, Sharmila Tagore and Prem Chopra. Deepak gets acquitted for murder of his wealthy wife. After getting all his wife's wealth he moves to Bombay to start a new life under the alias Gopal. Sapna is his wealthy neighbor. She falls for his charms and they get married even though her brother is against it. While honeymooning someone tries to kill Sapna. She learns that Gopal's real name is Deepak, who was accused of murdering his first wife.

Antony Firingee is a 1967 Bengali biographical musical period drama starring Uttam Kumar and Tanuja. Antony Firingee,   a Portuguese man,   becomes a famous Bengali folk poet. He falls in love and marries a courtesan Shakila,   but the society shuns them.

Mera Saaya is a 1966 drama starring Sunil Dutt and Sadhana. Rakesh's wife Geeta dies in his arms. As he is mourning her death, he receives news of the arrest of a bandit who looks exactly like his late wife. She claims that she is the real Geeta. Rakesh starts cross-examining her to ascertain her claims. But he is not convinced. She loses her mind and ends up in an asylum. She escapes to his house one night and tells him about his sister Raina who used to be a bandit just like their mother.

Dil Ne Phir Yaad Kiya is a 1966 romantic drama starring Nutan, Dharmendra, Rehman and Jeevan. The film revolves around friendship between Ashok and Amjad and their love interests.  Amjad is set to marry Shabnam but the girl Ashok wants to marry - Ashoo, tragically dies in an accident. Ashok is unaware of this. Amjad asks Shabnam who is Ashoo's look-alike to pretend to be Ashoo until Ashok recovers. She reluctantly agrees. But Ashok is confused to see Ashoo's changed behaviour.

Yeh Raat Phir na Aayegi is a 1966 Hindi Drama starring Sharmila Tagore,  Biswajit Chatterjee,  Mumtaz and others. Reeta and her assistant Rakesh excavate a woman's skeleton from a site of archaeological interest. The skeleton is two-centuries old and it mysteriously comes to life as Kiran. Reeta comes to know that Kiran has resurfaced after two centuries to claim Suraj,  her lover from the past life,  who is presently engaged to Reeta. What is Kiran going to do?

Ladki Sahyadri Ki is a 1966 bilingual social drama starring Shalini Abhyankar, Sandhya, Vatsala Deshmukh and others. Rani is asked to join a theatre troupe but her family does not allow girls to work. The village temple needs to be repaired and to help pay for it, she takes it on. She gets into trouble when the stage-owner makes advances towards her and she snubs him. This man is responsible for the temple repair work and he stops it out of spite. Can she make sure the temple is restored?

Pandava Vanavasam is a 1965 Telugu mythology film starring NTR,  S.V. Ranga Rao,  Gummadi Venkateswara Rao,  M. Balaiah,  Dr. Prabhakar Reddy,  Savitri. The film is based on the epic story Mahabharata. Pandavas were exiled by the Kauravas. The film revolves around the challenges they face during the twelve years of exile.

Neela Aakash is a 1965 drama starring Dharmendra, Mala Sinha, Shashikala and others. Akash is a pilot and Neela is an air hostess. They're about to get married but Neela's father isn't happy with this marriage as she's the only earning member of the family. Akash's landlady's daughter wants to marry Akash. They collude with Neela's father to create misunderstandings between them. Neela breaks up with him.

Tarzan Comes To Delhi is a 1965 action drama film starring Dara Singh, Mumtaz and others. A guide Shekar who knows the jungle well, leads Rekha and her professor father into the jungle only to steal a valuable necklace from a giant tribal idol. The tribesmen blame the theft on the trespassers. They threaten to kill the professor if the necklace is not returned. Tarzan wants to help Rekha. He travels with her to Dehli in order to retrieve the necklace and return it to the tribals. Will he be able to?

Shaheed is a 1965 biographical movie starring Manoj Kumar, Marathe, Prem Chopra and Anant Purushottam. Bhagat Singh is the some of Sardar Kishen Singh. His uncle Ajit Singh is arrested for speaking against British and is never to be seen or heard from after he escapes from prison. Bhagat becomes a freedom fighter like his uncle. Along with his friends he avenges the death of a innocent protestors by killing Commissioner Saunders. He is later sentenced to death along with his friends and is executed in secret.

Geet Gaya Patharon Ne is a 1964 Hindi drama with Jeetendra and Rajshree in leading roles. Vijay is a poor temple sculptor. He falls in love with Vidya and marries her inspite of opposition. When Vijay is away working for a rich man Vidya stays back with his uncle. When he returns after a year Vijay finds Vidya now living in a rich man's house. Vijay feels betrayed. Years later he meets Vidya and his child in the same rich man's house where Vidya now works as a cook. Will they reconcile?

Leader is a 1964 drama starring Dilip Kumar and Vyjayanthimala in the lead. 
Vijay Khanna is a law graduate and editor of a tabloid 'Leader'. He is a rebel. While the general elections are underway, he makes revolutionary and hilarious speeches mocking politicians to show his contempt for them, which gets him into trouble, as he is  accused of murdering a politician. He falls in love with princess Sunita and both try to uncover a criminal-politician nexus, as well as prove Vijay's innocence.

Jab Se Tumhen Dekha Hai is a 1963 Hindi drama starring Pradeep Kumar, Geeta Bali, Shammi Kapoor. Mohan and Mohini want to marry each other. Mohini's dad owes Saigal considerable money. He is unable to repay the loan. Saigal proposes that Mohini marries him in order for the debt to be paid off. Mohini asks Mohan to arrange for the money. Mohan sells all his possessions. Does he repay the loan?

Mere Mehboob is a 1963 Hindi romantic film starring Rajendra Kumar, Sadhana Shivdasani, Ashok Kumar, Nimmi, Pran. Anwar falls in love with a veiled woman in his University. She is the Nawab's sister. Nawab approves their wedding even though Anwar is poor. But the Nawab finds Anwar in the company of a lowly courtesan, Najma. As he is in debt, will he now get his sister married to the wealthy Munne Raja?

Bandini is a 1963 Hindi Drama starring  Nutan,  Ashok Kumar,  Dharmendra & others. In pre-Independence India,  Kalyani is serving life imprisonment in a prison for committing a murder. She was in love with a freedom fighter. When he doesn't return she moves to the city & starts working for an obnoxious woman who turns out to be her boyfriend's wife. Her father comes to the city looking for her,  & dies in an accident. In a moment of rage,  Kalyani poisons her employer & confesses to her crime.

Bhagini Nivedita is a 1962 Bengali movie which was based on the life of Sister Nivedita. The movie focusses around a Scots-Irish Magaret Elizabeth Noble,  who devoted her life to spiritualism and also to the cause of the needy. She later became the disciple of Swami Vivekananda.
